name: Tan-Luxe The Gradual Illuminating Tanning Lotion 250ml
description: For a brilliantly believable and beautifully buildable bronzed glow at any time of year, this gradual tan lotion is the perfect antidote to pallid, sun-starved skin syndrome. Suitable for use on both face and body, the weightless, lotion-oil hybrid formulation glides on wherever it’s desired, smoothing, conditioning and toning skin while building up natural-looking sunkissed radiance. Steering well clear of tell-tale ‘tangoed’ territory, The Gradual by TAN-LUXE is a revolution in fake tan, giving all of the glow with none of the streaks, smell or stress.
how_to_use: Prep Exfoliate using a gentle scrub 24 hours before tanning. Lightly moisturise dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles and elbows prior to application. Apply Apply to skin as you would a normal body moisturiser, lightly covering hands elbows and feet. Thoroughly wash hands after use. Develops over 2-4 hours delivering a subtle, gradual glow that you can apply daily, or as desired to build a tailor-made depth of colour. Maintain Exfoliate and moisturise skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow. Caution We advise a patch test is done 24 hours prior to use. Do not apply on broken, irritated or sensitive skin. Avoid contact with eyes. If a reaction occurs, discontinue use immediately and seek medical advice. Does not contain sunscreen and will not protect against sun exposure. Product colour may vary due to natural ingredients.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propylene Glycol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Dihydroxyacetone, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Erythrulose, Melanin, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Silk, Lecithin, Caffeine, Palmitoyl Carnitine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dimethicone, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Glycerin, Caramel, Benzophenone-4, Benzophenone-3, Tetrasodium EDTA, Benzoic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Dehydroacetic Acid

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream 240ml
description: Brazilian 'bum bums' are famously brilliant, so whether it's a bottom, a butt or la derriére, your behind will reap the benefits of this tightening, moisturising miracle cream. Rich in South America's secret ingredients, a naturally nourishing, hyper-hydrating blend of cupuaçu butter, açaí and coconut oil provide the background to the star of the show: guaraná. A native Amazonian plant, this fruit contains one of the most potent forms of caffeine on the planet (with almost five times more caffeine than coffee), giving your bottom the ultimate boost and stimulating circulation to keep it super smooth and tantalisingly toned, while also minimising cellulite. With a light, silky texture the cream is great all over the body (bum bum and beyond), absorbing quickly without feeling greasy or oily. Blissfully scented with a sweet, nutty fragrance (believe us... this stuff smells incredible) and bestowing skin with a subtle shimmer, Sol de Janeiro's Brazilian Bum Bum Cream will transport you to the beaches of Rio and grant you all the confidence of a Carnival dancer.
how_to_use: Massage in a clockwise circular motion to create warmth for better absorption and circulation. Start with your bum bum, but you won't be able to resist moving on to your tummy, arms, legs and all your beautiful features.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dodecane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Parfum (Fragrance), Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit (Açaí) Oil, Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuaçu) Seed Butter, Bertholletia Excelsa (Brazil Nut) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Paullinia Cupana (Guaraná) Seed Extract, Ilex Guayusa Leaf Extract, Ilex Paraguariensis Leaf Extract, Bixa Orellana Seed Extract, Tocopherol, Squalane, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene. Contains Nuts: Has Brazil nut.

name: Megababe Unscented Thigh Rescue 60g
description: Megababe’s Thigh Rescue (although not limited to the thigh area!) is a balm-like anti-chafe stick that creates a protective barrier on the skin for a smooth glide wherever friction tends to irritate you. With none of the mess (put down the talc) and a clear application, the award-winning stick keeps you comfortable from head to toe. The easy-to-apply formula nourishes skin with a blend of natural extracts. Aloe vera soothes and cools, while grapeseed oil and ginger root extract improves the appearance of the skin’s elasticity and firmness. Finally, pomegranate seed extract hydrates and protects the outer layer of skin. Sure to be a staple in your handbag, Thigh Rescue can be applied to the armpits, bra lines, waistband, ankles and anywhere in between.
how_to_use: Swipe directly onto skin as needed throughout the day. For use on thighs, toes, shoulders, elbows - anywhere chafe is a problem. Note that product transfer to clothing isn’t common but could occur. Not recommended for use with silk and other similarly delicate fabrics.
ingredient: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Stearyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetyl Esters, Ozokerite, Tribehenin, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Silica, Zinc Oxide, Zingiber Officiale (Ginger) Root Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Chamomila Recutita (Matrcaria) Flower Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E).

name: Aesop Reverence Aromatique Hand Wash 500ml
description: Aesop’s Reverence Hand Wash is exquisite, from the ingredients down to the chic brown bottle. With a clean, earthy perfume – a fresh, herbal blend of vetiver root, bergamot and petitgrain – this cleansing gel also boasts microscopic pumice grains to gently polish and replenish your hard-working hands. Aesop don’t believe in ‘anti’ – you won’t see any hyperbolic ‘anti-ageing’ or ‘anti-acne’ claims – instead, their products are developed to complement a balanced lifestyle, and help protect against the elements. This is ‘pro’ skin care for those who’re planning to grow older gracefully, proud of the skin that they live in.

name: Fur Oil 2.5 fl.oz
description: Specifically designed for the pubic area, Fur Oil is laced with the finest and cleanest natural, non-toxic ingredients (there’s no phthalates, parabens, silicones, and artificial colours or fragrance plus, it’s gluten-free and vegan!) to help gently soften hair and clear pores for fewer ingrown and healthier skin. There’s grape seed oil which unites vitamins E,D and C to hydrate skin and absorb quickly without leaving any greasy residue. Jojoba oil mimics the body’s natural moisturising properties to soften hair and skin, anti-bacterial clary sage oil soothes redness and post-shaving irritation and finally, anti-microbial tea tree oil absorbs and balances excess sebum production to prevent ingrown and speed up the skin’s healing process. Housed in luxurious and shelfie-approved monochrome packaging, this is fur you.
how_to_use: For everywhere hair meets skin, including pubic area, underarms, chest, legs and face. Apply liberally on clean hair and skin. This oil is residue-free and the scent disappears in minutes. For best results use daily.
ingredient: Vitis vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Salvia sclarea (clary sage) oil, Citrus medica limonum (lemon) peel oil, Mentha piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Cinnamomum camphora (Camphor) Bark Oil, Cymbopogon schoenanthus (lemongrass) oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, lavender clary sage oil

name: ESPA Detoxifying Salt Scrub 700g
description: Buff your way to beautifully smooth skin with ESPA's gently exfoliating Detoxifying Salt Scrub: a refining formula made up of sea salts and nature's purest, most effective essential oils. Carefully crafted by ESPA's aromatherapists with uplifting and refreshing notes of grapefruit, cypress and eucalyptus, this cleansing scrub effectively smooths and clarifies your skin — making light work of dulling dead skin cells and rough patches. The naturally coarse sea salts are bathed in a blend of moisturising oils, such as sweet almond oil, to provide gentle exfoliation and an invigorating aromatherapeutic boost! The results? Your skin is left feeling intensely hydrated, silken and supple. Soon you won't want to have your soak without it...
how_to_use: FOR BEST RESULTS Once or twice a week, massage into dry skin in upward circular movements. Pay particular attention to any dry areas, then rinse thoroughly.
ingredient: Sodium Chloride, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Limonene, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Cupressus Sempervirens Leaf Oil, Eucalyptus Citriodora Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Tocopherol, Juniperus Communis Fruit Oil, Citronellol, Fragrance* (Parfum), Geraniol, Linalool. *100% Natural Fragrance.

name: St. Tropez Self Tan Classic Mousse
description: St.Tropez's (and one of the worlds) most famous faux glow enhancer, the Self Tan Classic Bronzing Mousse is renowned for its natural-looking, sun-kissed bronze hue as well as the incredibly easy-to-use formula that is lightweight, guarantees your skin will be streak-free no matter how comfortable you are with a fake tan mitt, and is quick-drying, non-sticky and the beautiful scentless tan is long-lasting too meaning you can glow for up to 10 days without having to top-up or reapply while the fading is seamless, looking incredibly natural instead of patchy. An absolute classic, this vegan-friendly formula is a must-try whether you're a faux glow aficionado or new to the glow-giving abilities of fake tan.
how_to_use: Step 1: Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Immediately prior to application, moisturise any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles and feet. Step 2: For best results, apply using our Tan Applicator Mitt in long sweeping motions, starting at the ankles and working your way up. Then for your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. Ensure all areas are covered before lightly gliding any excess tan from the Mitt over your hands and feet. Step 3: Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. Step 4: Allow 4-8 hours before showering to reveal your developed tan. Step 5: To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturise daily, exfoliate regularly and reapply as desired.
ingredient: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Candelilla Cera (Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax), Cera Alba (Beeswax), Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Cera Carnauba (Copernicia Cerifera) Wax, Hy.

name: Herlum Hand and Body Wash Sandalwood and Grapefruit 50ml
description: With a luxurious lather and a rich, nourishing formula, this Hand & Body Wash promises a true sensory journey as it gently cleanses skin of the day’s dirt, pollution and sweat. Made in England but featuring murumuru butter all the way from the Amazon, this sustainably-sourced wash leaves skin feeling soft, cleansed and with a gentle fragrance that lingers all day. There’s coconut-based soap and natural antibacterial extracts to refresh skin effectively, while murumuru butter, known for its lauric and oleic acid properties, maintains your skin’s moisture barrier and prevents that overly tight, stripped feeling. You’re certain to fall in love with the scent too: a rainforest-inspired aroma made from upcycled flowers, uniting woody and spicy notes of freshly sliced grapefruit and creamy sandalwood.
how_to_use: Dampen skin, lather up, cleanse and rinse. Best enjoyed when you mindfully massage into hands and deeply inhale the relaxing scent. After use, rinse the container before placing in the recycling bin.
ingredient: Aqua (Deionised Water), Decyl Glucoside (Coconut), Cocamidopropyl Betaine (Coconut), Lauryl Glucoside (Coconut), Caprylyl Capryl Glucoside (Coconut), Glycerin (Rapeseed Oil), Parfum (Fragrance), Benzyl Alcohol (Ecocert Natural Preservative), Salicylic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Xanthan Gum (Corn), Bisabolol (Candeia Tree), Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter (Murumuru), Citric Acid, Citral.

name: AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion Orange Blossom 200ml
description: The same, bestselling formula with a fresh, 'zingy', summer-ready fragrance, AMELIORATE’s Transforming Body Lotion Orange Blossom works to soften and retexturise uneven and bumpy skin while invigorating and uplifting the senses. Technologically advanced, AMELIORATE’s {Transforming Body Lotion} formulas unite alpha-hydroxy therapy with a unique complex of natural ingredients to enhance skin condition and support its own exfoliation processes. Starring lactic acid – a member of the AHA family – this melts the ‘glue’ that binds dead, follicle-clogging cells to skin’s surface whilst attract moisture from the air to lock it into skin (lactic acid is a natural humectant). This resurfacing effect helps to create a smoother and more refined skin texture, while glycerin, milk protein complex and sodium lactate combine to deeply moisturise and improve elasticity – gradually eradicating lumps and bumps to leave skin peachy soft.
how_to_use: Apply twice daily to clean skin. Continued use is recommended to maintain beneficial effects.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Ammonium Lactate†, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Glycerin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Dimethicone, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Phenoxyethanol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Fragrance (Parfum), Xanthan Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Potassium Sorbate, Pentylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Hydrolyzed Milk Protein, Lactic Acid, Serine, Sodium Lactate, Sorbitol, Urea, Sodium Chloride, Allantoin, Pogostemon Cablin Leaf Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Extract. †From Lactic Acid.

name: Mutha The Nudist Body Scrub 170g
description: Strip down and scrub up, this gentle yet effective body scrub from the trustworthy ranks of MUTHA contains 98% natural origin ingredients to leave your skin as soft as silk and wrapped in a heavenly scent. Taking on dry, flaky limbs and dull skin, MUTHA's decadent Nudist Body Scrub will leave your skin soft, supple and healthy. A blend of luxuriously rich oils and natural brown sugar gnetly buff away dulling, dead skin cells and rough patches, while pro and post biotics encourage a stronger, fortified skin barrier. Ensuring that moisture stays locked into your limbs are amino acids, which cleverly promote your skin's natural moisture factor production and prevent transepidermal water loss. The result? Skin that's smooth, soft and wrapped in a hug of a scent of burnt sugar crystal and warm vanilla. Think of this carefully curated scrub as skin care for your body.
how_to_use: Apply generously on wet skin. Gently rub in small, circular motions to exfoliate, focusing on dry or rough areas. Rinse with warm water. Use with your favorite MUTHA™ Body Products.
ingredient: Sucrose, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Tocopherol, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Saccharomyces Ferment Lysate Filtrate, Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate, Polyglyceryl-3 Ricinoleate, Water (Aqua)(Eau), Butylene Glycol, Benzyl Glycol, Ethyl Hexanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance (Parfum).

name: Thank You Farmer Sun Project Water Sun Cream SPF50+
description: A beautiful moisturiser-meets-sunscreen, Thank You Farmer’s Sun Project Water Sun Cream SPF 50+ has an ultra-light texture that diffuses beautifully – infusing skin with precious water (thanks to high levels of hyaluronic acid), while deflecting DNA-damaging rays. Plumping and thirst-quenching, this grants a natural, dewy finish (with no chalky cast), while the inclusion of mistletoe extract helps stimulate cellular turnover – encouraging repair and renewal processes, to minimise the damage caused through everyday exposure to the sun and oxidative stress.
how_to_use: After basic skincare, take a proper amount of the product, then spread evenly on the area with will be exposed to sun. Use before exposure to the sun. Apply again to maintain protection, especially after sweating, swimming or wiping with a towel. Warning: Do not use on damaged or irritated skin, skin with wound, eczema and dermatitis. Do not use in case of allergy to any of the ingredients. For external use only. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or red spot, swelling, itching, stimulus have occurred and consult with dermatologist. Discontinue use if side effects as above have occurred on the area of application after exposure to direct sunlight. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Even when using sunscreen product, prolonged exposure to the sun is not recommended. Keep babies and children out of direct sunlight. Excessive exposure to the sun is a serious threat to health. Store in a cool and dry place, away from direct sunlight and heat, out of the reach of children.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF50+ Sun Cream 50ml
description: Stay safe in the sun without streaking thanks to this invisible finish SPF. Housed in a non-greasy and fragrance-free formula, this is the skin-friendly SPF we want on our complexion through every season. Give your skin the protection it deserves with the Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF 50+ Sun Cream. Sensitive skin can rest assured this has been endlessly tested for its mildness on the skin, and with UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA protection your skin has never felt more safe. We’ll take a lifetime supply!
how_to_use: For daily usage and sun exposition. Shake before use. Apply the sunscreen product just before exposure. Re-apply frequently and generously to maintain protection, especially after perspiring or towelling.

name: Ultra Violette Supreme Screen Hydrating Facial Skinscreen SPF 50+
description: A moisturiser, high-level SPF and primer all rolled into one, the Supreme Screen Hydrating Facial Skinscreen SPF 50+ is what streamlined routines dream of. It laughs in the face of white cast and offers an incredible SPF50+ level of protection, all while pumping skin with vitamin C (thanks, Kakadu plum) and the ‘dragosine plus’ peptide, which keeps skin feeling bouncy as it shields against infrared, visible and blue light. Super hydrating and ideal for all skin types (though especially great for normal to dry) this formula is the all-rounder and crowd pleaser of the SPF realm. Choose this if you’re overwhelmed with choice and don’t know what to go for. Trust us.
how_to_use: Apply every day, even when you’re staying indoors. Apply as the final step in your skincare routine, right after, or instead of your moisturiser and before your make up. We recommend at least five pumps to cover your face and ears.

name: Aesop Resurrection Hand Wash 500ml
description: A beautiful hand washing gel that cleanses without drying, Aesop’s Resurrection Hand Wash actually softens your hands. The antibacterial properties of mandarin and rosemary extracts help to cleanse, while lavender assists skin in feeling soothed and hydrated. It's brilliant for people who like to wash their hands a lot or who have sensitive skins. As you wash your hands, it makes your bathroom or kitchen smell divine. Aesop don’t believe in ‘anti’ – you won’t see any hyperbolic ‘anti-ageing’ or ‘anti-acne’ claims – instead, their products are developed to complement a balanced lifestyle, and help protect against the elements. This is ‘pro’ skin care for those who’re planning to grow older gracefully, proud of the skin that they live in.

name: Supergoop! Play Everyday Lotion SPF 50 with Sunflower Extract
description: Supergoop!’s Play Everyday Lotion SPF 50 with Sunflower Extracts is an all-over face and body formula that offers broad-spectrum protection without any chalky white cast or residual oiliness. Completely invisible, water and sweat-resistant, lightweight, fast-absorbing and deliciously scented (phewf!), there’s nothing not to love about this breakthrough see-through formula. Enriched with skin nourishing extracts to optimise health and resilience, this gel-textured lotion applies seamlessly to protect and replenish your skin, top-to-toe. Laced with sunflower, rosemary and rice antioxidants to shield against the impact of pollution, this also deflects the skin-damaging effects of UVA, UVB and IRA rays, and is coral reef-safe (so it’s good for your skin, and the ocean).
how_to_use: Apply liberally to face and body at least 15 minutes prior to sun exposure. Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, or at least every two hours.

name: Summer Fridays ShadeDrops Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Mineral Milk Sunscreen 50ml
description: A broad-spectrum, mineral sunscreen not to shy away from, this milky formula blends into a range of skin tones for a finish that is every bit as natural as it is effective in shielding your skin from the sun. Lightweight and serum-like in texture, this all-natural zinc-oxide formula protects against UVA and UVB rays in a gentle manner that suits even sensitive skin types. Squalane, a plant-derived lipid, adds a layer of ultra-hydration to reveal plumped up skin, while a blend of antioxidants vitamin E and ethyl ferulate protects against free-radical damage, letting you enjoy a sunkissed visage without speeding up the ageing process. Now, excuse us as we make our way to sunbathe without a (sun) care in the world.
how_to_use: Smooth evenly over skin as the final step in your skincare routine. Follow with makeup if desired. Apply generously 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every two hours, and directly after any physical activity or exposure to water.

name: Megababe Night Rescue Overnight Brightening Stick 60g
description: Made specifically to aid discolouration caused by friction pain (thanks chaffing!) this soothing overnight relief stick has arrived to brighten your skin while you snooze. Formulated with Megababe's proprietary MegaBright Complex™, the skin saviour features niacinamide, fermented clary sage, kakadu plum oil, blackcurrant extract and peony extract for calmer, brighter and less sensitised skin! Not only that but with the addition of mango seed butter, grapeseed oil, jojoba oil and squalene, this balmy stick soothes irritation, aids in healing and boosts skin barrier function. Now you can enjoy, smoother, softer, less irritated skin all while you catch up on your beauty sleep... P.s this isn't just for your thighs - use it anywhere neck down where discoloration or irritated skin has reared its head then wear your shorts, shirts, bikini's and everything else with pride!
how_to_use: Swipe on your thighs at nighttime to brighten and soothe while you sleep. Allow for six weeks to see brightening results.

name: Weleda Skin Food (75ml)
description: An undisputed hero of the beautysphere, Weleda's Skin Food boasts a blend of replenishing, natural and organic ingredients to quickly repair and revitalise dry, rough or stressed, scaly skin. Creating a silky cocoon between skin and the drying effects of the elements, this rich – and we mean really rich – cream is a true 'desert island' essential; jam-packed with lanolin, beeswax and glycerin, alongside sweet almond and sunflower oils to help soften and fortify skin as they boost moisture levels, this supplements barrier function to ward against water loss. A godsend for gardeners, this quickly conditions the gnarliest palms, while the medley of antibacterial rosemary, conditioning calendula and calming chamomile protect and help to cherish elbows, knees, feet... even faces. A handbag hero – as well as a pocket-sized sidekick – keep this cute, grass green tube within reach at all times to replenish and reassure compromised skin in an instant.
how_to_use: Apply generously several times a day, wherever your skin needs extra help – especially on rough, dry areas like hands, feet and elbows.
ingredient: Water (aqua), Helianthus Annuus (sunflower) Seed Oil, Lanolin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (sweet Almond) Oil, Beeswax (cera Alba), Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Glycerin, Limonene*, Viola Tricolor Extract, Fragrance (parfum)*, Hydrolyzed Beeswax, Sobitan Olivate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (matricaria) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Arginine, Zinc Sulfate, Linalool*, Geraniol*, Citral*, Coumarin*

name: Ultra Violette Preen Screen SPF 50+ Reapplication Mist 75ml
description: Looking for a top-up SPF that doesn’t pill over make up? You’ve found it. The new Preen Screen™ SPF50 Reapplication Mist makes sun protection effortless — and your skin radiant. This lightweight formula future-proofs your skin against sun damage, while providing a lit-from-within glow. Infused with a cocktail of nourishing ingredients, it’s packed with moisturising vitamin E to combat free-radical damage and strengthen the skin barrier, as well as niacinamide to balance oil production and minimise pores. Vitamin C is also key for its brightening and youth-enhancing properties, while bisabolol and aloe vera leaf extract work to soothe and calm any irritation and redness. As good as sunscreen gets? We think so.
how_to_use: For everyday use. Shake well and spray directly to the face as the final step in your skin care regime — and over the top of make up or skin care, including SPF. Close eyes, hold 20cm from face, exhale and apply evenly in the shape of an ‘x’ or ‘t’. Allow to dry slightly before opening eyes. Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. Avoid prolonged high-risk sun exposure. Wear a hat, protective clothing and sunglasses when exposed to the sun. Re-apply frequently.
ingredient: Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate (5.0%), Octyl Methoxycinnamate (5.0%), Bemotrizinol (2.0%), Ethylhexyl Triazone (2.0%). Alcohol Denat. (Ethanol), Isododecane, Polyester-8, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Tocopheryl Acetate (dl-alpha-tocopheryl acetate), Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate (Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate), Bisabolol, Niacinamide (Nicotinamide), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract (Aloe Vera), Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract (Camellia Sinensis), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil (Cocos Nucifera), Fragrance/Parfum, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil (Sunflower Oil), Paraffinum Liquidum/Mineral Oil/Huile Minérale (Liquid Paraffin), Butylene Glycol (butylene glycol dicaprylate/dicaprate) (1,3-Butylene Glycol), Ethylhexyl Palmitate (Octyl Palmitate), Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopherol.

name: Supergoop! Glow Stick SPF 50
description: Because nobody wants to carry around a huge bottle of sunscreen with them – or worry about whether or not their SPF is all rubbed in (“Do I have something on my nose?”) – the Glow Stick SPF 50 offers powerful protection in a portable and easy-to-use dry oil stick. Made for the face, neck and shoulders (though suitable for use wherever else you fancy), this formula gives a dewy finish and won’t irritate dry skin. In fact, this stick is best used on dry and combo skin types – hydrating and protecting with zero mess and zero cast. The totally invisible formula protects and provides a natural glow, without ever making you look oily or sweaty. Reef-safe and cruelty-free, what’s not to love? *Buys one for each handbag*
how_to_use: Use after moisturiser to lock in hydration and throughout the day for ultimate protection. Reapply every two hours.
ingredient: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Octyldodecanol, Isododecane, Octocrylene, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Isohexadecane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Dibutyl Lauroyl Glutamide, Polyester-8, Dibutyl Ethylhexanoyl Glutamide, Calendula Officinalis Extract, Calophyllum Inophyllum Seed Oil, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Limnanthes Alba Seed Oil, Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil, Pentaclethra Macroloba Seed Oil, Tocopherol

name: Sol de Janeiro Rio Deo Aluminum-Free Deodorant Cheirosa 40
description: Clear of aluminium and bad-for-you baking soda, Rio Deo Aluminum-Free Deodorant Cheirosa 40 is perfect for those looking for a natural, sweet-smelling alternative to keep you refreshed and confident throughout the day. Fused with a nourishing cocktail of papaya enzyme, coconut oil, mango seed butter, Brazilian bacuri butter and tapioca starch (phew!), this smooth-gliding deodorant gently exfoliates away dead skin cells to ward off stubble, ingrown hairs and hyperpigmentation. Cleverly formulated to lower your skin's pH and prevent odour-building bacteria from forming, this moisturising body care essential works to even out your skin tone and soothe irritation at the very same time! Boasting sultry notes of black amber plum with intoxicating v vanilla accords inspired by the iconic Cheirosa 40 fragrance, this irresistible, skin-loving deodorant is your gateway to smoother underarms.
how_to_use: Apply to dry skin for maximum benefits. A little goes a long way--all you need is one to two swipes to smell deliciously Brazilian.
ingredient: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tapioca Starch, Stearyl Alcohol, Magnesium Hydroxide, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Triethyl Citrate, Parfum (Fragrance), Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Behenyl Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-3 Stearate, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Platonia Insignis Seed Butter, Lactobacillus/Papaya Fruit Ferment Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit/Leaf Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Seed Oil, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, Tocopherol, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene.

name: Megababe Space Bar Detoxifying Charcoal Underarm Bar 99g
description: Don’t sweat the small stuff — or if you do, let Megababe’s Space Bar Underarm Soap freshen you up! This palm-free soap is designed to purify your pits in next to no time; don’t get it twisted, it may be powerful but it’s still gentle on your skin — hydrating avocado, sunflower and olive oils make sure of that. What makes it out of this world? It’s powered by activated charcoal, a natural powder that draws toxins, dirt, oil and microparticles to the surface of the skin, ready to be rinsed away. Glycolic acid (a.k.a. the alpha hydroxy acid equivalent of an ‘it girl’) help to refine the surface of your skin, sloughing away dead skin cells. Add clarifying tea tree oil, brightening vitamin C and bacteria-banishing sodium chloride into the mix and you’ve got a recipe for happy pits.
how_to_use: Use every time you shower for deeply cleansed pits that are perfectly prepped for deodorant! Lather up and massage into pits in a circular motion. Leave on 60 seconds before rinsing. Use anywhere stinky or where oily skin is a concern!
ingredient: Sodium Cocoate, Water, Glycerin, Coconut Acid, Sodium Citrate, Charcoal Powder, Glycolic Acid, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Chloride, Maltodextrin.

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream 75ml
description: Brazilian 'bum bums' are famously brilliant, so whether it's a bottom, a butt or la derriére, your behind will reap the benefits of this tightening, moisturising miracle cream. Rich in South America's secret ingredients, a naturally nourishing, hyper-hydrating blend of cupuaçu butter, açaí and coconut oil provide the background to the star of the show: guaraná. A native Amazonian plant, this fruit contains one of the most potent forms of caffeine on the planet (with almost five times more caffeine than coffee), giving your bottom the ultimate boost and stimulating circulation to keep it super smooth and tantalisingly toned, while also minimising cellulite. With a light, silky texture the cream is great all over the body (bum bum and beyond), absorbing quickly without feeling greasy or oily. Blissfully scented with a sweet, nutty fragrance (believe us... this stuff smells incredible) and bestowing skin with a subtle shimmer, Sol de Janeiro's Brazilian Bum Bum Cream will transport you to the beaches of Rio and grant you all the confidence of a Carnival dancer.
how_to_use: Massage in a clockwise circular motion to create warmth for better absorption and circulation. Start with your bum bum, but you won't be able to resist moving on to your tummy, arms, legs and all your beautiful features.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dodecane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Parfum (Fragrance), Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit (Açaí) Oil, Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuaçu) Seed Butter, Bertholletia Excelsa (Brazil Nut) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Paullinia Cupana (Guaraná) Seed Extract, Ilex Guayusa Leaf Extract, Ilex Paraguariensis Leaf Extract, Bixa Orellana Seed Extract, Tocopherol, Squalane, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene. Contains Nuts: Has Brazil nut.

name: Versed Press Restart Retinol Body Lotion 177ml
description: Tired of scaly skin? Powered by pure retinol, nourishing cocoa butter and hyper-hydrating squalane, Versed's Press Restart Retinol Body Lotion will do more than smooth over roughness – the supercharged formula will encourage firmer and brighter skin. Retinol is nothing new to skintellectuals – it's one of the most dermatologist-recommended ingredients – but it's relatively rare in the realm of body care. Versed is here to change that! Extending its youth-prolonging benefits to your limbs, encapsulated retinol works in tandem with squalane and cocoa butter to renew, quench and smooth your skin. Lavish it liberally over your chest, legs, elbows and more to refine crepiness and rough patches.
how_to_use: Massage into dry skin. Neck down, all over or spot treat rough, dull areas. Daily, PM, and/or AM. Wear broad-spectrum SPF 30 or higher when using the lotion. If applying in the AM, keep areas of application out of direct sunlight, as retinol can become less effective when exposed to UV rays.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Isopentyldiol, Jojoba Esters, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Retinol, Squalane, Tocopherol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Xanthan Gum, Cetearyl GlucosideHydroxyacetophenone1,2-HexanediolCaprylyl Glycol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-10 Dioleate, Citric Acid, Sodium Gluconate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) OilPolyglyceryl-10 Dipalmitate, Phenoxyethanol, Ergothioneine.

name: Supergoop! Supersize Unseen Sunscreen SPF 30 (73.9ml)
description: The perfect last step in your morning regime, Supergoop!s aptly named Unseen Sunscreen SPF 30 has been painstakingly formulated to protect from the harmful effects of the sun while improving the health of your skin. Now available in a jumbo size (73.9ml) you can rest easy knowing your SPF stash is well-stocked for the foreseeable future. With no greasy feel and no tell-tale white film, this universally flattering sunscreen is perfect for every complexion providing unparalleled UV deflection while being coral reef-friendly and without suffocating your skin or exacerbating congestion. Velvety textured and great for prolonging the wear of your make up, this broad-spectrum shield boasts the cleanest ingredients (you wont find any alcohol, parabens or artificial fragrance), and is also cruelty-free. Sweat and water-resistant for up to 40 minutes, it’s quicker to list what this shine-minimising creation can’t do, now there’s zero excuse not to follow Baz Luhrmanns advice to wear sunscreen.
how_to_use: Apply generously and evenly as the last step in your skin care routine and before make up. Unseen Sunscreen SPF 30 protects against UVA rays, UVB rays, IRA, and blue-light, and is sweat- and water-resistant. It’s the same formula available in the US, with an SPF rating of 30 to follow the United Kingdoms regulatory guidelines.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Anti-Shine Sun Protection Invisible SPF50+ Face Mist 75ml
description: You don't need to choose between picture-perfect make up and sun-protected skin any longer with the Anthelios Anti-Shine Face Mist SPF 50. The first of its kind in the Anthelios line, this moisturising but mattifying mist delivers a double anti-shine action with an ultra-dry finish and sits flawlessly on top of make up throughout the day. Freshly fragranced for the ultimate holiday mode pick-me-up, La Roche-Posay's high protection mist makes SPF top-ups a dream and not just a necessity. Sensitive oily and blemish-prone skin can thank NASA (yes, you heard us right) for the oil-absorbing benefits this SPF mist brings. 'Airlicium' is used by the famous aeronautic experts and has been put to work in this formulation to form a supple and resistant film over the skin while smoothing texture and allowing it to really breathe. If that wasn't enough for you it absorbs three times its weight in oil! Protected and mattified skin is just a mist away thanks to La Roche-Posay. We're just saying if it's good enough for astronauts...
how_to_use: Apply 30 minutes before exposure and reapply frequently and generously every two hours to maintain protection especially after swimming, perspiring or towelling. Shake well before use. Avoid exposure to the sun during the hottest hours of the day.
ingredient: Butane, Aqua/Water, Homosalate, Octocrylene, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Nylon-12, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, P-Anisic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Carnosine, Cyclohexasiloxane, Disodium Edta, Drometrizole Trisiloxanel, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Peg-32, Peg-8 Laurate, Phenoxyethanol, Poly C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Parfum/Fragrance, Code F.I.L C186282/1.R.

name: Frank Body Original Coffee Scrub 200g
description: Take your coffee addiction to new heights with frank body’s Original Coffee Scrub. Featuring only natural, vegan and good-for-you ingredients, it leaves your skin feeling silllky smooth to the touch and gradually reduces scars and stretchmarks (hurrah!). The formula contains two natural exfoliators; Robusta coffee grinds, which also stimulate blood flow and encourage collagen production, and sea salt to combat flakiness and, thanks to its anti-bacterial properties, tackle spots. To replenish moisture after all that exfoliation, cold pressed sweet almond oil packs a hydrating punch that lasts long after you’ve rinsed it off, and vitamin E helps to fade scars and marks. The result? Smoother, more even, breakout-resistant skin with continued use.
how_to_use: Massage the scrub all over your body for a few minutes, focusing particularly on areas that want more attention (eg. Scars, cellulite, stretch marks, breakouts, dry areas). Rinse well.
ingredient: Coffea Robusta Seed Powder, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Water (Aqua), Sodium Chloride, Sucrose, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Tocopherol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene

name: Sol de Janeiro Bom Dia Bright Clarifying AHA BHA Body Wash 385ml
description: Wishing a bom dia to your skin from head to toe, the Bom Dia Clarifying AHA & BHA Body Wash works to gently (and we mean gently) exfoliate away dead skin cells and pore-clogging foes to reveal enviably soft textures. Non-stripping and free from drying sulfates, this fruit-powered fusion of alpha hydroxy acids and salicylic acids help to purify and buff your skin to perfection. Boasting a gel-like consistency that's enriched with banana and mango extracts and a coconut-derived cleansing system, this deliciously scented in-shower essential promotes new cell turnover, wards off congestion, ingrown hairs and even strawberry skin! Oozing with warm, summer-inspired notes of jasmine blooms and Brazilian orchids, this rejuvenating shower gel is just what your skin has been waiting for...
how_to_use: Massage all over your body for 30-60 seconds. Rinse clean to reveal radiant skin.

name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder 20g
description: As most skin care buffs will know, vitamin C is an effective antioxidant that brightens skin, evens out tone and reduces signs of ageing. A suspension of very fine L-Ascorbic Acid powder, this formula provides the most direct exposure of extremely high concentrations of vitamin C topically. This extremely effective method visibly targets the appearance of uneven skin tone, dullness and other hallmarks of ageing. The powder can be mixed with other treatments (except those containing niacinamide or EUK 134) so it will slot in perfectly to any ritual. With this format, a very strong tingling but non-irritating sensation is to be expected during the first 1-2 weeks of use while your skin’s tolerance to vitamin C is elevated.
how_to_use: Mix a small amount with other treatments in the palm of your hand and apply to face in the AM or the PM. A tingling sensation can be expected after application. Do not mix with formulations containing Niacinamide or EUK 134. If topical Vitamin C is used as part of skin care, it should be applied at alternate times with EUK 134 or Niacinamide (ideally Vitamin C in the PM and EUK 134/Niacinamide in the AM). Otherwise, EUK 134/Niacinamide can affect the integrity of pure-form Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid).
ingredient: Ascorbic Acid

name: Tweezerman Facial Razor
description: Providing superior performance, the sleek Facial Razor from Tweezerman ensures easy facial hair removal without damaging your precious skin. Incredibly sharp to ensure swift and close shaving, this razor simply glides along your complexion — gently exfoliating dulling, dead skin cells as it does so — to leave fuzz-free, glowing skin in its wake. Ergonomically designed for easy handling, the Facial Razor is easy to wield, clean, and store — with each blade (it comes with three spare) fitting into the provided safety cap. Utterly sanitary, the blades are forged with stainless steel, which you can simply rinse with warm water or swipe with an alcohol wipe after use.
how_to_use: Start with clean and moisturised skin OR use while washing your face, with your face wash still on the skin. After removing cap from tool, hold the razor at an angle and apply short, feathery strokes downward and with light pressure anywhere you need to remove excess hair. Once finished, rinse face and apply moisturiser or serum to avoid drying. Rinse razor with warm water or an alcohol wipe to clean. Once dry, replace cap and store. Tool care tips: Clean with alcohol to prevent infection and bacteria build-up before and after each use. Place the cap back on the razor after use and store in a dry place. Handle razor with care, blade is sharp. This item cannot be sanitised in barbicide or an autoclave. For optimal performance, replace razor blades every 2–3 months or as needed.
ingredient: Stainless Steel.

name: Kitsch Satin Sleep Scrunchies (Various Colours)
description: Minimising damage while looking totally chic, these scrunchies are far more than a nod to the '90s Specially selected elasticated bands are covered with Kitschs Satin Sleep Scrunchies. Whether youre creating a ballet bun, the highest high ponytail, tossing your hair in a topknot or creating an intricate do, this sumptuous silk ensures that you create no kinks or creases while being kind to your delicate locks, ensuring that theres no damage or breakage.
how_to_use: Use to style hair while sleeping.
ingredient: Dacron 96% Spandex 4%

name: Weleda Skin Food 75ml - Light
description: A lighter – but no less hydrating – iteration of the best-loved Skin Food, Skin Food Light brings immediate comfort to dry, thirsty skin that’s in need of a cooling, replenishing drink. Intensive care that sinks in easily, Skin Food Light boasts a medley of softening, strengthening, smoothing and barrier-boosting botanicals – including sunflower seed oil, shea and cocoa seed butters, rosemary extracts and chamomile – to supplement skin’s own defences while ‘locking in’ moisture to maximise ‘spring’ and resilience. Silky, non-greasy and swiftly absorbed, this tube is a true handbag hero – as well as a pocket-sized sidekick – to care for chapped, compromised hands, scaly elbows or anywhere needing attention.
how_to_use: Smooth onto dry skin areas on the body or face and massage in gently. Allow to soak in.
ingredient: Water(Aqua), Helianthus Annuus(Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Beeswax(Cera Alba), Theobroma Cacao(Cocoa) Seed Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii(Shea) Butter, Limonene*, Viola Tricolor Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis(Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Lanolin, Carrageenan, Xanthan Gum, Lactic Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate, Fragrance(Parfum)*, Linalool*, Geraniol*, Citral*. *From natural essential oils

name: Supergoop! (Re)setting 100% Mineral Powder SPF 30 PA+++ - Translucent 4.25g
description: If your biggest gripe with SPFs is that they leave your skin feeling greasy, the multitasking (Re)setting 100% Mineral Powder SPF 30 from Supergoop! will give your skin the protection you need without the unwanted shine. A generous swoop of this powder sets your makeup, mattifies your skin and offers broad-spectrum protection against UVA and UVB rays. This mineral sunscreen uses non-nano particles, which are unable to penetrate your skin. Instead, they create a physical block against UV rays, scattering and reflecting the sun's rays in the process. The best part? This innovative formula makes reapplying your SPF over make up through the day a breeze: simply tap, tap, tap in this setting powder and offer your skin effective protection without sacrificing your hard work.
how_to_use: Remove the cap and slide down the clear plastic sleeve. Remove and discard the plastic yellow pin at the centre of the brush. Twist the body of the brush from the CLOSED position to OPEN. Tilt and tap the brush gently against your wrist until you see the powder start to flow through the bristles. When your makeup is ready to go, brush the powder generously over your face to set the look and mattify your skin. Reapply throughout the day as needed. To close, twist the body of the brush from the OPEN position to CLOSED, pull up the clear plastic sleeve and snap the cap back on.
ingredient: Zinc Oxide 24.7%, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Silica, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Lauroyl Lysine, Polyglyceryl-10 Pentaisostearate, Boron Nitride, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Nylon-6/12, Sodium Dehyrdoacetate, Olive Glycerides, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Ceramide 3, May contain Iron Oxides (CI 77492, 77491, 77499).

name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Baume B5 Repairing Balm SPF 50 40ml
description: Keep the whole family protected and nourished with the Cicaplast Baume B5 Repairing Balm SPF 50. Combining UVA and UVB protection with a restorative treatment of calming panthenol and 'Madecassoside' to keep inflammation and irritation at bay for optimal skin recovery, this is the multi-purpose balm we simply can't be without. Relieve tight, dry and cracked skin while keeping your skin perfectly protected from UV rays thanks to this non-greasy and ultra-nourishing balm.
how_to_use: Apply daily to clean dry skin in a generous layer. Can be used on the face and body, avoiding lips and the eye contour.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Homosalate, Panthenol, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Octocrylene, Alcohol Denat., Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Triethanolamine, Dimethicone, Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonic Acid, Peg-8 Laurate, Sorbitan Oleate, Zinc Gluconate, Madecassoside, Manganese Gluconate, Isohexadecane, Sodium Acrylates Crosspolymer-2, Silica, 2-Oleamido-1, 3-Octadecanediol, Perlite, Drometrizole Trisiloxane, Poloxamer 338, Disodium Edta, Copper Gluconate, Caprylyl Glycol, Polysorbate 80, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Bht, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol. Please Check Back Of Pack For Up To Date Ingredients.

name: Megababe No More Chafe Duo
description: Don’t let chafing determine your summer wardrobe. Megababe’s Thigh Rescue is here to keep you comfortable from head to toe. Here to stop friction from irritating you to no end, this balm stick can be used on thighs, toes, shoulders, elbows and more to keep chafing under control. The winner of six awards — New Beauty’s ‘Best Chafe Stick’ in 2022, Allure Best of Beauty 2021, Allure Best of Beauty 2020, Into The Gloss’s ‘25 Best Products of the Decade’ in 2019, 2018 Cosmopolitan Beauty Award, 2017 New York Magazine Best All-Around Anti-Chafing Product — it’s safe to say that it’s a fan favourite. It glides on smooth to create a friction-free barrier and feeds your skin with nourishing extracts: anti-inflammatory aloe soothes skin; pomegranate seed extract protects the outer layer of your skin and promotes healing; ginger root extract evens skin tone and boosts elasticity; finally, orange oil provides quick and effective relief from inflammation.
how_to_use: Swipe directly onto skin as needed throughout the day. For use on thighs, toes, shoulders, elbows — anywhere chafe is a problem!

name: Sol de Janeiro Bum Bum Body Firmeza Oil 100ml
description: Bringing a little Brazilian flair to your bathroom shelf, Sol de Janeiro Bum Bum Body Firmeza Oil transforms ashy skin with Rio-ready radiance — courtesy of a smoothing and tightening blend of Amazonian guarana, jaboticaba and muirapuama. With the same incredible sweet and nutty scent as the brand’s iconic Bum Bum Cream, this nourishing oil banishes puffiness to leave skin visibly tighter. Micro algae extract, guarana and muirapuama stimulate microcirculation to promote drainage, while jaboticaba and Brazilian olive oil deeply replenish to leave limbs soft and smooth. With a hydrating yet dry feel that sinks in fast, this luxurious oil leaves skin glowy, not greasy.
how_to_use: Apply morning and night, all over your body, using circular motions to support circulation and visibly reduce puffiness. Depuffing belly massage technique: starting at your belly button, press firmly and sweep fingers upwards and outwards towards your rib cage. Complete this movement for 3-5 minutes. Starting at your belly button again, press firmly and sweep fingers downwards and outwards towards your bikini line.

name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast B5 Anti-Bacterial Cleansing Wash 200ml
description: Keep sensitivity soothed and preserve your barrier balance with this ultra-gentle cleanser. Irritated skin will rest easy thanks to this non-drying and lightly foaming cleanser that you can use on the face and body, on children and adults alike. Backed with over 30 years of research, La Roche-Posay is the dermatologist-recommended skin care expert for sensitive skin types. Combining their uniquely pure and protected ‘Thermal Spring Water’ with an active 5% of soothing panthenol this cleanser is here to give you the most gentle start to your daily regime. Bolster your barrier with antibacterial metallic salts to keep harmful bacteria at bay while keeping your skin hydrated with nourishing glycerin. The Cicaplast B5 Anti-Bacterial Cleansing Wash is here to save even the most sensitive skin from irritation and damage.
how_to_use: 1-2 times a day, lather Cicaplast B5 Gentle Soothing Wash with water in the hollow of your hand before gently applying to the skin area to cleanse. Rinse with plenty of water and gently pat dry.

name: Aesop Geranium Leaf Body Cleanser 500ml
description: This gentle, lightly foaming cleanser offers an aromatic boost of wild geranium to kick-start your morning, or refresh you after a long day. Use a small amount on a sponge in the shower, add a teaspoonful to your bath for a luxurious bubble bath or use it as a hand wash. Enhanced with geranium leaf extract to cleanse and deodorise without drying out your skin, plus it makes your shower smell amazing. Unlike most of the Aesop range, Geranium Body Cleanser comes in a brown plastic bottle for safer shower usage.

name: Ultra Violette Lean Screen Mineral Mattifying Fragrance Free Skinscreen SPF 50+
description: Crafted in response to a wave of pleas from their community, Ultra Violette's Lean Screen Mineral Mattifying Fragrance Free Skinscreen SPF50 is a mineral-only SPF that will have re-thinking everything you know about mineral SPFs. For starters, it won't feel heavy, you won’t look like a cricketer and sensitive skin won’t throw a tantrum! Perfect for anyone with oily or reactive skin, or those who just prefer a physical sunscreen, this fragrance-free formula won't feel sticky or heavy; quite the contrary, it's designed to soothe sensitive skin and grant a subtle matte finish. Its protective prowess stems from zinc oxide - nothing more, nothing less - that protects your skin from UVA and UVB rays while working as a soothing anti-inflammatory to reactive, angry skin. Plant-derived pentavin then lends the blend a refreshing hit of hydration that reveals itself as a plump, juicy finish, plus antioxidant-rich kakadu plum guards your skin against free radicals and promotes a simply luminous finish!
how_to_use: Every damn day, even when you’re staying indoors (seriously we mean it)! Apply as the final step in your skin care routine, right after your moisturiser and before your make up. We recommend at least five pumps to cover your face and ears (don’t forget about those!).
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Zinc Oxide, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Octyldodecanol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, PEG-30 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Disodium EDTA, Saccharide Isomerate, Sodium Chloride, Xanthan Gum, Gluconolactone, Cetearyl Glucoside, Isostearic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides)

name: Hello Klean Nourishing Micronutrient Wash 400ml
description: Don’t let hard water dry out your limbs! Look to HELLO KLEAN’S Nourishing Micronutrient Wash to wash away to mineral deposits and feed your skin with antioxidant powerhouse ingredients. Created in the knowledge that soap isn’t always able to thoroughly rinse off with hard water — it mixes with the minerals to create soap scum that can settle on your skin and create that ‘tight’ feeling — this duo-concentrate body cleanser works to thoroughly melt away the hard water deposits. How? It consists of two phases: cream and water-based cleansers. They each have their own molecular density yet, when shaken, they merge into one and the smaller molecules lift away impurities while the larger molecules lock in nutrients, supporting your skin barrier. The top layer is a mixture of almond oil and a micronutrient blend containing niacinamide, vitamin E, and provitamin B5 to hydrate and nourish. The second layer contains a unique chelating complex infused with matcha green tea and microalgae to remove hard water residue while balancing the skin. Together, they promote soft, hydrated skin even after the wash is rinsed away.
how_to_use: Shake and dispense formula into palm. Massage onto the body for 30 seconds to activate the micronutrients. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Mario Badescu AHA Botanical Body Soap
description: One of the brand’s bestselling formulas, the AHA Botanical Body Soap brightens, smooths and rejuvenates skin. Harnessing the power of fresh fruit extracts and their enzymes, this grapefruit-infused cocktail softens skin while thoroughly cleaning your limbs from top to toe. Kicking ‘buttne’ and ‘bacne’ (AKA, blemishes on your bum and back) to the curb, this formula is a boon for spotty, bumpy, dull, dry or oily skin types. Endlessly refreshing and moisturising (thanks to an invigorating blend of ginseng and linden), the vegan and alcohol-free formula can be used before or after shaving without prompting irritation, and is even housed in recyclable packaging! Just try not to slip in the shower with your swooning…
how_to_use: Use daily as an all over body wash, avoiding face and eyes. Apply to wet skin with a soft cloth, loofah, or sponge. Rinse thoroughly. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.

name: OUAI St. Barts Body Cleanser 300ml
description: Bound to secure pride of place on your shower shelfie, this ultra-chic St. Barts Body Cleanser makes luxe work of your cleansing ritual as teleports your skin senses to a far a-OUAI landscape. Infused with jojoba seed oil to soothe and hydrate, along with a dash of ultra-moisturising rosehip oil to soften, this sensorial shower gel cares for your skin whilst elevating your body care rituals with holiday-inspired fragrance. Keeping your post-holiday blues at bay with a glow-giving formula and tropical scent celebrating notes of dragonfruit, orange blossom, tuberose and baltic amber, expect supple, baby-soft skin in no time.

name: Hello Sunday The One For Your Lips – Fragrance Free Lip Balm SPF50
description: Does anyone else have flashbacks of summer days as a child, running around with smeared, white sunblock all around your mouth? It wasn't a pretty picture... but lip protection doesn't have to look like that. That's where Hello Sunday's The One For Your Lips - Fragrance Free Lip Balm SPF 50 comes in; this totally transparent balm boasts an impressive SPF of 50 (!) to keep the delicate skin on your lips plush and protected. Packed full of skin-loving ingredients, the Hello Sunday sunscreens bridge the gap between sun protection and skin care, in the way they condition and enhance your complexion. Take this lip balm – it's made with hyaluronic acid (the beauty industry's favourite hydrating ingredient) as well as squalane and shea butter to grant a supremely soft finish. As if all that wasn't reason enough to adore this skin-shielding salve, it's now fragrance free for those of us sensitive to scent.
how_to_use: Apply to lips throughout the day as needed. Sunscreen best practice: apply 30 minutes before going outside and reapply every two hours as well as immediately after swimming or sweating.

name: Paula's Choice Retinol Body Treatment (118ml)
description: Part of the brand's hardworking body range, this age-defying Skin Smoothing Retinol Body Treatment unites a specialised retinol complex with skin-protecting antioxidants and nourishing emollients to help reveal softer, firmer and younger-looking skin with improved skin tone and added radiance. Inside this super formula you'll find emollient and antioxidant-rich shea butter to help smooth dry skin, soothing evening primrose oil and finally pollutant-defending grape seed oil. Meanwhile, the powerhouse retinol complex helps to improve a variety of skin concerns, from rejuvenating and reviving complexions to smoothing wrinkles and visible sun damage. Simply massage into the skin and make sure you apply an SPF before heading outside.
how_to_use: Apply a thin layer all over the body as often as needed. Massage into skin using gentle circular motions. May be used over a PAULA'S CHOICE AHA or BHA product; may be used with a skin-lightening product. For daytime, protect exposed body skin by following with a sunscreen rated SPF 15 or greater.

name: Ultra Violette Fave Fluid SPF 50+ Lightweight Skinscreen 75ml
description: Ultra Violette's thinnest consistency yet, the Face Fluid SPF 50+ Lightweight Skinscreen offers supreme comfort and protection. The featherlight formula is powered by next generation UV filters to help defend against UVA and UVB rays, blending into the skin with a non-sticky finish. The sunscreen is powered by a cocktail of skin-loving ingredients. Moonlighting as both a humectant and an antioxidant, vitamin E sets to work to strengthen the skin barrier, supported by amino acids for a moisture boost. Wondering what part ascorbyl glucoside plays? This Vitamin C derivative helps to protect against visible signs of sun damage, all while brightening the complexion. Complete with niacinamide, the sunscreen encourages a dewy, balanced-looking finish.
how_to_use: Apply generously as the final step in your skincare routine, right after or instead of your moisturiser, and before your makeup. Use daily, even when you're staying indoors.

name: Sol de Janeiro Bom Dia Bright Clarifying AHA BHA Body Wash 90ml
description: Wishing a bom dia to your skin from head to toe, the Bom Dia Clarifying AHA & BHA Body Wash works to gently (and we mean gently) exfoliate away dead skin cells and pore-clogging foes to reveal enviably soft textures. Non-stripping and free from drying sulfates, this fruit-powered fusion of alpha hydroxy acids and salicylic acids help to purify and buff your skin to perfection. Boasting a gel-like consistency that's enriched with banana and mango extracts and a coconut-derived cleansing system, this deliciously scented in-shower essential promotes new cell turnover, wards off congestion, ingrown hairs and even strawberry skin! Oozing with warm, summer-inspired notes of jasmine blooms and Brazilian orchids, this rejuvenating shower gel is just what your skin has been waiting for...
how_to_use: Massage all over your body for 30-60 seconds. Rinse clean to reveal radiant skin.

name: Spacemasks Spacemasks
description: A must-have for relaxing evenings, these luxe, self-heating eye masks promote relaxation thanks to an infusion of mind and body-calming jasmine and gentle air-activated warmth. Providing instant relief from headaches, tiredness, and eye strain, prepare to transport yourself to another dimension. Each box of Spacemasks comes with five individually, single-use wrapped foil masks with a luxe galaxy pattern. We suggest keeping these by your bed and slipping one over your ears and eyes when you need a bit of me time. Incredibly gentle of skin and eyes, these disposable and recyclable masks are perfect for flights, long journeys or whenever you need you’ll need a relaxing and helpful hand getting to sleep.
how_to_use: Unwrap each single-use mask just before use. Slip loops over ears and pull mask down over the eyes. Air-activated, within no time at all these will give off a relaxing scent and warmth that can be worn to bed and while you sleep.
ingredient: Iron powder, Essence of Jasmine

name: Sun Bum Original SPF 50 Sunscreen Spray
description: Protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays while moisturising and delicately scenting skin, the Original SPF 50 Sunscreen Spray gives an immediately dry touch – absorbing quickly so that you never feel greasy. Incredibly easy to use via its continuous spray nozzle, this seamless formula is even enriched with nourishing vitamin E. A powerful antioxidant that works to neutralise free radicals, vitamin E prevents skin from falling victim to dehydration, depleting collagen stores and premature ageing. Also water resistant for 80 minutes (that’s a heck of a lot of surf time), the Original SPF 50 Sunscreen Spray is brimming with the Sun Bum Original Scent, which – as word on the street has it – smells like summer, bottled.
how_to_use: Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply: After 80 minutes of swimming or sweating. Immediately after towel drying. At least every 2 hours.

description: If you’re looking for the best of the best, you’ve come to the right place. This is the ultimate skin protector for reactive skin to keep it safe from UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA rays. This clever tinted fluid feels weightless on the skin and, even better, won’t mess up your make up with weeping eyes! In case you needed more persuasion, this high protection fluid is non-sticky, non-greasy and ultra-resistant to sand, water and sweat. Ticking all our boxes and more, this is heading straight into our holiday haul *adds to bag*.

name: Sol de Janeiro Beija Flor Elasti-Cream 75ml
description: Need a body cream that does it all? The Beija Flor Elasti-Cream has got you — and your body! — covered. Available in this travel-friendly 75ml tub, this rich skin saviour is brimming with elasticity-boosting elements via cacay oil (a gentle retinol alternative) and plant-based collagen to perk up and hydrate skin. Lather this plant squalane-infused cream all over and reap the highly-moisturising benefits, especially in delicate areas like your neck and chest that are prone to moisture loss. Perfect for everyday use, notice as your skin transforms into a velvety-smooth version of itself as the aforementioned collagen and cacay oil get to work on boosting cell turnover — that’s right, you can add youth-boosting merits to its long list of accolades. Restorative, replenishing and a dream to apply, expect your skin to drink up this cocktail of good skin care stuff. Trust us, you won’t be able to keep your hands off yourself.

The formula is water, sweat and sand resistant for long-lasting, ultra-high protection. Designed with comfort in mind, the cream hydrates skin without feeling greasy. name: Tan-Luxe THE FACE Light/Medium 10ml
description: A super-cute travel size version of TAN-LUXE’s The Face, these luxurious drops will take lifeless, lacklustre complexions to the beach and back – imparting an effortless, natural-looking glow when added to your existing skin care regime. Enriched with raspberry seed oil, vitamin E and aloe vera, every droplet of this miracle formula bronzes, boosts and fortifies skin’s fabric. A million miles away from the tell-tale ‘tangoed’ look of so many traditional fake tans, The Face Travel Size comes in two shades – ‘Light to Medium’ and ‘Medium to Dark’ – to guarantee a realistic, streak-free finish. Like a sun-drenched holiday in a bottle, it delivers even, luminous colour that can easily be customised by adding extra drops to your chosen skin care product. No smell. No fuss. No drama. Just glow and go.
how_to_use: Prep Be sure to cleanse and wash your face before application. Apply Mix 1-4 drops to your usual moisturiser, serum or face oil in the palm of your hand and apply evenly over the face. Additional drops of the product will add depth of colour and glow to the final result. Wash hands thoroughly after application. Maintain Gently exfoliate skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Dihydroxyacetone, Alcohol Denat (Alcohol), Glycerin, Erythrulose, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hydrolysed Silk, Caramel, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 80, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Bu-Tylphenyl Methylpropional, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzoic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Phenoxyethanol. Paraben Free

name: Bondi Sands Reusable Application Mitt
description: The secret to a seamless tan, Bondi Sands' Application Mitt is the perfect pairing for any of their iconic self-tanning range. Both washable and reusable, the soft mitt effortlessly - not to mention, evenly - distributes your formula of choice to deliver a streak-free, flawless tan, all while keeping hands stain free. Unlike your hands that absorb the tan, this essential tool will help you nail the application without leaving your hands over-tanned. Plus, the rounded mitt is a much better shape from reaching the intricate contours of your body! Suitable for use with foams, lotions and mists, this a must-have in any faux-glow fanatics arsenal...
how_to_use: Apply Bondi Sands self-tanning products to the plain side of your self-tanning mitt. Rub onto the skin in a circular motion. After use rinse mitt with warm water. Hands will remain perfectly clean. Care: rinse your Mitt with warm water and allow to dry thoroughly after every use.

name: Embryolisse Cicalisse SOS Restorative Cream 40ml
description: Rushing straight to the rescue of stressed-out complexions, Embryolisse’s Cicalisse SOS Restorative Cream helps to bolster the skin’s repair processes – soothing irritation and reducing any redness. Powered by 3% acexamic acid – shown to accelerate skin’s rehabilitative processes – alongside sodium hyaluronate to bolster moisture reservoirs and keep skin plumped and dewy, this calming and comforting cream brings relief to inflamed or reactive complexions. A thirst-quenching drink for dry, compromised skin (it’s perfect for taking the sting out of sunburn), this tube is a cabinet must-have, quickly counteracting any itchiness or dryness, while helping to heal superficial abrasions, scrapes, stings, scabs or post-wax ouches.
how_to_use: Apply morning and evening to clean, dry skin. This can be applied to face, body and lips.

name: St. Tropez Express Bronzing Mousse 200ml
description: Calling all glow-getters! Got a last-minute event, constantly on-the-glow or if the sun has suddenly surprised you and you want a tan to match, this is the answer to your glowy prayers. St.Tropez’s Self Tan Express Advanced Bronzing Mousse is a fast-acting mousse that develops into a sun-kissed glow after just one hour, a medium glow tan in just two hours or a deep, dark bronze after three! Allowing you to control the depth and time spent waiting for a gorgeously glowy tan, this intelligent formula is a must-have for faux glow aficionados and learners alike. Like all St.Tropez products, this Self Tan Express Advanced Bronzing Mousse is incredibly easy-to-use and guarantees and flawless and streak-free application that is long-lasting, scentless and is also vegan-friendly.
how_to_use: Step 1: Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Immediately prior to application, moisturise any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles and feet. Step 2: For best results, apply using our Tan Applicator Mitt in long sweeping motions, starting at the ankles and working your way up. Then for your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. Ensure all areas are covered before lightly gliding any excess tan from the Mitt over your hands and feet. Step 3: Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. Step 4: Allow 1, 2 or 3 hours depending on your desired shade, before showering to reveal your developed tan. Your tan will then continue to develop for up to 8 hours. Step 5: To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturise daily, exfoliate regularly and reapply as desired.
ingredient: Aqua (Water/Eau), Dihydroxyacetone, Caramel, Propylene Glycol, Ethoxydiglycol, Glycerin, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Decyl Glucoside, Phenoxyethanol, Melanin, Parfum (Fragrance), Dimethyl Isosorbide, Cetyl Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium Metabisulfite, Ethylhexylglycerin, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Eugenol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Geraniol, Coumarin, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hydroxycitronellal, Citral, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol, Amyl Cinnamal, Farnesol, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, CI 14700 (Red 4), CI 42090 (Blue 1), CI 19140 (Yellow 5)

name: Weleda Skin Food (30ml)
description: An undisputed hero of the beautysphere, Weleda’s Skin Food boasts a blend of replenishing, natural and organic ingredients to quickly repair and revitalise dry, rough or stressed, scaly skin. Creating a silky cocoon between skin and the drying effects of the elements, this rich – and we mean really rich – cream is a true ‘desert island’ essential; jam-packed with lanolin, beeswax and glycerin, alongside sweet almond and sunflower oils to help soften and fortify skin as they boost moisture levels, this supplements barrier function to ward against water loss. A godsend for gardeners, this quickly conditions the gnarliest palms, while the medley of antibacterial rosemary, conditioning calendula and calming chamomile protect and help to cherish elbows, knees, feet… even faces. A handbag hero – as well as a pocket-sized sidekick – keep this cute, grass green tube within reach at all times to replenish and reassure compromised skin in an instant.
how_to_use: Apply generously several times a day, wherever your skin needs extra help – especially on rough, dry areas like hands, feet and elbows.

name: Aesop Resurrection Rinse-Free Hand Mist 50ml
description: An alcohol-based mist to quickly cleanse your hands when water’s inaccessible, Aesop’s Resurrection Rinse-Free Hand Mist is a convenient, on-the-go option to target insidious germs and leave skin fresh and fragrant. With moisturising saccharide isomerate and aloe vera, the non-drying formula targets the ‘bad guys’ without stripping skin of its oils, so it’s less prone to chapping and cracking when endlessly cleansed. Swift to evaporate with no greasy residue, this boasts the distinctive – and heavenly – ‘Resurrection’ scent; a blend of mandarin, rosemary leaf and cedar, to give you a lift and re-centre your senses whenever you spritz. It's the hand sanitiser of dreams so ensure you have one for your pocket and one by the door so you don't skip the critical, 'disinfect step'.
how_to_use: Spray liberally onto the hands as required and allow to dry.

name: Caudalie Vinosun Very High Protection Lightweight Cream SPF50+ 40ml
description: Featuring a deceptively lightweight texture with zero compromise on protection or the planet (thanks to a formula that’s highly biodegradable and non-toxic for the marine ecosystem), Caudalie Vinosun Protect Very High Protection Lightweight Cream SPF 50+ is the ideal final step in your morning skin care routine. Backed up by Caudalie’s famous grapevine-sourced antioxidant polyphenols, this high protection sunscreen shields skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays and pollution. Fragrance-free (making it ideal for even sensitive skin types) and virtually invisible on all skin tones, this super hydrating formula floods thirsty complexions with moisture for a dewy finish — and no greasy residue.
how_to_use: Apply every day, even when you’re staying indoors. Apply as the final step in your skin care routine, right after, or instead of your moisturiser and before your make up.

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream Refill 240ml
description: Brazilian 'bum bums' are famously brilliant, so whether it's a bottom, a butt or la derriére, your behind will reap the benefits of this tightening, moisturising miracle cream. This refill is designed to slip easily into your empty Brazilian Bum Bum Cream jar. Rich in South America's secret ingredients, a naturally nourishing, hyper-hydrating blend of cupuaçu butter, açaí and coconut oil provide the background to the star of the show: guaraná. A native Amazonian plant, this fruit contains one of the most potent forms of caffeine on the planet (with almost five times more caffeine than coffee), giving your bottom the ultimate boost and stimulating circulation to keep it super smooth and tantalisingly toned. With a light, silky texture, the cream is great all over the body (bum bum and beyond), absorbing quickly without feeling greasy or oily. Blissfully scented with a sweet, nutty fragrance (believe us... this stuff smells incredible) and bestowing skin with a subtle shimmer, Sol de Janeiro's Brazilian Bum Bum Cream will transport you to the beaches of Rio and grant you all the confidence of a Carnival dancer.
how_to_use: Massage in a circular motion to create warmth. Start with your bum bum, but you won’t be able to resist moving on to your tummy, arms, legs and all your beautiful features. To insert the refill, wash, rinse and thoroughly dry your original jar and lid (it’s dishwasher safe). Drop the pod into the jar, then peel off the pod's seal. Screw on your original lid.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Ultra-Light SPF50+ Sun Protection Spray 200ml
description: Utilising a unique filtering system known as ‘Mexoplex’ you can breathe easy knowing that your skin is safe in the hands of our favourite no-nonsense pharmacy brand La Roche-Posay. Reinforce your skin from UVA, UVB and Infrared rays with this exceptionally high, broad-spectrum and photostable sun spray. If you’re prone to sun sensitivity and prickly heat then this is the SPF for you. You’ll find a high PPD (Persistent Pigment Darkening) factor across every offering in the Anthelios range, making sure you get the best possible UVA protection for a more youthful and even skin tone. Protecting your skin from external aggressors is the pure and protected ‘Thermal Spring Water’ that’s unique to this pharmacy brand, proven to nourish and soothe. Tested, re-tested and tested again for its mildness on sensitive skin, this hypoallergenic and dermatologist recommended sunscreen is fulfilling all our summer holiday needs. Water-resistant, nourishing and soothing on sensitive skin? What more could we ask for!
how_to_use: Apply 30 minutes before exposure and re-apply frequently and generously every two hours to maintain protection especially after swimming, perspiring or towelling. Shake well before use. Avoid exposure to the sun during the hottest hours of the day. Keep children under 3 out of the sun and ensure they are wearing a hat, t-shirt and sunglasses.

name: Paula's Choice 2% BHA Body Spot Exfoliant (210ml)
description: Tired of rough and bumpy blemish-prone skin? This 2% BHA Body Smoothing Spot Exfoliant from PAULA'S CHOICE unites salicylic acid with a cocktail of antioxidant-rich ingredients as well as chamomile flower extract to not only slough away dead and dull skin cells to reveal brighten and smoother skin but to also protect skin from harmful free radicals and pollution. Simply massage in circular motions onto your area of concern daily to see results. Salicylic acid not only helps shed dead skin from the surface but also within your pores, making it an efficacious treatment for breakouts and blackheads. Meanwhile, a cocktail of vitamin E and melon fruit extract helps to protect skin from the sun's rays, pollution and harmful free radicals while - finally - the addition of chamomile, green tea and willow herb extracts help to soothe for a beautifully calm and balanced finish.
how_to_use: Dispense a small amount into the palm of your hand and apply to clean skin. May be used daily for all-over smoothing and exfoliation, or applied to blemished or rough, bumpy areas of the skin as needed. For daytime use, be sure to follow with a sunscreen. Allergic to aspirin (acetylsalicylate)? Do not use this product as it contains salicylic acid (BHA).
