name: Ultra Violette Super Supreme Screen Hydrating Facial Skinscreen SPF50+ 125ml
description: Fulfilling your streamlined routine desires, Supreme Screen is a moisturiser, primer and high-level SPF rolled into one multi-tasking staple. This lightweight cream has you protected from the solar spectrum of UV rays, with a hydrating, satin finish that creates a smooth canvas for make up (although looks equally as good when worn alone). The formula is packed with Australian Kakadu plum (rich in skin-brightening antioxidant vitamin C) and pentavitin, a plant extract offering up to 72 hours of hydration. Great for dry, normal and combination skin types, Supreme Screen also shields against infrared, visible and blue light – all while leaving no white cast. After an SPF that does it all? Look no further.
how_to_use: Apply daily, even when you’re staying indoors (UVA rays pass through clouds and windows). Apply generously as the final step in your skin care routine, right after, or instead of your moisturiser and before your make up.

name: NAYDAYA Vagina Victory Oil
description: Formulated with plenty of soothing, collagen-boosting ingredients, the Vagina Victory Oil is designed to nourish and treat intimate skin that may need some extra relief as a result of hormonal or environmental changes. This nourishing formula is filled with rejuvenating oils and butter that your skin will drink up. Pomegranate is renowned for being a powerful elixir that, thanks to omega-5-rich fatty acids protects dry, thinning skin and restores elasticity to vaginal tissue. Vitamin E helps improve skin's smoothness, builds natural collagen and locks moisture into the skin. Finally, there's mango butter, an effective natural emollient, and coconut oil, a hydration hero that helps to rebuild your skin's naturally protective moisture barrier. Victory is yours!
how_to_use: General Use for hormonal changes: Apply 3-4 drops of oil or as needed to fingertips, gently massage into intimate areas including perineal, inner and outer labia. For best results use daily, or twice per day to improve elasticity, and reduce dryness. Pregnancy Use: To use as a prenatal massage oil; apply 3-4 drops daily from 34 weeks of pregnancy. Post Pregnancy Use: As above, apply 3-4 drops daily, (we recommend waiting until stitches are healed, and wounds are closed)
ingredient: Improved formula with added oils for extra hydration. Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Raphanus Sativus (Radish) Seed Extract, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed) Seed Oil, *Cocos Nucifera (Virgin Coconut) Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, *Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract.*Certified Organic Ingredients.

name: Sol de Janeiro Bom Dia Bright Cream 75ml
description: It's not just SZA who sees good days in your future... Scented like paradise - no exaggeration - Sol de Janeiro's Bom Dia Bright Cream is here to help you indulge in a skin-smoothing self-care moment with its nourishing blend of cupuaçu butter and fruit AHAs. Designed to help you glow from head to toe, this decadently rich body cream will have your skin soft to the touch in no time at all. It's enriched with Amazon's answer to shea butter - cupuaçu butter - to lock in moisture and boost elasticity, as your skin quickly and easily absorbs it. A duo of alpha hydroxy acids derived from mango and banana fruits then gently exfoliate to smooth rough patches, leaving remarkably soft, radiant skin in its stead. As if that wasn't enough, vitamin C helps to support collagen production and visibly brightens, diminishing the look of dark spots. We've never been so ready for bare-leg weather...
how_to_use: Smooth on daily, morning or night, for moisturizing and retexturizing benefits all over. For speedier results, use 2 times a day on areas prone to ingrown hairs due to hair removal (underarms, bikini line, legs, etc.), as well as bumpy, rough spots (upper arms, thighs, and bum bum).

name: Limited Edition Sol de Janeiro Rio Radiance Body Cream 75ml
description: Lacklustre, dull skin? We don’t know her! Sol de Janeiro’s Limited Edition Rio Radiance Body Cream has you covered from top-to-toe with its fast-absorbing formula. Instantly quenching the complexion in a moisture-kissed, glow-inducing veil, the body butter rids all signs of dryness to keep you feeling your best self, year-round. Introducing its new summer-inspired scent, the cream captures the warmth of the Rio sunshine, with luscious notes of leite de coco, sun-soaked sands and creamy vanilla. Featuring carrot seed oil, squalane and mica, the formula deeply nourishes, revealing a fresh-from-the-beach dew with a seriously supple finish. In Sol we trust to bring the vacay vibes to our lives, and this heavenly body butter stays true to the brand’s feel-good, ultra-sensorial ethos.
how_to_use: Massage in a circular motion to help promote optimal absorption and circulation. Use all over your body for the ultimate glow.

name: Sun Bum Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Spray
description: Protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays while moisturising and delicately scenting skin, the Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Spray gives an immediately dry touch – absorbing quickly so that you never feel greasy. Incredibly easy to use via its continuous spray nozzle, this seamless formula is even enriched with nourishing vitamin E. A powerful antioxidant that works to neutralise free radicals, vitamin E prevents skin from falling victim to dehydration, depleting collagen stores and premature ageing. Also water resistant for 80 minutes (that’s a heck of a lot of surf time), the Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Spray is brimming with the Sun Bum Original Scent, which – as word on the street has it – smells like summer, bottled.
how_to_use: Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply: After 80 minutes of swimming or sweating. Immediately after towel drying. At least every 2 hours.

name: Sol de Janeiro Bum Bum Body Scrub 220g
description: A product the world has been waiting for, Sol de Janeiro’s Bum Bum Body Scrub has landed and it’s fair to say, the beautysphere’s in raptures… With the signature scent of its nourishing sibling, this polish eliminates scales to leave limbs silky soft (and your ‘Bum Bum’ as smooth as a peach)! With sugar and salt to effectively slough away dead cells, alongside Amazonian guarana seeds to scrub and firm your skin to leave it supple, the medley of coconut, açai and cupuaçu butters help to nourish and condition skin from top-to-toe. Who needs clothes?
how_to_use: Massage all over damp skin in the shower. Follow with lashing of Brazilian Bum Bum Cream to lock in precious moisture and envelop you with Sol de Janeiro's distinctive, Cheirosa '62 scent.

name: HUM Nutrition Flatter Me Healthy Digestion Supplement (60 Vegan Capsules, 30 Days)
description: Changes in our lifestyle, diet and stress levels can be detrimental to the normal function of our digestive system, prompting wellbeing bugbears like bloating and discomfort to arise; enter HUM Nutrition's Flatter Me. With a 30 day supply of vegan capsules, this carefully crafted formula is designed to supplement the enzyme levels within your body to improve digestion and breakdown foods, in turn, easing bloating and gas. The comprehensive proprietary blend is made up of 18 full-spectrum enzymes, as well as a herbal blend of ginger, fennel and peppermint, to support all major phases of digestion: optimising the digestion of protein, carbohydrates, fibre, lactose and fats and encouraging nutrient absorption. Our wellness routine has been waiting for this one!
how_to_use: Take one capsule twice daily before your main meals. Results should be immediate.

Herbal Blend: Ginger Powder (rhizome), Fennel Powder (seed), Peppermint Powder (leaf). Other vegetable capsule (cellulose & water) and rice bran. name: Lanolips The Original 101 Ointment
description: A must-have for anyone with dry skin, chapped lips or for those wanting to defy dreaded ‘winter skin’, The Original 101 Ointment is the Lanolips’ original cult classic and the best place to start when discovering the brand. It’s enriched with pure lanolin, which has a unique molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin oils to restore moisture. Intensely hydrating, nourishing and 100% natural, this rescue ointment has 101 uses, providing immediate relief from everything from dry spots to sore cuticles and nasal passages. Dermatologically tested, this multitasking hero is vegetarian and baby friendly, cruelty-free and is free from ‘nasties’, making it an absolute no brainer. Want it to go further? Why not mix it in with your favourite daily hydrator to supercharge its skin-replenishing effects?
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between fingers or apply directly onto the lips and skin. Use generously and keep below 25˚C.

name: Paula's Choice Resist Youth-Extending Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF 50
description: Ideal for oily, combination and breakout-prone skin, PAULA’S CHOICE’s Resist Youth-Extending Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF 50 protects skin from the damaging effects of the sun without feeling heavy or congesting your pores. This weightless moisturiser fuses broad spectrum SPF 50 with nourishing antioxidants to promote a more youthful visage and protect your skin from environmental damage. A cocktail of antioxidants, including green tea extract, helps to fend against free radicals (from sunlight and pollution alike) and calm your skin. One of the most widely used UVA filters in the world, avobenzone is a synthetic sunscreen ingredient that lends the blend its broad-spectrum sun protection. We know a daily staple when we see one...
how_to_use: Apply as the last step in your morning skin care routine. Allow a moment to dry before applying make up.

name: Bondi Sands Everyday Gradual Tanning Milk 375ml
description: Whether you're new to tanning, want to achieve a gradual glow or you're hoping to maintain your tan with daily top-ups and hydration, Bondi Sands Everyday Gradual Tanning Milk is a must-try. Enjoy a year-round tan with Bondi Sands innovative dual action Everyday Gradual Tanning Milk. Enriched with aloe vera and vitamin E for healthy, glowing skin it glides on effortlessly for a long-lasting golden tan every single time. Perfect for fuss-free application, this gradually builds day by day – making it perfect for maintaining darker faux glows over a longer time period too. It's a must swap if you're wanting to enliven your complexion and already moisturise daily – trust us!
how_to_use: For an even, streak-free tan, use the Bondi Sands exfoliation mitt to ensure your skin is clean and free from any moisturisers. Push pump firmly, applying tanning milk evenly onto the skin in a smooth, circular motion. Apply lightly to hands, elbows, knees and ankles. Wait until skin is touch dry before dressing. Use milk daily as an everyday moisturiser to keep skin hydrated and golden. Wash hands after use.

name: AMELIORATE Exfoliating Body Mitt
description: Designed for people with very dry, dehydrated skin – but brilliant on all skin types – AMELIORATE’s Exfoliating Body Mitt will transform your skin from top to toe. Used on dry skin before bathing, this miraculous mitt is made from an innovative fabric weave that is gentler than a synthetic or natural loofah, yet effective enough to sweep away dead skin cells to reveal softer, smoother, healthier-looking skin. Perfect for kick-starting the exfoliation process, the mitt allows subsequent products to work more effectively and helps to unblock hair follicles to minimise pesky, uncomfortable ingrown hairs. It’s also brilliant for treating Keratosis Pilaris – a remarkably common condition which causes skin to appear rough, red and bumpy due to an excess production of keratin, which results in the development of little ‘plugs’ or goose bumps. Use it on dry skin and prepare to witness the transformation…
how_to_use: DIRECTIONS: Use on DRY skin before showering or bathing, using firm circular movements. For progressive improvement in skin texture and condition follow with AMELIORATE Transforming Body Lotion. PRODUCT CARE: Rinse regularly by hand or on a 30° cycle and dry naturally. Due to fabric wear we recommend replacing the mitt at least every 6 months for optimum efficiency. WARNINGS: Do not use on broken, infected, damaged or irritated skin. Not recommended for facial use. Not recommended for children.

name: The Ordinary Marine Hyaluronics 30ml
description: If you love the heroic hydrating power of hyaluronic acid but want a lightweight alternative, look no further than The Ordinary’s Marine Hyaluronics. Starring weightless marine-derived water reservoirs, the formula attracts and holds moisture just like hyaluronic acid – but feels lighter in texture when you apply it. Designed to be a lightweight alternative to The Ordinary’s {Hyaluronic Acid + B5}, this formula also contains extracts from skin-friendly marine bacteria, Hawaiian red algae, Glycoproteins from Antarctic marine sources, micro-filtered blue-green algae and several health-supporting amino acids, all of which work together to offer additional moisture and age-defying effects. Simply apply a few drops of this before creams or heavier formulas to supercharge your hydration weightlessly.
how_to_use: Apply a few drops to face AM and PM before creams.

name: Tan-Luxe THE FACE Medium/Dark 10ml
description: A super-cute travel size version of TAN-LUXE’s The Face, these luxurious drops will take lifeless, lacklustre complexions to the beach and back – imparting an effortless, natural-looking glow when added to your existing skin care regime. Enriched with raspberry seed oil, vitamin E and aloe vera, every droplet of this miracle formula bronzes, boosts and fortifies skin’s fabric. A million miles away from the tell-tale ‘tangoed’ look of so many traditional fake tans, The Face Travel Size comes in two shades – ‘Light to Medium’ and ‘Medium to Dark’ – to guarantee a realistic, streak-free finish. Like a sun-drenched holiday in a bottle, it delivers even, luminous colour that can easily be customised by adding extra drops to your chosen skin care product. No smell. No fuss. No drama. Just glow and go.
how_to_use: Prep Be sure to cleanse and wash your face before application. Apply Mix 1-4 drops to your usual moisturiser, serum or face oil in the palm of your hand and apply evenly over the face. Additional drops of the product will add depth of colour and glow to the final result. Wash hands thoroughly after application. Maintain Gently exfoliate skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow.

name: Lanolips Tinted SPF30 Balm - Perfect Nude 12.5g
description: Part lip balm, part lip gloss, Lanolips Tinted Balm SPF30 is a 3-in-1, multi-tasking treatment available in four hues to enhance your natural lip colour while also deeply hydrating and nourishing parched skin. Pick from ‘Rose’, a sheer pink tint that gives lips a healthy glow; ‘Rhubarb’, a sheer fruity tint that deepens your natural lip colour; ‘Perfect Nude’, a sheer universal nude and ‘Red Apple’, a sheer vivid red that brightens your natural lip colour. A multi-award-winning balm that also boasts a broad spectrum SPF 30 to protect lips from the sun’s damaging rays, this protects as it enhances their colour and hydrates.

name: The Nue Co. Growth Phase Hair Supplements (90 Capsules)
description: Ever felt like your hair just... stopped... growing? Enter: The Nue Co.'s Growth Phase! Introducing this full-spectrum supplement for stagnant strands that is designed to support nutrition deficiencies, hormonal fluctuations and stress. Think of this as the drug-free 'oil' that'll help keep the cogs turning and hair flowing. Taking a 360 holistic approach to better hair care, Growth Phase works from the inside out! Promoting longer, fuller hair with growth stimulating ingredients like proteins and peptides, you can add some much need pep to your hair care routine. It gets better(!)... rest assured that your tresses are being pumped with a whole bunch of essential minerals, micronutrients and vitamins. Boasting noticeable results within just 12 weeks, you'll definitely be the mane attraction in every room.
how_to_use: Take three capsules in the morning with food.
ingredient: BiovaBio™, Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Vitamin K, Thiamin, Riboflavin, Niacin, Vitamin B6, Folate, Vitamin B12, Biotin, Pantothenic Acid, Iodine (from Kelp), Horsetail Plant Extract, Reishi Mushroom, Eleuthero Root Extract. (Contains egg.)

name: Biossance 100% Squalane Oil 100ml
description: Celebrating their core ingredient and bottling a bank of nourishing properties, the 100% Squalane Oil is a heaven-sent hydrating essential. This ultra-moisturising formula encourages the natural cell renewal processes within your skin while sealing in essential hydration for lasting softness. Designed to mimic squalene - a natural molecule present in our skin that diminishes over time – this moisturising ingredient comes from 100% plant-based, renewable sugarcane and enhances elasticity as well as protecting your skin. Spoiled for ways in which to work it into your routine, here's a few we love: smooth over face and body for instant (and featherweight!) hydration; as an intensive moisture mask for stressed-out lengths; layered over lips to battle dryness and prime before colour; to grant a healthy-looking glow any and everywhere; even as an ultra-soothing shave oil. What's more, in a clinical study, this incredible oil was seen to accelerate cell turnover five days faster than that of non-treated skin! We are obsessed...
how_to_use: For Face: Rub a small amount together between hands to warm. Pat gently onto face, neck and décolleté. For Body: Massage a few pumps onto skin immediately after showering, paying close attention to areas needing extra hydration like arms, legs, and knees. For Hair: Rub a small amount between hands and smooth through dry or wet hair to add shine and tame flyaways, split ends and frizz.
ingredient: Squalane Oil.

name: Ultra Violette Clean Screen Fragrance Free Sensitive Facial Skinscreen SPF 30
description: Developed, with fussy, easily-irritated and sensitive complexions in mind, the Clean Screen Fragrance Free Sensitive Facial Skinscreen SPF 30 is perfect for blemish prone and combination skin—protecting you from the sun’s perilous rays without any artificial fragrances or alcohol. Impressively lightweight and in a refreshing gel texture, this gentle sunscreen boasts SPF30 protection and a no-fuss, natural-looking finish that won’t mess with your make up (or skin!). Making short work of redness with its soothing capabilities, titanium dioxide is what gives this formula its broad-spectrum protection, while plant-derived pentavitin pumps the complexion with moisture. Think: plump, juicy skin with a side of satisfied glee. You’re welcome.
how_to_use: Apply every day, even when you’re staying indoors. Apply as the final step in your skincare routine, right after or instead of your moisturiser, before your make up. We recommend at least five pumps to cover your face and ears.

description: Protection, hydration and a golden glow? Count us in. Coco & Eve's Tan Boosting Anti-Ageing Body Oil is the ultimate multi-purpose addition to your summer beauty routine, defending against UVA and UVB rays while enhancing your natural tan. Powered by a biomimetic peptide, this body oil encourages a natural-looking radiance for that fresh-off-the-beach look. The lightweight formula offers antioxidant benefits too, helping to protect against the effects of photodamage, while a skin-loving elixir of vitamin E, watermelon seed oil and apricot kernel wraps the body in moisture. Suitable for all skin types, the oil leaves skin feeling silky-smooth, with not a hint of greasiness in sight.

name: Sol de Janeiro Bom Dia Bright Cream 240ml
description: It's not just SZA who sees good days in your future... Scented like paradise - no exaggeration - Sol de Janeiro's Bom Dia Bright Cream is here to help you indulge in a skin-smoothing self-care moment with its nourishing blend of cupuaçu butter and fruit AHAs. Designed to help you glow from head to toe, this decadently rich body cream will have your skin soft to the touch in no time at all. It's enriched with Amazon's answer to shea butter - cupuaçu butter - to lock in moisture and boost elasticity, as your skin quickly and easily absorbs it. A duo of alpha hydroxy acids derived from mango and banana fruits then gently exfoliate to smooth rough patches, leaving remarkably soft, radiant skin in its stead. As if that wasn't enough, vitamin C helps to support collagen production and visibly brightens, diminishing the look of dark spots. We've never been so ready for bare-leg weather...
how_to_use: Smooth on daily, morning or night, for moisturizing and retexturizing benefits all over. For speedier results, use 2 times a day on areas prone to ingrown hairs due to hair removal (underarms, bikini line, legs, etc.), as well as bumpy, rough spots (upper arms, thighs, and bum bum).

name: The INKEY List Polyglutamic Acid Dewy Sunscreen SPF30 50ml
description: Finding the perfect sunscreen for you can be a hard task but here to make lightwork of the skin care commandment you dare not skip, the Polyglutamic Acid Dewy Sunscreen SPF 30 sends waves of optimal hydration to parched pores and leaves an undetectable finish. Adored for their power to attract and lock in moisture for a smooth finish, polyglutamic acid, glycerin and squalane band together to form the ultimate 8% hydration, can-dew trio. A broad spectrum SPF 30 SPF sunscreen that provides UVA and UVB protection, this non-greasy and non-piling formula makes the perfect, universally flattering base for make up or bare skin days, for all skin types and tones.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Use as the last step in your AM skincare routine, after moisturising. On cleansed skin, apply liberally to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. We recommend applying the product to 3 fingers first to get the right amount (this equates to about 3/4 of a teaspoon). Reapply frequently, particularly if perspiring, swimming or towelling. Protect this product from excessive heat and direct sunlight.

name: Megababe The Geo Deo Multi-Mineral Daily Deodorant 75g
description: It’s time to introduce your underarms to the mineral-forward blue stick that keeps odour and perspiration at bay all day, and without leaving your pits in turmoil. Scented with a hint of crisp mint, eucalyptus and cedarwood, this new odour-fighter is the latest in the line of skin care deodorants from Megababe that promise to care for your skin the way it deserves. Formulated with a reduced amount of baking soda compared to other deodorants, the Geo Deo is then blended with zinc oxide, kaolin clay and magnesium hydroxide which all work to fight odour, all the while ensuring your skin stays free from irritation. Even better, an optimised dose of plant oils and shea butter work to hydrate and replenish this delicate skin, after all, your pits need a little love too. For the sensitive skin sufferers out there, a soothing blend of colloidal oatmeal, seabuckthorn and chicory root work in harmony to keep your underarms healthy and skin barrier strong and resilient.
how_to_use: Apply daily as often as needed to clean, dry skin. For a softer application, hold against skin for a few seconds to warm up stick before swiping. Allow 2 weeks for pits to adjust from a traditional antiperspirant. Pro tip: Be sure to twist off the dome prior to first use to prevent product from breaking (instead of lifting straight off).

name: Sun Bum SPF50 Face Lotion 88ml
description: For everyday living, the SPF50 Face Lotion is a staple – protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays while nourishing skin. You can also use it all over your body, making it an holiday handbag essential to save on space. The OG formula that the sunseekers at Sun Bum actually use every single day, this is enriched with vitamin E. A powerful antioxidant that works to neutralise free radicals, vitamin E prevents skin from falling victim to dehydration, depleting collagen stores and premature ageing. Also water resistant for 80 minutes (that’s a heck of a lot of surf time), the SPF50 Face Lotion perfect for different skin tones as it blends seamlessly into skin with an invisible and matte finish.

The geranium leaf oil soothes and calms the skin, mandarin and bergamot oils are included for their ability to purify and disinfect. name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Age Correct SPF50+ Sun Cream 50ml

name: L'Occitane Almond Supple Skin Oil 100ml
description: Teeming with almond oil, this lightweight, but deeply nourishing, body oil helps to improve the appearance of your treasured skin while leaving it softer and smoother. A match made in oil heaven, L'Occitane's Almond Supple Skin Oil does exactly what it says on the bottle. Almond oil and camelina oil unite in this nourishing bottle of goodness to deliver a comforting dose of omegas 3 and 6 for a nourishing, replenishing dose of hydration. Ideal for tight, dry and lacklustre limbs, this melts into your skin to leave a satin-soft finish and all while letting its delectable almond scent wash over your senses.

name: Megababe Bust Dust Anti-Boob Sweat Powder 85g
description: Skin-soothing and talc-free, this is your secret weapon against the dreaded grey t-shirt marks that usually keep your arms firmly by your sides…you can finally wave your hands in the air like you just don’t care and without the fear of saturated clothing! Absorbing moisture in an instant, this body powder can be used from top-to-toe to keep sweat from saturating your shoes and seeping into your favourite item of clothing. Lightly scented with lavender and a skin-soothing infusion of aloe and chamomile you can shake away sweat stains and get back to enjoying your hot gal summer uninterrupted. Now available in a full size 170g and travel-friendly 48g offering, you can stay sweat-free no matter where you are.
how_to_use: Shake well & apply directly to skin, or sprinkle inside clothes/shoes. For use wherever body sweat is an issue! Best on concealed areas as powder is lightly visible on skin.
ingredient: Zea Mays (Corn Starch),*Sodium Bicarbonate, Maranta Arundinacea (Arrowroot) Powder,*Kaolin Clay, Lavendula Hybrida (Lavandin) Oil,*Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Tocopherol, Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Oil. *Certified Organic.

name: BeYou Monthly Period Patches (5 Pack)
description: An incredibly intelligent plaster to help ease your period pain and cramps, these BeYou Monthly Patches are 100% natural and made from steam-distilled eucalyptus and peppermint-derived menthol that create a 'cooling tingle' on application. Long-lasting and slow-releasing, each patch slowly delivers a cramp-numbing sensation to skin over 12 hours. The menthol and eucalyptus scent also provides a light, invigorating aroma that will help uplift you. Simply apply to the area of concern, day or night, you can apply them to your back, abdomen and even to your legs (it can take up to 30 minutes for them to start working) and then get dressed and carry on with your day. Incredibly discreet, easy to apply and remove (they don't hurt like normal plasters!), you'll wonder how you ever went without these before - watch out trusty hot water bottle, BeYou Patches are coming for your title. Finally, they're also vegan, cruelty-free and biodegradable too! What's not to love?
how_to_use: Step 1: Peel off the protective liner from the cuts in the middle. If you can, try not to touch the sticky back of the patch as it may reduce how effectively it sticks to your skin. Step 2: Place the patch uniformly over the area you want the cooling effect. You can apply your patch wherever makes you feel comfortable. Pro Tip: It can take 20-30mins before you start feeling the cooling sensation. Step 3: After using, peel the patch off slowly and throw in the bin! If you're worried about hair, just use some warm water to help! We always advise taking the patch off in the shower, once it has been wet and the adhesive has loosened up a little.
ingredient: Mentha x piperata (Menthol Oil), Eucalyptus globulus (Eucalyptus Oil), Tracaganth Gum Rosin Ester, Guar Gum Rosin Ester, Mineral Oil

name: Ultra Violette Extreme Screen Hydrating Body & Hand Skinscreen SPF50+
description: When the sun’s perilous rays strike, make sure you’re protecting your limbs and hands via the Extreme Screen Hydrating Body & Hand SPF50. Enveloping skin in SPF50+ with a dash of (well, four hours of, to be precise) water and sweat resistance to boot, this versatile formula gives a shimmery sheen, smells delightful and is incredibly hydrating. Plant-derived pentavitin pumps skin with moisture (think: plump, juicy skin with a side of satisfied glee), aloe vera soothes and vitamin E nourishes while fighting against pesky free radicals—the the DNA-damaging environmental aggressors that attack cells, breaking down collagen and accelerating the skin-ageing process.
how_to_use: Every single day, even if you’re only kinda going out in the sun. Slather on a solid dollop after your shower for your daily dose of glow, hydration and sun protection, and remember – you want at least 5ml per limb, so don’t be stingy!
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Homosalate, Octocrylene, Cera Alba/Beeswax/Cire d'abeille, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Cetearyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Ceteareth-20, Fragrance/Parfum, Benzyl Alcohol, Carbomer, Hydroxyacetophenone, Saccharide Isomerate, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Triethanolamine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Citrate, Tin Oxide, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

name: Weleda Skin Food Lotion - Light 30ml
description: A lighter - but no less hydrating - iteration of the best-loved Skin Food, Skin Food Light, now available in a pocket-friendly 30ml size, brings immediate comfort to dry, thirsty skin that's in need of a cooling, replenishing drink. Intensive care that sinks in easily, Skin Food Light 30ml boasts a medley of softening, strengthening, smoothing and barrier-boosting botanicals - including sunflower seed oil, shea and cocoa seed butters, rosemary extracts and chamomile - to supplement skin's own defences while 'locking in' moisture to maximise 'spring' and resilience. Silky, non-greasy and swiftly absorbed, this tube is a true handbag hero - as well as a pocket-sized sidekick - to care for chapped, compromised hands, scaly elbows or anywhere needing attention.
how_to_use: Smooth onto dry skin areas on the body or face and massage in gently. Allow to soak in.
ingredient: Water(Aqua), Helianthus Annuus(Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Beeswax(Cera Alba), Theobroma Cacao(Cocoa) Seed Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii(Shea) Butter, Limonene*, Viola Tricolor Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis(Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Lanolin, Carrageenan, Xanthan Gum, Lactic Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate, Fragrance(Parfum)*, Linalool*, Geraniol*, Citral*. *From natural essential oils.

name: Limited Edition Sol de Janeiro Rio Radiance Body Cream 240ml
description: Lacklustre, dull skin? We don’t know her! Sol de Janeiro’s Limited Edition Rio Radiance Body Cream has you covered from top-to-toe with its fast-absorbing formula. Instantly quenching the complexion in a moisture-kissed, glow-inducing veil, the body butter rids all signs of dryness to keep you feeling your best self, year-round. Introducing its new summer-inspired scent, the cream captures the warmth of the Rio sunshine, with luscious notes of leite de coco, sun-soaked sands and creamy vanilla. Featuring carrot seed oil, squalane and mica, the formula deeply nourishes, revealing a fresh-from-the-beach dew with a seriously supple finish. In Sol we trust to bring the vacay vibes to our lives, and this heavenly body butter stays true to the brand’s feel-good, ultra-sensorial ethos.
how_to_use: Massage in a circular motion to help promote optimal absorption and circulation. Use all over your body for the ultimate glow.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dodecane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycervl Stearate Citrate, Squalane, Sodium Hyaluronate, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuaçu) Seed Butter, Bertholletia Excelsa (Brazil Nut) Seed Oil, Paullinia Cupana Seed Extract, Euterpe Oleracea (Açaí) Fruit Oil, Ilex Guayusa Leaf Extract, Ilex Paraguariensis Leaf Extract, Mica (CI 77019), Sodium Phytate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Sorbitan Isostearate, Phenoxyethanol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Limonene, Tin Oxide, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491).

name: Lanolips 101 Ointment Multi-Balm - Coconutter 10g
description: A delicious reinvention of {The Original 101 Ointment}, Lanolips 101 Ointment Fruities are available in four ‘flavours’, each boasting its own good-to-skin benefits. There’s ‘Green Apple’, a vitamin and antioxidant-rich formula that naturally deflects harmful environmental elements and pollutants, ‘Strawberry’, which helps to slough away dead skin cells and reveal healthy, new skin thanks to the key addition of alpha-hydroxy acids; ‘Peach’, which helps to revive skin with its combination of vitamins and polyunsaturated fatty acids, ‘Coconutter’, which is boosted with vitamin E and is rich in antioxidants to make it ultra-hydrating and, finally, 'Watermelon', which is boosted with vitamin E and watermelon fruit extract to intensely hydrate. Each one is formulated with Ultra Medical Grade lanolin, which resembles and mimics your own skin oils to restore moisture unlike anything else and holds 200% of its weight in moisture. Vegetarian, baby-friendly and free from any nasties, this is basically a no brainer!
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between fingers or apply directly onto the lips and skin. Use generously and keep below 25°c.
ingredient: Green Apple: Ultra Medical Grade Lanolin, Apple Extract, Vitamin E. Strawberry: Ultra Medical Grade Lanolin, Strawberry Extract, Vitamin E. Peach: Ultra Medical Grade Lanolin, Apple Extract, Vitamin E. Coconutter: Lanolin*, Flavour*, Tocopherol Acetate* (Vit E), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*. Watermelon: Lanolin*, aroma*, tocopherol (vit E), helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, citrullus vulgaris (watermelon) seed oil*

name: PoshPeel PediCure Duo
description: Combining two pairs of the PoshPeel PediCure booties into one set, this duo promises you baby-soft feet for even longer (no salon trip necessary!). Perfect for a pamper session, patchology’s PoshPeel PediCure features a potent AHA and BHA botanical blend of glycolic, salicylic, lactic and citric acids as well as botanical extracts, to not only brighten but exfoliate rough patches and dissolve dead skin cells to slowly reveal incredibly soft and happy feet. Simply pour this potent cocktail of ingredients into the sock, sit back for 60 – 90 minutes and let patchology’s ‘Activating Essence’ do all the hard work. Over three to seven days your feet will progressively peel to reveal baby-soft feet, free of rough patches and calluses.
how_to_use: Step 1: Pour the desired amount of Activating Essence into one of the Foot Masque Socks and evenly distribute along the inside of the cotton lining. Step 2: Place your foot inside the sock and seal with attached closure. Repeat for the other foot. Step 3: Wear for 60 minutes (or up to 90 minutes if greater exfoliation is desired). Step 4: Remove socks. Thoroughly rinse and dry feet. Progressive peeling action will take place over 3-7 days.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Alcohol Denat., Alcohol, Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Salicylic Acid, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Butylene Glycol, Panthenol, Allantoin, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Disodium EDTA, Fragrance (Parfum).

name: Sol de Janeiro Beija Flor Biggie Elasti-Cream 500ml (Worth £96)
description: Need a body cream that does it all? The Beija Flor Elasti-Cream has got you — and your body — covered. This rich skin saviour is brimming with elasticity-boosting elements courtesy of cacay oil (a gentle retinol alternative) and plant-based collagen to perk up and hydrate skin. Worth £96, this supersize 500ml tub, the Beija Flor Biggie, is a must-have for Sol de Janeiro superfans. Lather this plant squalane-infused cream all over and reap the highly-moisturising benefits, especially in delicate areas like your neck and chest that are prone to moisture loss. Perfect for everyday use, notice as your skin transforms into a velvety-smooth version of itself as the aforementioned collagen and cacay oil get to work on boosting cell turnover — that’s right, you can add youth-boosting merits to its long list of accolades. Restorative, replenishing and a dream to apply, expect your skin to drink up this cocktail of good skin care stuff. Trust us, you won’t be able to keep your hands off yourself.
how_to_use: Apply daily, morning and night all over the body, using circular motions to allow this rich and deeply nourishing cream to sink in and to promote maximum absorption.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dodecane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Parfum (Fragrance), Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit (Açaí) Oil, Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuaçu) Seed Butter, Bertholletia Excelsa (Brazil Nut) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Paullinia Cupana (Guaraná) Seed Extract, Ilex Guayusa Leaf Extract, Ilex Paraguariensis Leaf Extract, Bixa Orellana Seed Extract, Tocopherol, Squalane, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene.

name: Alpha-H Liquid Gold Exfoliating Treatment with Glycolic Acid 100ml
description: Starring 5% nature-derived glycolic acid (it comes from sugar cane), the Liquid Gold with 5% Glycolic Acid harnesses the cell-stimulating and exfoliating properties of alpha hydroxy acids, which melt the 'glue' that binds dulling dead cells to skin's surface, revealing the healthy 'new' skin cells beneath. What's more, by lowering skin's pH (from 5.5 to around 3), this overnight treatment stimulates cellular activity — accelerating the repair and renewal processes, as skin works hard to re-establish equilibrium. It bolsters synthesis of elastin and collagen (the 'scaffolding' that keeps skin firm), while penetrating deep within pores to eradicate spot-causing bacteria, all while the resurfacing action helps to diminish visibility of post-blemish scars, dark spots and brown patches, so your complexion quickly looks more even-toned and luminous. It's a must-have for anyone concerned with premature skin ageing, sun damage or problem skin conditions — just build up skin's tolerance gradually (to minimise redness). Apply with a dampened cotton pad, once a week for 2–3 weeks while skin acclimatises, then build up to 3 'neat' applications a week for maximum skin-brightening benefit.
how_to_use: Apply to cleansed skin every other night. Moisten the cotton pad with solution and apply evenly over the face, neck and decollete, avoiding your eye and lip area. For an intensive treatment leave on overnight without applying a night cream over the top. Always use a daily sunscreen with an SPF of at least factor 15 when using resurfacing products.
ingredient: Aqua, Alcohol Denat, Glycolic Acid (5%), Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Silk, Potassium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Extract.

name: Weleda Sea Buckthorn Creamy Body Wash 200ml
description: Infused with an invigorating, zesty scent, Weleda's Seabuckthorn Creamy Body Wash works into a light, luxurious lather to gently refresh your skin. Celebrating a swathe of sun-soaked ingredients - from oranges and mandarins to grapefruits - this refreshing wash disperses notes of summer from within your shower. It's made with ultra-mild, sugar-based surfactants - one of which is derived from nourishing coconut oil - to create a refreshing, light foam that lifts away dirt and grime without stripping your skin. The vegan-friendly formula is also infused with vitamin-rich sea buckthorn seed oil to deeply pamper your skin. What's not to love?
how_to_use: In the shower or bath, use the low-lather formula generously all over. Enhance the moisturising effect by following with Weleda's Sea Buckthorn Replenishing Body Lotion or Body Oil.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Coco- Glucoside, Alcohol, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glycerin, Carrageenan, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Sodum Cocoyl Glutamate, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Oil, Xanthan Gum, Lactic Acid, Limonene*, Linalool*, Citral*. *From natural essential oils

name: Megababe Body Dust Mini Top-to-Toe Powder 48g
description: Skin-soothing and talc-free, this is your secret weapon against the dreaded grey t-shirt marks that usually keep your arms firmly by your sides…you can finally wave your hands in the air like you just don’t care and without the fear of saturated clothing! Absorbing moisture in an instant, this body powder can be used from top-to-toe to keep sweat from saturating your shoes and seeping into your favourite item of clothing. Lightly scented with lavender and a skin-soothing infusion of aloe and chamomile you can shake away sweat stains and get back to enjoying your hot gal summer uninterrupted. Now available in a full size 170g and travel-friendly 48g offering, you can stay sweat-free no matter where you are.
how_to_use: Shake well & apply directly to skin, or sprinkle inside clothes/shoes. For use wherever body sweat is an issue! Best on concealed areas as powder is lightly visible on skin.
ingredient: Zea Mays (Corn Starch),*Sodium Bicarbonate, Maranta Arundinacea (Arrowroot) Powder,*Kaolin Clay, Lavendula Hybrida (Lavandin) Oil,*Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Tocopherol, Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Oil. *Certified Organic.

name: Aesop Resurrection Aromatique Hand Balm 75ml
description: This classic Aesop hand lotion not only sinks in quickly without making your hands greasy and unusable (anyone with a slightly difficult bathroom door knob knows the potential hand cream dangers). It smells beautifully of Mandarin oil, Rosemary Leaf and Cedarwood and works well with the Resurrection hand wash. This moisturiser softens rough skin, cuticles and nails and can be used all over the body, especially for a foot massage... anyone? Aesop don’t believe in ‘anti’ – you won’t see any hyperbolic ‘anti-ageing’ or ‘anti-acne’ claims – instead, their products are developed to complement a balanced lifestyle, and help protect against the elements. This is ‘pro’ skin care for those who’re planning to grow older gracefully, proud of the skin that they live in.

name: Bondi Sands Sunscreen Lotion SPF50+ - Fragrance Free 150ml
description: Ready for a sun-kissed glow? The first step starts with this sunscreen lotion that applies like a dream and offers a high level of protection. Shielding skin from UVA and UVB rays, this sunscreen is essential to keeping your skin looking youthful and slowing the clock down on the ageing process. Fragrance-free and lush in texture, every picture perfect beach day (think: Bondi!) starts here. It even has vitamin E for added skin-smoothing and hydrating benefits. What's more, you don't have to worry about it going to waste as soon as you enter the sea because this water-resistant lotion ensures that you're protected for up to four hours - by then we reckon you'll be back on the beach and reach for another top up of this fast-absorbing body lotion.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Apply liberally and evenly to all unprotected areas 15 to 20 minutes before exposure to the sun. You need at least one teaspoon per limb, one for the front of the body, one for the back and one for the head. Re-apply every 2 hours or more often when sweating and after swimming, exercise or towel drying. Use alongside a hat, protective clothing and sunglasses.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Homosalate, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Octocrylene, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Ceteareth-20, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Hydroxyacetophenone, Carbomer, Benzyl Alcohol, Saccharide Isomerate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Triethanolamine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride. Benzyl Alcohol.

name: Paula's Choice Clear Ultra-Light Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF30+
description: Formulated for oilier, blemish-prone skin types, this featherweight moisturiser keeps skin balanced, healthy and calm – not to mention protected from harmful and ageing UV rays with broad-spectrum SPF30. With a non-greasy fluid consistency, the clever formula mattifies excess shine and minimises the appearance of pores to lend a smooth canvas perfectly primed for make up application or for wearing in its bare, beautiful glory. A blend of vitamin-dense plant extracts – think: green tea, pomegranate and goji among others – add their antioxidant properties to the mix, soothing any upsets, fading red marks and defending against environmental stressors. Perfect for wearing the daytime, this multi-tasking hero comes in both full (60ml) and travel (15ml) sizes – perfect for on-the-go or trialling before investing in the full size.
how_to_use: Apply as the last step in your morning skincare routine. Allow a moment to dry before applying makeup. Allergic to aspirin (acetylsalicylate)? Do not use this product as it contains salicylate derivatives (incl. Homosalate).

name: Aesop A Rose By Any Other Name Body Cleanser 500ml
description: Both beautiful and practical, Aesops ethos is all about marrying old world wisdom with new tech disciplines harnessing the finest botanical extracts and fusing them with the latest and greatest scientific discoveries to re-train your skin to be the best that it can be. The bottles are made of traditional amber glass (or sustainable plastic), to protect against UV degradation and prolong the integrity of their specialist blends (whilst minimising the need for preservatives). Just use a small amount of this A Rose By Any Other Name Body Cleanser on a sponge in the shower, or add a teaspoonful to your bath to transform it into an indulgent, end-of-day sanctuary. Youll emerge feeling thoroughly cleansed yet hydrated, and wrapped in a fragrant veil of romantic warmth. And the bottle looks pretty chic in your bathroom too

name: Paula's Choice Resist Anti-Ageing Skin Restoring Moisturizer SPF 50
description: A must-have for the summer months, the brand's Resist Skin Restoring Moisturiser SPF50 is a multi-tasking moisturiser that features SPF 50 to protect skin from premature signs of ageing and sun damage, while shea butter leaves skin feeling incredibly soft and hydrated. The youth-preserving yet good-to-skin formula also contains tone-improving ingredients like niacinamide and liquorice root extract for more even-toned and younger-looking skin. What's not to love?
how_to_use: Apply as the last step in your morning skincare routine. Allow a moment to dry before applying makeup. Allergic to aspirin (acetylsalicylate)? Do not use this product as it contains salicylate derivatives (incl. Homosalate).

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Invisible Kids Spray SPF50+ 200ML
description: Specifically formulated for children’s skin to defend against harmful UV rays, this practical spray SPF gives you peace of mind without the tantrums. Cleverly formulated with Intellimer technology to offer the most even and full protection for little ones delicate skin, La Roche-Posay is here to give you peace of mind with their practical and effective Anthelios range. Fragrance-free, non-greasy and very water, sweat and sand-resistant, you can rest assured that the Invisible Kids Spray SPF 50+ will offer complete broad-spectrum protection for sensitive and young skin. Infused with ‘Thermal Spring Water’ to soothe reactivity, and suitable for use on the face and body, your children can have fun in the sun without the upset of sticky SPFs.
how_to_use: Apply 30 minutes before exposure and re-apply frequently and generously every two hours to maintain protection especially after swimming, perspiring or towelling. Shake well before use. Avoid exposure to the sun during the hottest hours of the day. Keep children under 3 out of the sun and ensure they are wearing a hat, t-shirt and sunglasses.
ingredient: Aqua / Water, Alcohol Denat., Homosalate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Glycerin, Propanediol, C12-22 Alkyl Acrylate/Hydroxyethylacrylate Copolymer, Drometrizole Trisiloxane, Diisopropyl Adipate, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Tocopherol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate.

name: Megababe Le Tush Clarifying Butt Mask 200ml
description: Give body acne the boot-y with Megababe Le Tush Butt Mask. A facial-worthy blend of alpha hydroxy acids, plastic-free microbeads and clarifying clay, this targeted mask leaves bums baby smooth and spot-free. Slather onto cheeks (or anywhere else on your body that needs a little TLC) to smooth away bumps and roughness with a blend of exfoliating glycolic, malic and azelaic acids. Planet-friendly exfoliating beads join in on the resurfacing action, while kaolin clay and willow bark extract help to soothe and clear breakouts. Squalane and kelp extracts add a moisturising boost to leave your posterior feeling peachy soft.
how_to_use: Use up to 2-3 times per week on clean, dry skin. Leave on for up to three minutes, then massage in a circular motion. Rinse and pat dry.
ingredient: Water , Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Kaolin, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-2 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Stearyl Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Glycolic Acid, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate / Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Squalane, Menthol, Potassium Sorbate, Ascorbic Acid, Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Leaf Oil, Panthenol, Tocopherol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Allantoin, Glycerin, Azelaic Acid, Malic Acid, Salix Nigra (Black Willow) Bark Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Calendula Officinalis Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract.

name: Kosas Chemistry Deodorant
description: With an ingredient list worthy of celebrating, this supercharged, odour-fighting Chemistry Deodorant does the work of a deodorant, all while supplying your long-neglected under-arms with nourishing extracts. Speaking of which, its infused with antimicrobial shikimic acid to fend against unwanted scents; mandemic acid to diminish dullness and discolouration; lactic acid to exfoliate (a must for preventing ingrown hairs!) and encourage healthy moisture levels; pure aloe vera juice and hyaluronic acid to deeply hydrate and soothe; as well as a highly bioactive peptide to condition and smooth your skin. What isnt in the blend is just as important as what is you wont find any aluminium or baking soda in this impressive, vegan deodorant! The fact that the lightweight serum is fast-drying and runs no risk of leaving tell-tale residue on your clothing only makes us love it more. Simply pick between the 'Serene Clean' scent or the 'Fragrance Free' edition and be on your way to showing bacteria-causing BO who's boss...
how_to_use: Use it every day - just shake, roll, and go. Gently squeeze for more serum. Maximum benefits kick in after one week of use.
ingredient: Fragrance Free: Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Mandelic Acid, Glycerin, Shikimic Acid, Lactic Acid, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citric Acid, Tartaric Acid, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate Serene Clean: Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Mandelic Acid, Glycerin, Shikimic Acid, Lactic Acid, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citric Acid, Tartaric Acid, Polyglyceryl-4 Cocoate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate

name: Paula's Choice Resist Super-Light Daily Wrinkle Defense SPF30 (60ml)
description: A youth-boosting moisturiser suitable for oily, combination and blemish-prone skin, this lightweight formula is bound to become a firm favourite in your evening routine. Absorbing excess oil, it grants a soft matte finish with a sheer light tint – perfect for priming skin for make up. Also in the mix are a hardworking blend of antioxidants which combine to calm irritation, promote a more youthful complexion and protect against the harmful, ageing effects of free radicals. The formula also protects against the sun’s UVA and UVB rays, using mineral sunscreen zinc oxide – a gentle alternative to chemical sunscreens that’s suitable for easily upset, sensitive complexions. What’s not to love?
how_to_use: Apply as the last step in your morning skincare routine. Allow a moment to dry before applying makeup.
ingredient: Aqua, Cyclopentasiloxane (hydration), Zinc Oxide (13%, Nano, broad spectrum sunscreen agent ), PEG-12 Dimethicone (texture enhancer), PEG/PPG-18/18 Dimethicone (texture enhancer), Lauryl Lysine (skin-conditioning agent), Sodium Chloride (stabilizer), Trihydroxystearin (texture-enhancing), Dimethicone Crosspolymer (suspending agent), Resveratrol (antioxidant), Quercetin (antioxidant), Epigallocatechin Gallate (antioxidant), Tocopheryl Acetate (vitamin E/antioxidant), Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate (vitamin C/antioxidant), enisonedA (skin-restoring), Bisabolol (skin-soothing), xilaS Alba (willow) Bark Extract (skin-soothing), Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract (antioxidant), Haematococcus Pluvialis (Astaxanthin) Extract (antioxidant), Hydrolized Corn Starch (texture-enhancing/mattifying agent), Polysorbate 80 (texture-enhancing), Hydrolyzed Silica (texture-enhancing/mattifying agent), Triethoxycaprylylsilane (texture enhancer), C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate (emollient texture enhancer), Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate (texture-enhancing), Caprylyl Glycol (preservative), Hexylene Glycol (preservative), Ethylhexylglycerin (preservative), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499) (colorant), Phenoxyethanol (preservative).

name: SUMMER FRIDAYS Summer Silk Nourishing Body Lotion
description: As the sun starts to peek its head through the near-permanent clouds, we've found ourselves asking, "why wear clothes when you can dress your skin in lasting hydration with SUMMER FRIDAYS' tropical-scented Summer Silk Nourishing Body Lotion?" Scented like a sunny summer's day (think: coconut, vanilla blossom and warm almond), this decadent body lotion is packed with plant-derived butters and oils to grant all-day hydration. Expertly crafted to quench your skin without ever feeling greasy, it's made with replenishing ceramides (a complex of lipids, alike to those found naturally in your skin) to help strengthen your skin barrier and encourage moisture retention; an antioxidant-rich blend of grapeseed, argan, linseed and rosehip oils noruishes and protects skin so that it feels silky smooth; finally, plant-derived butters - we're talking highly emollient cocoa butter and shea butter - contribute essential fatty acids to lock in lasting hydration. Roll on summer...
how_to_use: Slather on generously whenever, wherever your body craves rich, comforting moisture. Tip: Apply to still-damp skin after your bath or shower to help seal in hydration.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Propanediol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Silica, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Squalane, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Ceramide EOS, Ceramide NP, Ceramide NS, Saccharide Isomerate, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Rosa Canina Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Sodium Lauroyl Oat Amino Acids, Fragaria Vesca (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Hibiscus Rosa-Sinensis Flower Extract, Coumarin, Cholesterol, Caprooyl Phytosphingosine, Caprooyl Sphingosine, Glyceryl Stearate, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Behenic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Ceteareth-25, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polysorbate 60, Citric Acid, Sodium Phytate, Acetic Acid, Polyglyceryl-2 Stearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance/Parfum.

name: Megababe Happy Pits Detoxifying Underarm Mask 90ml
description: Our underarms go through a lot. From sweaty situations to pore-clogging anti-perspirants, it’s safe to say they’re overdue some TLC. That’s where the Happy Pits Underarm Mask comes in... This detox mask is powered by charcoal and kaolin clay, purifying extracts that draw toxins to the surface of your skin. A cocktail of glycolic acid and willow bark gently exfoliates and clarifies while tea tree oil calms redness and vitamin C brightens and rejuvenates your skin. Just apply the applicator tip directly to clean, dry underarms, wait for it to works its magic (five minutes to be exact) and rinse it off.
how_to_use: Apply a generous layer to clean, dry pits. Leave mask on for 5 minutes & remove with warm water or cloth. Use 1-2 times per week, or as desired.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Kaolin, Bentonite, Propanediol, Sd Alcohol 40-b, Carbon (Charcoal), Salix Nigra (Willow) Bark Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Glycolic Acid, Malic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Panthenol, Allantoin, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract (Green Tea Extract), Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Glycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate.

name: Summer Fridays Babymoon Belly Balm 150ml
description: This body balm is one to smooth on generously to indulge in all that is rich, soft and intensely moisturising. If you’ve got a little one on the way, your rounded belly is about to get a whole lot more supple and soft. Don’t be shy when using the Babymoon Belly Balm, this luxurious cream is intended to melt into skin whenever and wherever its crying out for more hydration. With a vegan formula that’s filled with nourishing sunflower, avocado and olive oils, these highly-loved healthy ingredients are just as vital in your caesar salad as they are in your moisturising regime. Just a simple swatch of this balm gets to work on increasing elasticity, making it a great fit for overstretched skin and lending a little TLC to your proud tiger stripe stretch marks.
how_to_use: Massage into skin wherever extra-nourishing moisture and comfort is needed. If pregnant, apply as needed for deep, soothing hydration. Please consult your healthcare professional with any concerns prior to use. Storage Directions: Please store in a cool place.
ingredient: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Synthetic Wax, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Calendula Officinalis Flower Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower Oil, Linalool.

name: Lanolips 101 Ointment Multi-Balm - Strawberry 10g
description: A delicious reinvention of {The Original 101 Ointment}, Lanolips 101 Ointment Fruities are available in four ‘flavours’, each boasting its own good-to-skin benefits. There’s ‘Green Apple’, a vitamin and antioxidant-rich formula that naturally deflects harmful environmental elements and pollutants, ‘Strawberry’, which helps to slough away dead skin cells and reveal healthy, new skin thanks to the key addition of alpha-hydroxy acids; ‘Peach’, which helps to revive skin with its combination of vitamins and polyunsaturated fatty acids, ‘Coconutter’, which is boosted with vitamin E and is rich in antioxidants to make it ultra-hydrating and, finally, 'Watermelon', which is boosted with vitamin E and watermelon fruit extract to intensely hydrate. Each one is formulated with Ultra Medical Grade lanolin, which resembles and mimics your own skin oils to restore moisture unlike anything else and holds 200% of its weight in moisture. Vegetarian, baby-friendly and free from any nasties, this is basically a no brainer!
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between fingers or apply directly onto the lips and skin. Use generously and keep below 25°c.
ingredient: Green Apple: Ultra Medical Grade Lanolin, Apple Extract, Vitamin E. Strawberry: Ultra Medical Grade Lanolin, Strawberry Extract, Vitamin E. Peach: Ultra Medical Grade Lanolin, Apple Extract, Vitamin E. Coconutter: Lanolin*, Flavour*, Tocopherol Acetate* (Vit E), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*. Watermelon: Lanolin*, aroma*, tocopherol (vit E), helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, citrullus vulgaris (watermelon) seed oil*

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Oil Control SPF 50+ Gel-Cream 50ml
description: La Roche-Posay brings us the Holy Grail of lightweight, mattifying SPFs for oily and sensitive skin types with their patented filtering system, ‘Mexoplex’. Offering you an optimal level of reinforced protection from UVA rays that’s even stricter than the European recommendation, the Anti-Shine SPF 50+ Sun Cream is clinically tested and proven for its efficacy and performance. Still need a little convincing? You’ll find a high PPD (Persistent Pigment Darkening) factor across every offering in the Anthelios range, making sure you get the best possible UVA protection for a more youthful and even skin tone. Bringing it home with perlite and zinc gluconate to keep you shine-free all day long, this is the ultimate SPF for sensitive complexions struggling with breakouts, sun intolerance or even prickly heat.
how_to_use: Apply 30 minutes before exposure and reapply frequently and generously every two hours to maintain protection especially after swimming, perspiring or towelling. Shake well before use. Do not spray directly on face. Avoid exposure to the sun during the hottest hours of the day. Keep children under 3 out of the sun.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Homosalate, Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Silica, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Ethylhexyl Riazone, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Drometrizole Trisiloxane, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Octocrylene, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Titanium Dioxide [Nano] / Titanium Dioxide, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, C1 77491, C1 77492, C1 77499 / Iron Oxides, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutyphenol [Nano] // Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol, Propylene Glycol, Caprylyl Methicone, Pentylene Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Dimethicone, Disodium Edta, Glycerin, Inulin Lauryl Carbamate, Peg-8 Laurate, Phenoxyethanol Acid, Stearyl Alcohol, Terephthalylidene Triethanolamine, Xanthan Gum, (Code F.I.L: C18293/1). Please Check Back Of Pack For Up To Date Ingredients.

name: Sol de Janeiro Beija Flor Elasti-Cream 240ml
description: Need a body cream that does it all? The Beija Flor Elasti-Cream has got you — and your body! — covered. Available in this supersize 240ml tub, this rich skin saviour is brimming with elasticity-boosting elements via cacay oil (a gentle retinol alternative) and plant-based collagen to perk up and hydrate skin. Lather this plant squalane-infused cream all over and reap the highly-moisturising benefits, especially in delicate areas like your neck and chest that are prone to moisture loss. Perfect for everyday use, notice as your skin transforms into a velvety-smooth version of itself as the aforementioned collagen and cacay oil get to work on boosting cell turnover — that’s right, you can add youth-boosting merits to its long list of accolades. Restorative, replenishing and a dream to apply, expect your skin to drink up this cocktail of good skin care stuff. Trust us, you won’t be able to keep your hands off yourself.
how_to_use: Apply daily, morning and night all over the body, using circular motions to allow this rich and deeply nourishing cream to sink in and to promote maximum absorption.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Cetearyl Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isopentyldiol, Glyceryl Stearate, C13-16 Isoparaffin, Glycerin, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Cetyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Caryodendron Orinocense (Cacay) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Behenyl Alcohol, Squalane, Collagen Amino Acid, Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuaçu) Seed Butter, Copaifera Officinalis (Balsam Copaiba) Resin, Astrocaryum Vulgare (Tucumã) Kernel Oil, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Tocopherol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Heptyl Undecylenate, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Salicylate, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

name: Glow Recipe Watermelon Glow Pink Dream Body Cream 200ml
description: Joining Glow Recipe's fan-favourite Watermelon Glow range, the brand's newly packaged Watermelon Glow Pink Dream Body Cream is brimming with refreshing watermelon extract to help effortlessly smooth and hydrate skin from head-to-toe. Effortlessly smooth and hydrate skin all-at-once with refreshing watermelon thanks to Glow Recipe's Watermelon Glow Pink Dream Body Cream. This creamy lotion is a smoothie of liquified vitamin-rich watermelon seed butter, naturally smoothing hibiscus AHA, soothing watermelon, and multi-weight hyaluronic acid for deep moisture to act as a tall, cool drink of water to parched skin. Never leaving a messy, sticky, or greasy after-feel, Glow Recipe's Watermelon Glow Pink Dream Body Cream absorbs in a flash, wrapping skin in the cult-fave watermelon scent, anytime, anywhere.
how_to_use: -Apply on hands and body, and gently massage until absorbed, AM and PM. -Tip: Apply another layer onto rougher, more dehydrated areas like elbows, knees, and cuticles for added moisture.

name: OUAI St. Barts Scalp and Body Scrub 250g
description: A summer update of the original Scalp & Body Scrub, fly-a-ouai to St. Barts with this limited edition scented version that has notes of dragonfruit, orange blossom, tuberose and baltic amber. Perfect for prepping skin for a day by the beach, a spray tan, or just to transport yourself out of your shower for a minute, this St. Barts Scalp and Body Scrub features the same go-to formula with an intoxicatingly beautiful scent. The perfect reset for scalp and skin alike, this weekly detox is deep cleansing and gently foaming. Powered by gently exfoliating sugar crystals which cleanse and soften skin and conditioning coconut oil to replenish moisture whilst calming the crazy. For even deeper scalp cleansing, Jen Atkin's top tip is to add a small amount of your favourite OUAI shampoo to this superb scrub.
how_to_use: On scalp: In the shower, section wet hair and apply a quarter-size amount directly to the scalp. Rub in circular motions to activate lather, then rinse and follow with conditioner. On body: Apply to damp skin and rub in circular motions to gently exfoliate.

name: Tan-Luxe Super Gloss Illuminating Bronzing Drops
description: Taking up a coveted spot on our most-wanted list, the exclusive Super Gloss SPF 30 is a lightweight illuminating and bronzing serum that effortlessly colour-corrects your tone, softens the look of imperfections, quenches your skin and reignites your glow. Blurring the lines between a serum, bronzer and sunscreen, the Super Gloss SPF 30 is a multi-tasking formula that melds hyaluronic acid and squalane to boost and retain skin-plumping moisture while softening the visibility of fine lines to promote a beautifully dewy, fresh-faced finish. Effective enough for everyday use – come rain or shine - this SPF 30 helps to shield your skin against damaging UVA/UVB rays, as well as blue light! Plus, the vegan & reef-safe formula blurs the look of imperfections (think: uneven tone) to bestow a luminous, bronzed glow.
how_to_use: Apply to bare skin for natural sun-kissed radiance. Drop into your moisturiser for a custom glow-boost. Highlight cheekbones/collarbones/shoulders for a glossy finish. Mix with The Face for an instant glow that develops over time.
ingredient: C13-15 Alkane, Isododecane, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Octocrylene, Octisalate, Isosorbide Dicaprylate, Ethyl Macadamiate, Homosalate, Dextrin Palmitate, Avobenzone, Polyester-7, Mica, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Squalane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dextrin Palmitate/Hexyldecanoate, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Hyaluronic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Bisabolol, Tocopherol, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Palmitic Acid, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Glycerin, Water (Aqua), Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Isochrysis Galbana Extract, Malic Acid

name: OUAI Fur Bébé Pet Shampoo 474ml
description: The only cleanser that’s deserving of your beloved fur bébé’s coat, Ouai’s Pet Shampoo is specially formulated for pampered pets – lifting dirt and intensely hydrating from snoot through to tail. Enriched with nourishing ingredients that won’t aggravate itchy or sensitive skin, this formula uses rambutan seed extract, vegetable protein and panthenol to soften fur and deliver a Crufts-worthy shine. Cue: instant waggy tails, satisfied purrs and very, very happy humans, because this shampoo is infused with the brand's delicious (and unbelievably long-lasting) 'Mercer Street' scent too. A far cry from whatever your pet rolled around in the other week, (OI – COME BACK HERE!) this formula is bursting with Italian lemon, iris, white musk, lily, jasmine sambac and Turkish Rose for infinitely sweet snuggles and no wrinkled noses. Formulated without any gluten, parabens, phthalates, SLS or SLES, this cruelty-free shampoo will have your pet begging for bath time (well, we can dream), and you can kiss goodbye to dirty paws on your freshly-mopped floor. You’re welcome.
how_to_use: Brush your fur bébé before shampooing. Wet coat thoroughly. Massage liberally from back of ears to tail. Be careful to avoid eyes. Rinse well and towel dry.
ingredient: Water / Aqua / Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Lauryl Glucoside, Decyl Glucoside, Glycerin, Cocamide MIPA, Fragrance / Parfum, Panthenol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Nephelium Lappaceum Seed Extract, Hibiscus Rosa-Sinensis Flower Extract, Tamarindus Indica Extract, Vinegar, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, PEG-150 Distearate, Polyquaternium-7, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Maltodextrin, PEG-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Ultra-Light Invisible Fluid SPF30 50ml
description: You name it, the Anthelios Ultra-Light Invisible Fluid SPF 30+ does it. This is your next-gen photostable, broad spectrum protector that resists water, sweat and sand and all without leaving behind greasy white marks. We told you it was good! (In)-famously utilised in the Anthelios range is star ingredient ‘Mexoplex’, the patented filtering system that reinforces your skin against ageing UVA rays. Combined with ‘Thermal Spring Water’ this is the powerhouse lightweight SPF that will be sitting proudly in our beach bag all summer long. A hypo-allergenic formula that has been tested, re-tested and tested yet again for its mildness on sensitive and reactive skin it’s no wonder that nine out of ten dermatologists recommend this Cult favourite range from our favourite French pharmacy brand.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Apply 30 minutes before exposure and reapply frequently and generously every two hours to maintain protection especially after swimming, perspiring or towelling.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Alcohol Denat., Diisopropyl Sebacate, Silica, Isopropyl Myristate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Glycerin, C12-22 Alkyl Acrylate/Hydroxyethylacrylate Copolymer, Propanediol, Drometrizole Trisiloxane, Perlite, Tocopherol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Terephthalylidene Dicamphor Sulfonic Acid, Triethanolamine, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Parfum/Fragrance.

name: HUM Nutrition Private Party Supplements 60g
description: Because your vagina deserves a little TLC too, these Private Party capsules support vaginal and urinary tract health to give you maximum levels of comfort as you go about your days, worry-free. A daily jumble of hormones, stress, medications and age can easily disturb the delicately balanced pH and ecosystem of yeast and probiotic species found in the vaginal microbiome. By cocktailing actives and cultures that protect vaginal and urinary tract health, Private Party capsules promotes a healthy pH, microbiome and yeast balance using 10 billion organisms, three lactobacillus strains (commonly found in a healthy vaginal microbiome!) and concentrated cranberry extract powder for maximum efficacy. In fact, lactic acid is released to maintain a low, acidic pH environment while antioxidants protect – resulting in a happy vagina and a happy you!
how_to_use: Take one capsule at any time, with or without food. Results in 4 - 6 weeks.
ingredient: Maltodextrin, blend of Lactic Acid Bacteria (Lactobacillus Acidophilus > 4.7bn CFU, Lactobacillus Rhamnosus > 0.28 Bn CFU, Lactobacillus Reuteri > 0.046 Bn CFU), Cranberry Extract (Vaccinium Macrocarpon) 90mg, Capsule: Hydroxypropyl Methyl Cellulose, Bamboo Extract (Bambusa Vulgaris), Medium Chain Triglycerides. Contains NO: wheat, gluten, soy, milk, eggs, fish, crustacean shellfish, peanuts, artificial colors, flavors or preservatives. * This product is formulated to deliver a potency of 10 billion organisms at the time of manufacture.

name: Sol de Janeiro Beija Flor Body Wash 385ml
description: Cleanse and revitalise your body (while being enveloped in the fruity yet floral aromas of Sol de Janeiro's iconic Cheirosa 68 perfume) with the Beija Flor Body Wash. Lather up with this creamy, moisturising body wash, infused with cacay oil (a gentle alternative to retinol that promotes cell turnover), and reveal healthier-looking skin. Elsewhere in the formula, flower acids come together to gently exfoliate the skin while vegan squalane works to deeply hydrate. Boasting notes of pink dragonfruit, vanilla, jasmine and more, this body wash - which is both vegan friendly and cruelty-free - is an absolute essential if you want to feel fresh and smell delicious.
how_to_use: Massage all over the body for 30-60 seconds. Rinse clean for soft and revitalized skin.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Stearic Acid, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Glycol Distearate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Glycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Squalane, Caryodendron Orinocense (Cacay) Seed Oil, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Polyquaternium-7, Sodium Isethionate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Methyltaurate, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol.

name: ESPA Bergamot and Jasmine Bath and Shower Gel 250ml
description: Firm in the belief that your skin deserves the utmost care, ESPA crafted an assortment of body washes - each with their own bewitching scent - to gently yet effectively refresh your skin. With a delicately fresh, floral aroma, clear some space on your shower shelf for this Bergamot & Jasmine Bath and Shower Gel... This soap-free formula is brimming with a decadent medley of pure essential oils - from jasmine and bergamot to orange and ginger - that gives the cleansing lather its enchanting aroma. Perfect for all skin types, especially those that are prone to bouts of rough and dry patches, this everyday wash is carefully formulated to cleanse your skin without stripping essential moisture. Instead, it helps to condition and soften your skin - we're obsessed!
how_to_use: FOR BEST RESULTS: Use daily in the shower or add to running water for a luxurious foaming bath. Massage into damp skin to create a rich lather and rinse off.

name: Davines Energizing Shampoo
description: Do you want to stop thinning hair in its tracks? Then you need to meet Davines’ Energizing Shampoo, formulated with caffeine phytoceuticals, this hard-working formula stimulates circulation and improves elasticity, preventing further or future hair loss with continued use. Benefitting from eucalyptus and peppermint oil extracts as well as niacinamide and citric acid, this hard-working shampoo works to cleanse, clear and calm irritated and congested scalps. Housed in a minimalist deep brown bottle with quintessential Davines packaging, this Energizing Shampoo will look right at home in your bathroom while delivering effective use with continuous use.
how_to_use: Gently massage into damp hair and allow to process for a few minutes. Rinse thoroughly, and follow with Energizing treatments.
