name: Bondi Sands Self Tanning Foam 200ml - Dark
description: Experience a sun-kissed Australian tan every time with Bondi Sands Self Tanning Foam. Perfect for those with light to medium complexions – or first time tanners! – this versatile self tanner can be left on for a minimum of one hour, all the way up to six hours to help you customise your perfect faux glow. A Bondi Sands cult classic, the brand's Self Tanning Foam is a must-have for new and veteran tanners alike. Thanks to the customisable formula, you can leave this natural-looking formula on skin from one to six hours to achieve your perfect finish. Enriched with aloe vera and laced with a sumptuous coconut aroma, this lightweight self-tanning foam will leave your skin glowing like you've spent the day (or week!) on Bondi Beach itself.
how_to_use: Use the Bondi Sands Exfoliation Mitt to ensure your skin is clean and free from any moisturisers. Pump foam directly onto your Application Mitt before using long, sweeping motions to smooth over legs, arms and body. Use remaining tan for face, elbows, and knees. Skin may be washed after one hour. For a longer lasting, darker tan leave for up to 6 hours before showering with warm water. Gently pat skin dry. For the deepest tan re-apply Bondi Sands Self-Tanning Foam 30 minutes after initial application.

name: Megababe Dust Puff Body Powder Puff
description: Anyone who struggles with sweat will have talced themselves to oblivion in their time. While effective, the cleaning up process can make it more laborious than anything else. That’s where Megababe’s Dust Puff Body Powder Puff comes in... Made with a cloud-soft polar fleece, this oversized puff makes it easy to powder your hardest-to-reach spots in a flash. Best of all, the FSC-certified cardboard case does double duty as storage and a built-in application hack — sprinkle powder in the bottom and your puff is always ready to go!
how_to_use: Sprinkle powder directly on puff, tap to remove excess and gently apply to skin. To clean, hand wash and lay flat to dry.

name: Aesop Coriander Seed Body Cleanser 500ml
description: Both beautiful and practical, Aesops ethos is all about marrying old world wisdom with new tech disciplines harnessing the finest botanical extracts and fusing them with the latest and greatest scientific discoveries to re-train your skin to be the best that it can be. The bottles are made of traditional amber glass (or sustainable plastic), to protect against UV degradation and prolong the integrity of their specialist blends (whilst minimising the need for preservatives). Aesop dont believe in anti you wont see any hyperbolic anti-ageing or anti-acne claims instead, their products are developed to complement a balanced lifestyle, and help counteract the impact of the elements. This is pro skin care for those who're planning to grow older gracefully, proud of the skin that they live in.
how_to_use: Dispense into hands or onto a sea sponge. Massage onto soaked skin from neck to toe, then rinse thoroughly.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Coco-Betaine, Cocamide MIPA, Sea Salt (Maris sal), Coriandrum Sativum (Coriander) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Piper Nigrum (Black Pepper) Fruit Oil, Sodium Citrate, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Methylisothiazolinone, Linalool, d-Limonene

name: Tan-Luxe Super Glow Hyaluronic Self-Tan Serum 30ml
description: Similarly to the brand's The Face, this all-new Super Glow Hyaluronic Self-Tan Serum is powered by a potent hyaluronic acid complex which effortlessly delivers a streak-free, ultra-nourished glow. Youth-preserving while helping you to fake that faux glow, this lightweight yet potent serum is a 3-in-1 hard-working hero that tans, plumps and adds serious glow to skin for a flawless and natural, healthy tan which will have everyone asking where you went last weekend. Boasting an antioxidant-rich ingredients list to brighten skin and boost collagen production, this serum also gives a burst of hydration upon application, while cocoa seed extract acts as a shield to protect skin from daily environmental aggressors. The only question is, what can't this serum do for you?
how_to_use: Apply 2-12 drops to the face and décolleté daily, massaging into skin with circular motions, avoiding eyes. Follow with a moisturizer before makeup. Additional drops will increase depth in colour.

description: Sitting weightlessly underneath your make up, the Matte Screen is an oil-controlling rendition from the SPF sovereigns that we all know and love. Like a primer-meets-sunscreen, this zinc-powered formula promotes smoother-looking skin and minimised pores with a blurring effect. Delivering broad spectrum protection up to factor 30, this slather-worthy cream provides a mattifying shield between your skin and harmful UV rays, whatever the weather. No need to worry about the impact of too much screen time on your complexion both thanks to its ability to filter out blue light. Fortunately for you, shine doesn't exist around here...

name: Sol de Janeiro Bom Dia Body Scrub 220g
description: Wishing a bom dia to your skin from head to toe, the Bom Dia Body Scrub delivers facial-like results but to your body. Powered by 10% AHA and BHA ingredients, this sweet-smelling remedy for rough, textured skin (strawberry skin, we’re talking to you) unlocks all-over suppleness. Overflowing with an acid-rich complex starring glycolic, lactic and salicylic acids, this skin-brightening blend targets ingrown hairs, keratosis pilaris, clogged pores and even blemish-prone areas to help even tone and decongest your skin. Sloughing away debris with passion fruit seeds, this glow-inducing formula unveils that radiance you’ve been searching for. Melting softly in the shower, this lightly scented scrub is oozing with a floral-inspired fusion that transports your senses to the sunny shores of Brazil where the bom dias are endless..

description: Eliminate underarm odour and soothe skin with Sol de Janeiro's Beija Flor Deo. Scented with one of the brand's bestselling fragrances, Beija Flor - which blends soft and sultry frangipani with fruity yet floral pink dragonfruit - this deodorant is free of both aluminium and baking soda. Designed to keep underarms smelling fresh all day, the Beija Flor Deo uses tapioca starch to absorb excess moisture (so you can say goodbye to sweaty armpits) while papaya enzyme helps fight ingrown hairs. Elsewhere in the Beija Flor formula, bacuri butter and mango seed butter protect and soothe the skin.

name: Kitsch Satin Pillowcase (Various Colours)
description: The ultimate multitasking hero, this Satin Pillowcase is far from your usual bedtime headrest. The satin material allows you to wake up with hair thats *almost* as sleek-looking as the pillowcase itself, plus, this magical maverick is both hydrating and anti-aging for your precious skin. So good it doesnt sound real: the Satin Pillowcase wont tug or damage your strands as you sleep, keeping your hair frizz-free and looking silky smooth with envious shine. But thats not all the material has also been designed to both hydrate and age-defy for a well-rested, youthful appearance. This night time necessity comes in neutral colours black, silver, blush and jazzier options like leopard print ivory, white terrazzo and champagne butterfly so you can match your pillowcase to your bed sheets every time.
how_to_use: Switch out your regular pillowcase with your chosen Kitsch pillowcase.
ingredient: Silver, Blush and Leopard Printed: 100% polyester. Ivory, Black, White Terrazzo, Champagne Butterfly: 100% polyester satin.

name: Gallinée Prebiotic Cleansing Bar Perfume Free
description: Microbiome is more than a ‘skin thing’ – it’s everywhere – and when it comes to vaginas, they have a unique ecosystem that’s easily knocked out of kilter. Which is why Gallinée have created their Cleansing Bar Perfume-Free, For Intimate Hygiene – a gentle, biotic-laced cleanser that helps to respect the vaginal environment. Highly acidic (its pH is around ~3.5) and with little bacterial diversity, the vaginal microbiome – located on the vulva and the vagina – provides crucial defence from infection, which is why it’s important to keep it in sync. To maintain harmony you must ‘feed’ the lactobacillus lactic acid, which is why Gallinée have updated their bestselling cleansing bar to make it even more gentle and perfect for keeping your vaginal environs happy and balanced. Gynaecologist tested and soap-free, this is brimming with pre- and postbiotics to support the microbiome, alongside lactic acid to encourage ‘good’ bacteria to flourish. What’s more, it’s made with 90% nature-derived ingredients and without any fragrance, colourings, parabens, mineral oil, silicones or phenoxyethanol, it is equally perfect for babies or compromised skin that’s especially sensitive.
how_to_use: For external use only. Massage into damp skin and rinse.
ingredient: Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Maltodextrin, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Stearic Acid, Aqua (Water), Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Inulin, Lactic Acid, Arginine, Citric Acid, Titanium Dioxide.

name: AMELIORATE Nourishing Body Wash 500ml
description: Experience the ultra-moisturising effects of the AMELIORATE Nourishing Body Wash. Offering a gentle cleanse, the soap-free formula works to leave skin feeling soft and replenished. Powered by the brand’s unique LaH6 Skin Hydration Complex, the body wash rids skin of impurities, while helping to retain skin’s natural moisture levels. A blend of natural omega oils including starflower and camelina promotes skin renewal. Skin is left feeling smooth and supple. Suitable for all skin types.

name: MALIN + GOETZ Bergamot Deodorant
description: Free from aluminium, alcohol, baking soda, parabens and synthetic fragrances or dyes, MALIN + GOETZ Bergamot Deodorant is perfect for those looking for a natural alternative that works. Cruelty-free and vegan, this odour-controlling (but non-clogging) stick has a silky consistency, gliding over skin to battle BO-causing bacteria with probiotic enzymes, natural bergamot extract and corn starch to absorb excess moisture. Delicately scented, this fresh, floral deodorant keeps underarms smelling lightly of orange blossom, without any residue and without over-drying your delicate skin. Ideal for all skin types, especially sensitive, this creamy stick also has moisture-absorbing abilities – it won’t keep you dry (it’s not an anti-perspirant), but it will help to minimise moisture.
how_to_use: Apply daily to clean underarms. Appropriate for underarms after shaving. There is a transitional period when integrating any natural deodorant into your regimen. For a short period of time, you may find yourself perspiring more than usual – this is your body releasing any built-up toxins. After detoxing, your body will stabilise, and you will perspire less. Absorbs without residue, staining or irritation.

Now made sans fragrance, it's still overflowing with essential fatty acids and vitamins to restore harmony to stressed-out skin, smooth areas of dryness and protect your complexion from environmental aggressors. Doing the work of three formulas, this calming concoction can be used as a primer, moisturiser and make up remover, making it a versatile make up bag mainstay and a great travel companion (wishful thinking...). Light in texture and quickly absorbed, a helping of this salve will leave skin feeling plumped, soothed and hydrated while the velvety finish grips your foundation to help you stay flawless for longer.

description: Put the samba spring back into your step with Sol de Janeiro's smoothing and nourishing duo. Featuring the Foot Smoothing Board and slip-free Foot Fetish Cream rough soles will soon be a thing of the past. Enter: feet that are ready to dance the night away. Tired-out feet will soon be ready to hop, skip and jump their way through your day thanks to the Samba 2-Step Foot Fetish Care set. First up, the Foot Smoothing Board smooths away rough, hard skin to reveal baby-soft soles. Followed up by the Foot Fetish Cream that's brimming with cupuaçu butter - full of fatty acids, phytosterols and polyphenols - to keep moisture locked in and restore elasticity, and antioxidant-rich açaí oil. The resulting silky soft skin of previously worn-out feet will be enough to have you reaching for your dancing shoes...

name: frank body Original Coffee Scrub 100g
description: Take your coffee addiction to new heights with frank body’s Original Coffee Scrub. Featuring only natural, vegan and good-for-you ingredients, it leaves your skin feeling silllky smooth to the touch and gradually reduces scars and stretchmarks (hurrah!). The formula contains two natural exfoliators; Robusta coffee grinds, which also stimulate blood flow and encourage collagen production, and sea salt to combat flakiness and, thanks to its anti-bacterial properties, tackle spots. To replenish moisture after all that exfoliation, cold pressed sweet almond oil packs a hydrating punch that lasts long after you’ve rinsed it off, and vitamin E helps to fade scars and marks. The result? Smoother, more even, breakout-resistant skin with continued use.

name: Marvis Toothpaste Whitening Mint
description: Put aside your drugstore toothpaste Marvis has all the benefits of your regular paste but with a range of unusual yet pleasurable flavours guaranteed to inject some excitement into your daily ablutions. As youd expect from any toothpaste worth its salt (or should we say, xylitol?), this Whitening Toothpaste cleanses, freshens breath, removes plaque and tartar, and keeps gums in tip-top shape, all while gently lifting stains and preventing discolouration. All encased in a stylish, contemporary silver tube that will look enviably modern on your bathroom shelf, this is guaranteed to put a smile on your face (if only to show off your pearly whites). The toothpaste is available in both full-size (85ml) and travel-friendly (25ml), so you need never be without no matter where your adventures may take you.
how_to_use: Use morning and evening to brush your teeth
ingredient: Glycerin, Hydrated Silica, Aqua, Tetrapotassium Pyrophosphate, Aroma, Xylitol, Titanium Dioxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Limonene, Eugenol

name: Loving Tan 2 Hour Express Mousse 120ml (Various Shades)
description: Created for tan lovers in a time crunch is the salon-inspired formula bringing immediate colour in mere minutes, that still develops over time into a deeper, darker tan after just two hours. Whether you’re running out the door or taking some time for a self care session, the 2 Hour Express Mousse offers the perfect sun-kissed glow every single time. A high concentration of active ingredients delivers a darker, natural olive toned tan in just one layer, and with built-in colour guide technology you can forget about tanning mishaps. No streaky legs here! Our tanning days are few and far between now with a hydrating base of aloe vera and tan-prolonging black walnut extract to extend the longevity of your glow. Choose your intensity from two sun-drenched shades: ‘Medium’ for light to medium skin tones and ‘Dark’ for medium to dark skin. All we need to do now is figure out what to do with all this extra time! Did someone say ‘beach day’?
how_to_use: Apply moisturiser liberally to any dry areas including your hands, feet, ankles, wrists, knees and elbows. Pump a small amount of mousse onto your Loving Tan Deluxe Applicator Mitt. Using circular motions, apply mousse directly to your body, blending as you go to ensure even coverage. Allow sixty seconds before dressing. Avoid perspiration or water while the tan develops. Finally shower off after two hours to reveal a gorgeous, natural tan. For best results apply to clean, dry and exfoliated skin.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Dihydroxyacetone, Propylene Glycol, Ethoxydiglycol, Erythrulose, Witch Hazel, Decyl Glucoside, D-Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol Ethyl Hexyl Glycerin, Julans Nigra (Black Walnut Extract), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Fragrance, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Sodium Bisulfite, FD&C Red 40 (Cl 16035), Red 33 (Cl 14700), Yellow 5 (Cl 19140), Caramel, FD&C Blue 1 (Cl 42090).

name: NUXE Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil 50ml
description: A best-smelling must-have, Nuxe's Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil for Face, Body and Hair is a buffet of goodness for compromised skin - cherishing dry, scaly patches (and strengthening over-styled lengths!) with a medley of plant-derived oils. Completely non-greasy and quickly absorbed, this leaves a light lustre and works to replenish and comfort the scaliest limbs... A holiday hero (slather this all over post-sun skin), the blend of camellia, hazelnut, sweet almond, St. John's wort, macadamia and borage has impressive healing properties - working to elasticise and fortify while boosting moisture levels to promote a healthy glow. Rake through the ends of your hair to create a chic 'piecey-ness', smooth over shoulders or streak down the length of your shins to bestow an au naturel highlight. A multi-tasking wonder, there's a reason no routine should be without it.
how_to_use: Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® in the palm of your hand and add a drop of your usual moisturiser. Mix and apply to your skin using smoothing movements. Your face will be perfectly moisturised, and your skin softer and more supple. Apply to your shoulders, neckline, hands, or other areas that need attention. There is nothing quite like the unique quality of Huile Prodigieuse® to enhance the skin's texture in a single step. · In the palm of your hand, mix a drop of Huile Prodigieuse® with your foundation before applying: it will glide smoothly over your skin. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® on a natural bristle hairbrush for naturally controlled and radiantly shiny hair. Exposure to the sun leaves your skin feeling dehydrated and in need of special care and attention. There is nothing better than Huile Prodigieuse® to nourish and repair it. Ideal as a massage oil, Huile Prodigieuse® glides smoothly over your skin, infusing it with its divine fragrance. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® directly on your hair (from a distance of around 20 cm) and massage into your hair and scalp. Then wrap your head in a warm towel and leave for 15 to 20 minutes to allow Huile Prodigieuse® to penetrate before shampooing. Add a few drops of Huile Prodigieuse® to your bath water and drift away on its joyful and fragrant waves. A daily massage with Huile Prodigieuse® is ideal for alleviating stretch marks.
ingredient: Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Dicaprylyl Ether, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Corylus Avellana (Hazelnut) Seed Oil, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Parfum/Fragrance, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Aqua/Water, Ascorbic Acid, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract, Linalool,Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol [N2212/C].

name: NARS Cosmetics Radiance Primer SPF 35
description: Ask any beauty buff to name their most coveted complexion products and, chances are, NARS will be high up on the list – especially when it comes to Radiance Primer SPF 35/PA+++. Energising and revitalising skin, this oil-free formula features a radiance-boosting complex that instantly revives dull, fatigued skin and adds long-term vitality to the complexion. Applied beneath make up, it enhances the results of your careful artistry and prolongs its wear, with encapsulated sunscreen beads that release on contact with skin for luxurious broad-spectrum protection from the sun’s skin-damaging rays. With a subtle touch of refined pearlescence, the liquid immediately boosts radiance, while also improving skin over time thanks to soothing, anti-inflammatory Evodia Rutecarpa plant extract.
how_to_use: Apply beneath make up or wear alone for a radiant, protected finish.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau , Homosalate , Caprylyl Methicone , Ethylhexyl Salicylate , Dipropylene Glycol , Propanediol , Dimethicone , Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane , Butyloctyl Salicylate , Octocrylene , Lactobacillus Ferment , Isododecane , Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer , Trisiloxane , Polysorbate 60 , Trimethylsiloxysilicate , Dextrin Palmitate , Phenoxyethanol , C14-22 Alcohols , Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer , Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein/Pvp Crosspolymer , Panthenol , Fragrance (Parfum) , Evodia Rutaecarpa Fruit Extract , Dibutyl Ethylhexanoyl Glutamide , Dibutyl Lauroyl Glutamide , Disodium Edta , C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside , Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate , Tocopheryl Acetate , Sodium Hyaluronate , Butylene Glycol , Pentylene Glycol , Tin Oxide , Potassium Sorbate , Hydroxyphenyl Propamidobenzoic Acid , Ethylhexylglycerin , Ascorbyl Palmitate , Citral , Eugenol , Limonene , Linalool , Mica , Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891) , Red 4 (Ci 14700) , Yellow 5 (Ci 19140) ,

name: Sun Bum Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Lotion
description: For everyday living, the Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Lotion is a staple – protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays while nourishing and delicately scenting skin. The OG formula that the sunseekers at Sun Bum actually use every single day, this is enriched with vitamin E. A powerful antioxidant that works to neutralise free radicals, vitamin E prevents skin from falling victim to dehydration, depleting collagen stores and premature ageing. Also water resistant for 80 minutes (that’s a heck of a lot of surf time), the Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Lotion is brimming with the Sun Bum Original Scent, which – as word on the street has it – smells like summer, bottled.
how_to_use: Dispense in hand and apply to body. We recommend working from head to toe so you don't accidentally miss a limb. If you need help reaching your back, ask a friend— that's what they're there for. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure and allow it to absorb. Reapply at least every two hours. Apply more frequently after swimming/sweating, or after an aggressive towel dry. Always offer to share.
ingredient: Aqua, octocrylene, styrene/acrylates copolymer, homosalate, ethylhexyl salicylate, butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane, butyloctyl salicylate, hydrated silica, VP/hexadecene copolymer, dimethicone, polyester-8, glyceryl stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, ethylhexylglycerin, parfum, caprylyl methicone, dimethyl capramide, disodium EDTA, ethylhexyl stearate, sodium polyacrylate, tocopherol, tocopheryl acetate, trideceth-6, behenyl alcohol, trimethylsiloxysilicate, xanthan gum, BHT, phenoxyethanol, benzyl benzoate, coumarin

name: EVY Technology Sunscreen Mousse SPF50 Kids
description: Easy to apply, rapidly absorbable and never sticky or greasy, the lightweight Sunscreen Mousse SPF50 Kids works with the epidermis to deliver both immediate and lasting protection against UVA and UVB rays for up to six hours. (That’s a lot of worry-free adventure time for your little ones!) Exceptionally water-resistant and free of parabens, nanoparticles and perfumes, this formula is ideal for sensitive and delicate young skin. With a quick drying-time and invisible, matte finish, this hydrating mousse actually forms an innovative protective barrier that mimics skin’s natural defences – providing extraordinary protection without clogging pores or sitting on the surface of your skin. Gentle, hypoallergenic, suitable for use from just six months old and totally smudge-proof (even when up against towel rub-downs post swim!) the Sunscreen Mousse SPF50 Kids lasts twice as long as cream formulas and helps to prevent future skin damage. Now you just need a holiday to go with it…
how_to_use: For children younger than 16 years, EVY Technology always recommends SPF 30 or higher. Even children with darker skin should be protected with high UVA protection, because children’s skin is thinner. Reapplication: Thanks to the patented skincare technology, EVY is absorbed into the entire epidermis, rather than sitting on the skin's surface. This results in a much longer-lasting protection. However, in line with regulations, EVY do advise you to reapply frequently, especially as it's easy to miss a spot during the first time around. Recycling: Simply break off the plastic top for plastic recycling and place the aluminium bottle in the metal recycling bin.
ingredient: Aqua, Butane, Propylene Glycol, Octocrylene, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Isobutane, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, PVP, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Polysorbate 20, Triethanolamine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycerin, Propane, Dimethicone.

name: OUAI Scalp & Body Scrub
description: The perfect reset for scalp and skin alike, OUAI Haircare’s Scalp & Body Scrub is the ultimate weekly detox (did someone say self-care Sunday..?) Deep cleansing and gently foaming, the scrub is powered by gently exfoliating sugar crystals which cleanse and soften skin, and conditioning coconut oil to replenish moisture. For even deeper scalp cleansing, Jen Atkin’s top tip is to add a small amount of your favourite OUAI shampoo to this superb scrub.
how_to_use: Scalp: Section wet hair to reveal scalp and massage in circular motions to gently exfoliate. Rinse. Body: Apply to damp skin and massage in circular motions to gently exfoliate. Rinse. Need even deeper cleansing? Add a small amount of your favourite OUAI shampoo to the Scalp & Body Scrub for squeaky clean hair.
ingredient: Sucrose, Aqua (Water, Eau), Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Cocamide MEA, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Propanediol, PEG-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Silica, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Menthyl Lactate, Epilobium Angustifolium Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Hydrolyzed Hibiscus Esculentus Extract, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Seed Extract, Biotinoyl Tripeptide-1, Panthenol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Capryloyl Glycine, Xylitylglucoside, Saccharide Isomerate, Apigenin, Oleanolic Acid, Hexylene Glycol, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, PEG-150 Distearate, Parfum (Fragrance), Cocamide MIPA, Sodium Benzoate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, BHT, Butylene Glycol, Leuconostoc/ Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Sodium Metabisulfite, Sodium Hydroxide, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Geraniol, This product has been reformulated and does not contain Butylphenyl Methylpropional.

name: Le Labo Deodorant
description: A lightweight, long-lasting roll-on, Le Labo’s Deodorant helps to keep underarms fresh, dry and pleasantly scented. Made with plant-derived glycerin to comfort skin and minimise the risk of irritation after shaving, this soothing and balancing blend is abundant with nourishing vitamin E, antioxidants and mineral salts to absorb any odour-causing bacteria. Free from aluminium and delicately scented with a clean, invigorating blend of bergamot, lavender, violet and tonka bean, this is perfect for discerning gentlemen and gentlewomen.
how_to_use: Apply to your underarms and allow a few moments to dry before dressing.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Potassium Alum, Isononyl Isononanoate, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Isohexadecane, Polysorbate 60, T-Butyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Limonene, Phenoxyethanol.

name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Duo+ SPF30 with Niacinamide 40ml
description: The Effaclar Duo+ SPF 30 takes the stress out of environmental exposure so it’s time to make this daily gel moisturiser your year-round hydrator, protector and anti-blemish treatment. Advanced protection is yours thanks to ‘Active Shield XL Protect’ guarding your skin against harmful UVA and UVB rays, Infrared light protection and a strong defence from the effects of pollution thanks to antioxidant carnosine. Not forgetting about those stubborn breakouts, clearer skin is on the horizon in as little as just four weeks thanks to a complex of LHA and our favourite skin-gredient niacinamide. These powerhouse actives work to gently exfoliate and unclog pores, reducing scarring left behind by blemishes and taking down inflammation to alleviate discomfort in sensitive, oily and problematic skin. It’s time to sit back, relax and let La Roche-Posay look after your complexion with this dual-action SPF treatment moisturiser.
how_to_use: Apply to the whole face and neck in circular motions. Avoid eye contour.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Octocrylene, Glycerin, Homosalate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Alcohol, Denat., Niacinamide, Butyl, Methoxydi B E Nzoylmethane, Dimethicone, Sorbitan Stearate, Silica, Isopropyllauroyl, Sarcosinate, Styrene/Acrylates.

name: Pai Skincare The Impossible Glow Bronzing Drops 10ml
description: Great for all skin types and tones, Pai Skincare's The Impossible Glow, Hyaluronic Acid & Sea Kelp Bronzing Drops are perfect for granting a beautifully luminous look (sans the sun damage). Brimming with dew-boosting hyaluronic acid - a natural moisture magnet that acts like you're 'fluffing the stuffing' (if skin cells were cushions) - these drops can be mixed into serum or cream for a gradual glow, or used straight from the bottle to instantly grant an ethereal gleam. Laced with light-scattering pigments to help you look lit-from-within, lemon-derived vitamin C works to brighten while scavenging damaging radicals, while sea kelp delivers long-lasting hydration for skin that looks visibly smooth, firm and radiant.
how_to_use: Mix a few drops into topical serum or cream to enhance its glow-boosting effects, or use 'neat' to instantly grant a warm, holiday glow to your cheeks, forehead, bridge of your nose and your chin for a natural, sunkissed aesthetic.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Citrus Limon Fruit Water* (Lemon Fruit Water), Mica, Glycerin**, Ascophyllum Nodosum Extract (Algae Extract), Sclerotium Gum, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Sodium Levulinate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Anisate, Lactic Acid, Sodium Phytate, Maltodextrin, CI 77019 (Iron Oxides), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide) *Organic / Biologique Of Total: 87% (minus water & minerals) / 23.46% ORGANIC, 93% NATURAL **Mixed organic and non-organic ingredients.

name: Pacifica Coconut & Charcoal Underarm Detox Scrub
description: When transitioning to a natural deodorant, your underarms can often ‘purge’. By purge, we mean sweat more, which is why Pacifica has created the Coconut & Charcoal Underarm Detox Scrub; to help you glide through the awkward detox stage by swiftly unclogging skin. When you begin to use a natural deodorant for the first time, your body releases built-up toxins before stabilising. This process can make you feel sweaty and uncomfortable, which is why this scrub uses gently exfoliating charcoal, antioxidant-rich green tea and soothing coconut to help unclog your pores and bring skin back into balance.
how_to_use: Massage onto your underarm area in a circular motion. Rinse well. Follow with natural deodorant. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. This pretty container is made from PCR (Post Consumer Recycled) plastic. Recycle it again by dropping it in your nearest recycling bin.
ingredient: Aqua, Cetyl Alcohol, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Seed Powder, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Charcoal Powder, Maranta Arundinacea (Arrowroot) Powder, Coco-Caprylate, Hydrolyzed Verbascum Thapsus Flower, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Decyl Glucoside, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Xanthan Gum, Diheptyl Succinate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum (Natural).

name: Drunk Elephant T.L.C. Glycolic Body Lotion 240ml
description: Supercharged with a 10% AHA blend of glycolic, tartaric, lactic and citric acids (the latter three give the blend its name!), the T.L.C. Glycolic Body Lotion effectively exfoliates dull, dry skin. A staple for scaly skin, this resurfacing treatment promotes smooth, luminous results. Replenishing as it resurfaces, this clever formula is loaded with a mix of antioxidant-rich, non-fragrant plant oils and butters — think green tea seed, passionfruit, apricot, marula, and shea— to soothe and deeply moisturise dry, irritated skin. A helping of squalane, vitamin F, sodium hyaluronate and niacinamide then helps to encourage a stronger, healthier acid mantle, leaving your skin more equipped to defend against environmental stressors. A must for compromised skin, the lotion even boosts the production of vital natural moisturising factors — like ceramides and cholesterol — that keep skin soft and supple.
how_to_use: Apply to clean, dry skin once per day. Those new to AHA exfoliation may want to start slowly, using T.L.C. Glycolic Body Lotion every other day for the first week of application. Note: Slight tingling may be experienced, particularly for the first few days of application. This typically dissipates as your skin becomes adjusted. May be mixed with Sili™ Body Lotion for a milder exfoliation experience. WARNING: Use only as directed. Avoid eye contact. Discontinue use immediately if irritation occurs and consult a physician. Use a sunscreen daily while using this product and for a week after ceasing use. Product’s contact with skin must be of limited frequency or duration. Do not use on broken skin. Drunk Elephant don’t recommend using T.L.C. Glycolic Body Lotion the same day as shaving. Consider sticking to one form of exfoliation — physical or chemical — per day (or as often as you find works for you). Try alternating T.L.C. Glycolic Body Lotion with Sugared Koffie Scrub. Great for smoothing rough, bumpy areas on the body, from your décolleté to your derrière.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycolic Acid, Coconut Alkanes, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Propanediol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Squalane, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Niacinamide, Sodium PCA, Lactic Acid, Tartaric Acid, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Schinziophyton Rautanenii Kernel Oil, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Tapioca Starch, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Juice Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ximenia Americana Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Allantoin, Quercetin, Linoleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Tocopherol, Citric Acid, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polysorbate 60, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Carbonate, Sodium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin.

name: Margaret Dabbs London Professional Foot File +2 Replacement Pads
how_to_use: File areas of thickened or calloused skin, filing towards the mid line of the foot. Clean Foot File with soapy water and dab dry. To change worn pads, peel back used pad and replace with new self-adhesive replacement, pressing firmly into position on the file. Do not immerse or leave foot file in water. To obtain best results, use on dry skin once a week. Do not use on broken or irritated skin. Finish with the Intensive Treatment Foot Oil to maximise the foot-smoothing and softening process, then slick on some polish and dare to don your most barely-there toe posts. Margaret's top tip: "You wouldn’t exfoliate your face without following on with a moisturiser and the same applies to the feet, it should always be a dedicated foot product like our {Intensive Hydrating Foot Lotion}.”

name: Spotlight Toothpaste for Rebuilding Teeth 100ml
description: Elevating oral care (about time!) with mindful formulas and thoughtful packaging, Spotlight Oral Care provides 360Ëš tooth and gum care, while brightening (and whitening!) your smile to boost your oral health and beauty. Leaving your mouth feeling amazingly clean and refreshed, Spotlight Oral Cares Toothpaste for Rebuilding Teeth unites fluoride with hydroxyapatite to eliminate cavity-causing bacteria while working to strengthen enamel and counteract early erosion. Harnessing the latest developments in oral care to remineralise translucent, weak or chipping teeth, this minty fresh paste is contained in completely recyclable packaging minimising the detrimental contribution of dental care products to landfill (and leaving your conscience as clean as your grin).
how_to_use: Use twice daily. Brush teeth and rinse off after use.
ingredient: Sorbitol, Aqua, Hydrated Silica, Glycerin, Potassium Citrate, Hydroxyapatite, Calcium Carbonate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Monofluorophosate, Sodium Saccharin, CI 77891.

name: Le Labo Shower Gel
description: An indulgent in-shower experience, Le Labos Shower Gel boasts a skin-nourishing cocktail of sesame, rosemary leaf and sunflower oils (without any parabens, phthalates or artificial colouring!) to gently but thoroughly cleanse and condition. Creating a creamy, conditioning lather to ensure an opulent, spa-worthy wash, this rich and replenishing gel works to gently dissolve any grime while enveloping you with its heavenly perfume. With three scents to choose from Basil (a fresh verdant scent with a hint of verbena to lend a crisp, citrus-y edge), Hinoki (which conjures the mystical warmth and hypnotic allure of the resinous wood that suffuses the temples of Japans Mount Koya) and Mandarin (a mood-boosting medley of mandarin oils and geranium leaf) the only downside is deciding which blend to use when!
how_to_use: Massage over damp skin. Follow with your favourite Le Labo Body Lotion or Cream.

name: Frank Body Charcoal Body Scrub and Mask 140g
description: We don't know about you but body breakouts have foiled one too many outfit plans... That's why we couldn't wait to welcome frank body's Charcoal Body Scrub + Mask: a purifying scrub that doubles as a blemish-battling mask for your back, chest and booty. Not only does it make quick work of dead skin cells and daily debris but it also softens your skin and clarifies your pores. How, you ask? Charcoal draws out impurities (a.k.a. the bad guys behind blemishes) to promote clear, even skin; tea tree oil lends its anti-inflammatory properties to fend against breakouts, as well as reducing the look of scarring; caffeine promotes firm, toned skin; grapeseed oil deeply moisturises without exacerbating congestion to soften bumps and marks; finally, antioxidant-rich milk thistle oil counters free radicals to help maintain a youthful finish.
how_to_use: Step 1: Get naked. Check. Step 2: Get wet in the shower. Step 3: Scrub with the Charcoal Body Scrub & Mask all over, focusing on blemish-prone areas: booty, chest, arms, back. Step 4: Hands off. Let the scrub sit on your skin for 5 minutes and watch as it turns into a mask. Magic. Rinse and repeat 2-3 times a week. Or whenever skin needs some TLC.

Total Naturally Derived 98.37%

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Hydrating Suncream Tinted SPF50 50ml
description: Minimalist in formulation but giving far from minimal results, we introduce you to the ultra-comforting tinted SPF with maximum protection for sensitive complexions. This is the ultimate skin protector for reactive skin to keep it safe from UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA rays. Counteracting the usual white streaks left behind by traditional SPFs, this is formulated with a tinted pigment to keep your complexion perfected. Resistant to water, sweat and sand this non-greasy, comforting cream is ticking all our boxes and heading straight in our bags to keep our complexion protected and hydrated all year-round.
how_to_use: For daily usage and sun exposure. Apply the sunscreen product just before exposure. Re-apply frequently and generously to maintain protection, especially after perspiring or towelling.

name: Aesop Mouthwash 500ml
description: Maintain impeccable oral hygiene the natural way with Aesop’s Mouthwash, a pH-balancing, alcohol-free take on breath-freshening. The formula features clove, anise and spearmint to create a minty, herbal taste that’s refreshing and soothing. Totally natural and dye-free, the blend won’t upset the delicate pH of the mouth – simply swig generously and gargle prior to all public appearances to ensure that you’re completely confident. Housed in a beautiful, apothecary-style vessel, this makes a great addition to your bathroom shelf – as well as to your teeth-cleaning regime.
how_to_use: Aesop recommends that you swig generously and gargle after brushing and prior to all public appearances.

name: OUAI Chill Pills Bath Bombs 6 x 42.5g
description: A soon-to-be staple in your self-care ritual, these Chill Pills are Ouai’s answer to hectic days and frazzled minds. Nothing short of a soak saviour, these ultra-moisturising tablets melt into warm water, dispersing a silky blend of oils to soften and smooth your skin. Plus, the beautiful ‘Jasmine Rose’ scent carries a delicately floral profile that lingers lightly even after your bath. Featuring jojoba seed oil (to supply and lock in lasting moisture), hemp seed oil (for its soothing and hydrating properties and to smooth texture) and safflower seed oil (to enhance your natural radiance and cleanse your skin), expect a velvety, never greasy, softening effect. The grown up - by this we mean there’s no garish colour or glitter stains - bath bomb you never knew you needed, take one (or half) with a tub of hot water for deeply relaxing, skin-conditioning results.
how_to_use: Add to warm bath water for a relaxing, skin-nourishing, cleansing experience.
ingredient: Sodium Bicarbonate, Citric Acid, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Fragrance (Parfum), Cannabis Sativa Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Aqua (Water, Eau), Linalool, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal.

name: HELLO KLEAN Shower Filter
description: It only takes having a shower in a different part of the country to notice just how much of an effect water has on your skin and strands. That's why the minds behind HELLO KLEAN created their fan-favourite Shower Filter... Though hard water is just freshwater infused with minerals that offer health benefits, those same minerals - like calcium, magnesium, iron, nickel and copper - can prevent the surfactants in your shampoo from lathering, and contribute to buildup. Effectively capturing those minerals that can dry your skin and give way to soap scum, as well as filtering bacteria, impurities and chlorine, this screw-on filter (don't be deterred, it's super easy to fit) effectively improves the quality of the water flowing over you so you can enjoy smoother, softer skin and hair. How does it work? The sleek tool has stainless mesh to capture sand and other sediments; calcium sulfite to remove chlorine; KDF 55 to target minerals and residual chlorine; granular activated carbon to remove bacteria, mould and odours; finally, ceramic beads help to balance your shower water's pH level. We've never been more ready to dive in the shower...
how_to_use: No plumber or tools needed. Installation in just two minutes... Remove the white and blue caps, then unscrew your shower hose from the tap. Attach the filter to the bottom of your shower tap. Then re-attach your shower hose. Tighten both sides to prevent leakage. Run your shower water for 1 minute and that's it.
ingredient: Ingredients: Calcium Sulfite, KDF 55, Granular Activated Carbon, Ceramic Beads (Zeolite, Tourmaline, FIR) Filter Case Material: Aluminum Capsule Case Material: ABS Recyclable Plastic Filter Dimensions: 65.5mm X 180mm Capsule Dimensions: 50mm X 115mm Product Weight: 450 grams Entry and Exit Valve: 1/2" thread Flow Rate: 8 liters per minute

name: NAYDAYA Scar Saviour
description: Packed with plant-derived ingredients your skin will happily lap up, this vegan skin recovery balm hydrates skin deeply while helping to minimise the appearance of all kinds of scarring - including stretch marks and C-section scars. Free from lanolin and beeswax, this mega effective balm (a little goes a long way!) uses instead natural ingredients that really work. Marshmallow root, an anti-inflammatory that contains high levels of vitamin D, helps to heal both old and new scars. Liquorice root is rich in antioxidants and works hard to reduce hyperpigmentation (that's the discolouration or dark marks than can appear around scarring). And finally, turmeric, which is packed with powerful active ingredient curcumin, lowers your body's response to cutaneous wounds by decreasing inflammation and oxidation, helping them to heal more quickly.
how_to_use: *Apply gently to your scar, and gently massage the area. A little goes a long way. *Scar Saviour can be used as soon as your C-section stitches have been removed or dissolved. *Safe during pregnancy, breastfeeding, and for use on children.
ingredient: Cocos nucifera Oil (Organic Coconut Oil Unfractionated), Ricinus Communis Seed Oil (Organic Castor Oil), Olea europaea fruit oil (Organic Olive Oil) Euphorbia Cerifera Cera (Candelilla Wax), Theobroma cacao seed butter(Organic Coco Butter) Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract (Organic Liquorice Root Extract), Prunus amygdalus dulcis seed oil, (Organic Sweet Almond Oil), Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil (Organic Jojoba Oil), Curcuma Longa Root Extract (Organic Turmeric Extract), Althaea Officinalis Root Extract , (Organic Marshmallow Root Extract), Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (Organic Argan Oil) Tocopherol (Vitamin E)

name: St. Tropez Dual Sided Luxe Tanning Applicator Mitt
description: This soft, sponge mitt with a water-resistant barrier ensures your favourite St.Tropez faux glow formula glides across seamlessly for a streak-free and even finish you’ll absolutely adore. Perfect for using with mousse, lotion or spray, this easy-to-use mitt evenly distributes products across skin without absorbing product. Featuring a handy water-resistant barrier, this mitt also ensures no product soaks through and stains your hands too. Simply spritz or pump your chosen faux glow onto the mitt and work into the skin in circular motions.
how_to_use: Apply your chosen tanner to the mitt and blend into skin using circular motions ensuring you cover every inch of skin for an even finish.
ingredient: Polyester 53%, Polyurethane 47%

name: OUAI Body Crème Melrose Place 212g
description: Here to extend their all-nourishing ingredients past your tresses and right through to every inch of your body is OUAI’s Melrose Body Crème. Whipped to perfection in an ultra-lightweight and bouncy consistency is this moisture-filled creamy cure for skin that needs rescuing from the perils of dryness. Locked into this magical jar are some of the most highly effective moisture-magnets that work harmoniously together to give your skin optimum hydration. It’s filled to the brim with skin-loving essentials like cupuaçu butter, a superfruit ingredient from Brazil, squalane to remedy any drier textures without grease and coconut oil for added suppleness. With just one dollop, you can restore the shine and softness that your skin craves for a healthy looking glow…
how_to_use: Apply the lotion liberally to your body to hydrate and soothe skin. Use deep, circular massaging motions to apply to thighs, abdomen, or any other areas that need a moisture boost.

name: Kopari Beauty Tahitian Vanilla Hydrating Body Wash 266ml
description: Step aside supermarket shower gel because this vegan body wash employs the hardest-working, hydrating ingredients, making it the ideal shower staple for skin in need of a big gulp of water. Powered by coconut, this gel-based formula is teeming with electrolytes and amino acids to replenish hydration levels to their maximum level. As it lathers to a rich foam, sea kelp delivers antioxidants and vitamins A, B, C and E to bolster hydration and protect your skin from free radicals, respectively. Plus, this concoction infuses aloe vera juice to smooth and calm skin. The conclusion? This tropical trio is just the thing you need to cleanse away the day without stripping your skin. Once you step out of the shower, expect to continue stealing the show as the luxurious scent of warm Tahitian vanilla — think: buttery cream goodness — follows your (now ultra-clean) footsteps.
how_to_use: Squeeze, lather, and rinse. TIP: Use a washcloth or loofah for extra lather. How to recycle STEP 1: Separate components STEP 2: Rinse STEP 3: Refill, reuse, or recycle

name: COOLA Guava Mango Spray SPF 50 177ml
description: Great for long days in the sun, COOLA’s quick and convenient Classic Sunscreen Spray SPF50 comes with two choices – 'Fragrance Free' or 'Guava Mango' – to cater to sensitive skin or evoke summer vibes while protecting you from the ageing effects of UV and aggressors. Flooding your skin with a buffet of nourishing nutrients – including the brand’s proprietary Plant Protection Complex – this featherlight, non-greasy formula’s quickly absorbed and is both sweat and water-resistant for up to 80 minutes. With 70+% certified organic ingredients and without any parabens, gluten or cruelty, this reef-safe screen is ‘Hawaii Reef Compliant’, vegan and is widely recyclable – meaning it’s great for your skin and your conscience!
how_to_use: Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, and at least every two hours. How to recycle COOLA's SPF Sprays: Step 1: Enjoy and use ALL of your SPF spray. Step 2: Once the spray is completely empty, take the product to your local recycling centre (COOLA do not recommend disassembling the spray).

name: Bondi Sands SPF 50+ Fragrance Free Sunscreen Lotion Pump Pack 500ml
description: Ready for a sun-kissed glow? The first step starts with the SPF 50+ Fragrance Free 4 Star Sunscreen Lotion Pump Pack that applies like a dream and offers a high level of protection all year round! Shielding skin from UVA and UVB rays, this sunscreen is essential to keeping your skin looking youthful and slowing the clock down on the ageing process. Totally fragrance-free and lush in texture, every picture perfect beach day (think: Bondi!) starts here. It even has vitamin E for added skin-smoothing and hydrating benefits. What’s more, you don’t have to worry about it going to waste as soon as you enter the sea because this water-resistant lotion ensures that you’re protected for up to four hours - by then we reckon you’ll be back on the beach and reach for another top up of this fast-absorbing body lotion.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Apply liberally and evenly to all unprotected areas 15 to 20 minutes before exposure to the sun. Re-apply every 2 hours, or more often when sweating and after swimming, exercise and towel drying.

name: RecycleMe Recycling Bag
description: Amassing a mountain of empties you want to recycle but don't know how to? Our Recycle Me initiative aims to offset the impact of beauty obsession by processing typically tough-to-recycle materials. Whenever you're ready, sort through your empties and give them a clean to remove any residue. Fill your FREEPOST Recycle Me bag with your empties and pop them in the post. We'll sort through and pass the hard to recycle products onto our partner for them to be repurposed - rather than ending up in landfill.
how_to_use: Shop it Once your basket is filled to the brim add a Recycle Me bag to your order (you'll incur a small fee). Clean it Whenever you're ready, sort through your empties and give them a clean to remove any residue. Post it Fill your FREEPOST Recycle Me bag with your empties and pop them in the post. Recycle it. We'll sort through and pass the hard to recycle products onto our partner for them to be repurposed - rather than ending up in landfill.

name: Aesop Resurrection Rinse-Free Hand Wash 50ml
description: Resurrection Rinse-Free Hand Wash is the aristocracy of hand sanitisers. Boasting a non-drying, alcohol-based formulation, it cleanses your skin without requiring a sink, so it's perfect for travelling and looking after adventure-prone little ones. The packaging is so much chicer than most hand sanitisers and regular use won't dry your hands, instead, moisturising agents make for soft and re-hydrated skin. It comes in a lightweight plastic bottle and the gel smells divinely of mandarin rind, rosemary leaf and cedar wood atlas: making this a real pleasure to use – as well as a bacteria-busting powerhouse.

name: Bondi Sands Technocolor Application Mitt
description: Designed to pair with the innovative Bondi Sands Technocolour tanning range, the Bondi Sands Technocolour Application Mitt makes tell-tale orange palms and knuckles a thing of the past. This premium, double-sided mitt is made from a luxe velvety material to keep hands stain-free while ensuring a flawless tan. Featuring a thumb-grip for easy buffing and blending, sweep the mitt along limbs in long strokes and use in a circular motion over tricky-to-blend areas for a streak-free finish every time. Washable and reusable, simply rinse well and hang from the handy loop after each use.
how_to_use: For an even streak free tan, ensure your skin is clean, exfoliated and free of any moisturisers. Apply a desired amount of Bondi Sands product to the Application Mitt. Use a long, sweeping motion to apply product to legs, arms and body. Use remaining residue on mitt for face, elbows and knees. Rinse mitt with warm water and allow to dry thoroughly after every use.

name: Sun Bum Original SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion
description: For everyday living, the Original SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion is a staple – protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays while nourishing and delicately scenting skin. The OG formula that the sunseekers at Sun Bum actually use every single day, this is enriched with vitamin E. A powerful antioxidant that works to neutralise free radicals, vitamin E prevents skin from falling victim to dehydration, depleting collagen stores and premature ageing. Also water resistant for 80 minutes (that’s a heck of a lot of surf time), the Original SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion is brimming with the Sun Bum Original Scent, which – as word on the street has it – smells like summer, bottled.
how_to_use: Dispense in hand and apply to body. We recommend working from head to toe so you don't accidentally miss a limb. If you need help reaching your back, ask a friend— that's what they're there for. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure and allow it to absorb. Reapply at least every two hours. Apply more frequently after swimming/sweating, or after an aggressive towel dry. Always offer to share.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Charlotte's Magic Body Cream 50ml
description: Inspired by the MUA’s award-winning Magic Cream, this reviving formula is here to transform your limbs and beyond with intense hydration and moisture that lasts up to 24 hours. Energising caffeine works to reduce the appearance of cellulite alongside damask rose water and the brand’s ALGAKTIV UPLIFT, which simultaneously tighten and firm the skin. Soybean is also key for its softening benefits, boosted with smoothing sunflower oil and plumping glycerin for a radiant finish.
how_to_use: Apply to clean, dry skin daily using the palm of your hand, massage in upward sweeping motions — focusing on the stomach and thighs — towards the heart to help boost circulation and stimulate blood flow. For a lymphatic drainage massage: using the fingertips, gently glide over the skin towards the nearest lymph node — encouraging fluid drainage and toxins. To relieve joint tension: gently massage in circular movements around the joints (ankles, kneecaps, elbows and wrists) to relieve tension.

name: Aesop Resurrection Hand Cleanser and Balm Duet
description: Uniting two full size cult classics, this Resurrection Duet boasts a £10 saving(!) and is your ticket to an über-chic toiletries set that will look and smell incredible - go on, treat yourself or a loved one! A beautiful hand washing gel that cleanses without drying, Aesop’s Resurrection Hand Wash actually softens your hands. The antibacterial properties of mandarin and rosemary extracts help to cleanse, while lavender assists skin in feeling soothed and hydrated. It's brilliant for people who like to wash their hands a lot or who have sensitive skins. Meanwhile, this classic Aesop hand lotion not only sinks in quickly without making your hands greasy and unusable (anyone with a slightly difficult bathroom door knob knows the potential hand cream dangers). It smells beautifully of Mandarin oil, Rosemary Leaf and Cedarwood and works well with the Resurrection hand wash. This moisturiser softens rough skin, cuticles and nails and can be used all over the body, especially for a foot massage... anyone?
how_to_use: Wash: You can use this to wash your hands or body, make sure you rinse well afterwards. Balm: Use this hand cream whenever your hands feel dry or just after washing them to keep them looking and feeling in tip top condition.

Contains nut derivatives.

name: MALIN + GOETZ Best Sellers Travel Kit
description: This convenient kit contains minis of six of MALIN + GOETZ’s most loved hair, body and face products, each enclosed within the brand’s signature chic, sustainable packaging. At 30ml each, these travel-friendly tubes can be thrown into your hand luggage for on-the-go top ups of your skincare favourites. To soothe stressed post-flight skin, the kit includes the gentle amino acid-infused Grapefruit Cleanser and the calming Vitamin E Face Moisturizer. For hair, look to the energising Peppermint Shampoo (great for when the jet lag kicks in) and smoothing Cilantro Hair Conditioner loaded with hydrating shea butter. Finally, for body you can’t go wrong with the kit’s cleansing-not-stripping Bergamot Hand + Body Wash followed by the Vitamin B5 Body Moisturiser, which deeply nourishes thanks to provitamin b5 and skin-essential fatty acids.
how_to_use: Face: Lather a small amount of cleanser in hands and gently massage onto wet skin. Rinse clean with water. Apply a small amount of moisturizer to cleansed, dry skin. Body: Apply body wash to wet skin, gently work into a lather and rinse clean. Apply moisturiser to cleansed, dry skin. Hair: Massage a small amount of shampoo onto wet hair and scalp to create a gentle lather. Rinse clean. Apply a small amount of conditioner to clean, wet hair, especially the ends. Leave on for three minutes, then rinse clean.
