name: Spotlight Oral Care Toothpaste for Whitening Teeth 100ml
description: Elevating oral care (about time!) with mindful formulas and thoughtful packaging, Spotlight Oral Care provides 360Ëš tooth and gum care, while brightening (and whitening!) your smile to boost your oral health and beauty. Leaving your mouth feeling amazingly clean and refreshed, Spotlight Oral Cares Toothpaste for Whitening Teeth unites sodium fluoride with stain-removing hydrogen peroxide to polish your teeth and eliminate cavity-causing bacteria while working to lighten and brighten. Harnessing the latest developments in oral care to strengthen teeth and cherish gums, this minty fresh paste is contained in completely recyclable packaging minimising the detrimental contribution of dental care products to landfill (and leaving your conscience as clean as your teeth).
how_to_use: Use twice daily. Brush teeth and rinse off after use.

name: Megababe The Cream Deo Daily Deodorant with Odor-Blocking AHAs 88ml
description: Offering a natural defence against odour, ingrown hairs and uneven skin tone, Megababe’s The Cream Deo is an unusual cream-texture deodorant that’s about to earn a spot in your morning essentials line up. What makes this deodorant so special? It all comes down to 5% AHAs (a mix of mandelic and lactic acids). These work to create a slightly acidic pH level on your pits, helping to block odour-causing bacteria while also declogging pores to gently prevent and treat ingrown hairs and pimples. And to help keep that sensitive skin smooth and soft, there’s also a blend of niacinamide, squalane and vitamin E. Finish that all off with a light scent of mint and tea tree for long-lasting freshness — all without aluminium, parabens, phthalates or sulfates.
how_to_use: Squeeze a thin layer directly onto clean, dry pits. Apply daily as often as needed. As with any aluminum-free deodorant, some wetness is normal. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun & particularly the possibility of sunburn. When outdoors, use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing & limit sun exposure.
ingredient: Water, Tapioca (Manihot Esculenta) Starch, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isoamyl Laurate, Lactic Acid, Triethyl Citrate, Saccharomyces Ferment, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propanediol, Behenyl Alcohol, Mandelic Acid, Cetearyl Olivate, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Olivate, Hydrated Silica, Niacinamide, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Squalane, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycerin, Eucalyptus Radiata Flower/Leaf/Stem Oil, Xylityl Sesquicaprylate, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydroxyacetophenone, Silica, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Anhydroxylitol, Eucalyptol, Menthol, Menthone, Isomenthone, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice.

name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Lait Urea 5+ Lotion 400ml
description: Dry skin and flakiness? We wouldn't know a thing about that maidmoiselle thanks to the Lipikar Lait Urea 5+ Smoothing Lotion. Whipped into a fluid yet buttery dream, this cream delivers intense moisture to rough textures to restore baby-soft skin in an instant! Used as a targeted treatment for eczema and psoriasis this skin-softening lotion heroes the ultimate dry skin saviour, urea and is used with nourishing shea butter and glycerin for soft skin goals. Gently exfoliating dead skin cells to reveal a renewed and repaired skin barrier full of moisture-magnetic lipids, you can quite literally bid dryness a-dew. Psssst... it gets better - further enriched by La Roche-Posay's Thermal Spring Water, mannose and allantoin, you can rest assured that your skin is boosted with next level hydration that'll prevent future irritation. Sounds like a dream? Adding to basket would make it a reality that you won't want to miss out on...
how_to_use: Apply once or twice a day with gentle massage movements preferably after cleansing.
ingredient: Aqua / Water, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, Glycerin, Urea, Dimethicone, Sodium Lactate, Brassica Campestris Seed Oil / Rapeseed Seed Oil, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Pentylene Glycol, Peg-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Stearic Acid, Glycine, Allantoin, Sodium Hydroxide, Myristic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Mannose, Hydroxyethylpiperazine Ethane Sulfonic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Xanthan Gum, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tocopherol, Chlorhexidine Digluconate, Parfum / Fragrance (F.I.L. B233798/1).

name: Fresh Sugar Roll-On Deodorant Antiperspirant 75ml
description: Enriched with brown sugar to attract and maintain moisture levels, fresh's alcohol-free Sugar Roll-On Deodorant Antiperspirant provides long-lasting protection from odour while refreshing the senses with the brand's iconic Sugar scent. The blend of brown sugar helps inhibit odour-causing bacteria, while natural extracts such as aloe leaf extract and witch hazel water that soothe, restore, and revive the skin. Finally, meadowsweet extract and oat kernel extract regulates sebum production. With its non-staining glide-on applicator, it also absorbs extraordinarily quick to achieve comfortable dryness with a delicious scent all day long.
how_to_use: Apply to underarms only.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Aluminum Chlorohydrate, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Steareth-2, Steareth-20, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Spiraea Ulmaria Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Faex (Yeast Extract), Glyceryl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Parfum (Fragrance), Sucrose, Propylene Glycol, BHT, Limonene, Citral, Linalool, Geraniol, Phenoxyethanol Fresh product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a fresh product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

name: St. Tropez Tan Remover Mitt
description: This specially designed mitt effectively removes tan build up and buffs away dry skin, leaving it ready to reapply a perfect sun-kissed tan base. An SOS treatment for even fully developed tans, this intelligent mitt helps to correct tanning mistakes as well as helping to ensure skin in super soft, silky and perfect for a flawless tan application. Simply wet skin and gently buff in circular motions on the targeted area to help erase mistakes and soften skin in rough areas.
how_to_use: Use on wet skin in gentle circular motions with your regular bath or shower products. Apply extra pressure to elbows, knees, ankles, feet and hands or where tan build up is obvious. To correct tanning mistakes, dampen skin then use your index finger inside the mitt and apply to the affected area.

name: Sun Bum Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Face Stick
description: Protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays while moisturising and delicately scenting skin, the Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Face Stick seamlessly glides onto skin without leaving a greasy residue. Incredibly easy to use and bolstered by calming aloe, this seamless formula is even enriched with nourishing vitamin E. A powerful antioxidant that works to neutralise free radicals, vitamin E prevents skin from falling victim to dehydration, depleting collagen stores and premature ageing. Also water resistant for 80 minutes (that’s a heck of a lot of surf time), the Original SPF 30 Sunscreen Face Stick is brimming with the Sun Bum Original Scent, which – as word on the street has it – smells like summer, bottled.
how_to_use: Apply sunscreen stick to your face 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply sunscreen after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying and at least every 2 hours.
ingredient: ethylhexyl palmitate, parfum, aloe barbadensis leaf extract, chamomilla recutita flower extract, cucumis sativus fruit extract, glycerin, helianthus annuus seed oil, hydrolyzed elastin, propylene glycol, tocopheryl acetate, benzyl salicylate, butylphenyl methylpropional, geraniol, hexyl cinnamal, limonene, linalool

name: Paula's Choice Clear Ultra-Light Daily Mattifying Fluid SPF 30+ (60ml)
description: Formulated for oilier, blemish-prone skin types, this featherweight moisturiser keeps skin balanced, healthy and calm – not to mention protected from harmful and ageing UV rays with broad-spectrum SPF30. With a non-greasy fluid consistency, the clever formula mattifies excess shine and minimises the appearance of pores to lend a smooth canvas perfectly primed for make up application or for wearing in its bare, beautiful glory. A blend of vitamin-dense plant extracts – think: green tea, pomegranate and goji among others – add their antioxidant properties to the mix, soothing any upsets, fading red marks and defending against environmental stressors. Perfect for wearing the daytime, this multi-tasking hero comes in both full (60ml) and travel (15ml) sizes – perfect for on-the-go or trialling before investing in the full size.
how_to_use: Apply as the last step in your morning skincare routine. Allow a moment to dry before applying makeup. Allergic to aspirin (acetylsalicylate)? Do not use this product as it contains salicylate derivatives (incl. Homosalate).
ingredient: Aqua, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate (7,5%, Octinoxate, sunscreen), Glycerin (skin replenishing), Ethylhexyl Salicylate (5%, Octisalate, sunscreen), Silica (absorbent), Octocrylene (2%, sunscreen), Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane (2%, Avobenzone, sunscreen), Dimethicone (hydration), Tocopherol (vitamin E/antioxidant), Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract (skin-soothing/calms redness), Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract (antioxidant), Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract (antioxidant), Camellia Oleifera (Green Tea) Leaf Extract (antioxidant), Peucedanum Graveolens (Dill) Extract (antioxidant), Sambucus Nigra (Black Elderberry) Fruit Extract (antioxidant), Avena Sativa (Oat) Bran Extract (skin-soothing), Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract (antioxidant), Lycium Barbarum (Goij) Fruit Extract (antioxidant), Hydrogenated Lecithin (skin-restoring), Titanium Dioxide (texture-enhancing), Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer (hydration), Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate (hydration), Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer (texture-enhancing), Xanthan Gum (texture-enhancing), Sodium Carbomer (texture-enhancing), Benzyl Alcohol (preservative), Sodium Benzoate (stabilizer), Potassium Sorbate (stabilizer), Phenoxyethanol (preservative).

name: HELLO KLEAN Shower Filter Refill Capsule
description: Keep your {Shower Filter} on top form by replacing the inner capsule ever 3-4 months with one of these handy Shower Filter Refills. Just as you stock up on shampoo and body wash when they run low, you can tell when you need a replacement filter if you notice a significant reduction in water flow - a key sign of accumulated sediment. While each capsule's lifecycle can fluctuate depending on the level of free chlorine, the hardness or pH balance of your water and how often your shower, as a general rule of thumb HELLO KLEAN suggest switching them up every 3-4 months or after 13,000 litres of water, whichever comes first! Designed to improve the quality of your water so you can enjoy smoother, softer skin and hair, this filter has stainless mesh to capture sand and other sediments; calcium sulfite to remove chlorine; KDF 55 to target minerals and residual chlorine; granular activated carbon to remove bacteria, mould and odours; finally, ceramic beads help to balance your shower water's pH level. We've never been more ready to dive in the shower...
how_to_use: Detach your filter from your shower hose and unscrew the lid before replacing the existing capsule with your new one.
ingredient: Calcium Sulfite, KDF 55, Granular Activated Carbon, Ceramic Beads (Zeolite, Tourmaline, FIR)

name: Weleda Skin Food Body Lotion 200ml
description: Designed to quench thirsty skin and deliver a wave of hydration, Weleda's Skin Food Body Lotion grants dry skin the nutrition it needs to look and feel its best. Boasting a balanced mix of skin-protecting organic sunflower seed oil and shea butter, along with an array of botanical extracts including calendula, pansy and chamomile, this easily absorbed cream is a restorative powerhouse, activating the skin's own regenerative capacity. It's also worth mentioning that it not only indulges skin but your senses too thanks to the infusion sweet orange and aromatic lavender. Get ready for skin to feel supple, soft, healthy - and smell divine...
how_to_use: Apply daily to your skin after showering or bathing, and spread gently.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Alcohol, Glyceryl Sterate Citrate, Betaine, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tapioca Starch, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Sorbitan Olivate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Viola Tricolor Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol, Lactic Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Limonene*, Linalool*, Benzyl Benzoate*, Benzyl Cinnamate*, Geraniol*. *From natural essential oils and/or plant extract

name: Laura Mercier Ambre Vanille Serum Body Cream 200ml
description: Want to take your body care routine to the next spa-worthy level? Cue peak pampering with the Serum Body Cream, an opulent, oil-rich moisturiser overflowing with skin-smoothing (and soothing) nourishment. Combining its featherlight airiness with barrier-supporting occlusives like French olive oil, French plum seed oil, squalane and shea butter, this deeply penetrating cream restores your skin's elasticity with every gentle massage. Blurring texture thanks to tapioca starch, this sophisticated serum-powered staple forms a protective layer over compromised moisture barriers, rescuing skin from the brink of you-know-what. Encouraging new cell turnover, healthy-looking radiance and available in a host of gourmand scented variations, this intensely hydrating cream excites your senses with everything from fresh floral notes of tangerine and tiger orchid in 'Ambre Vanille' to sensual citrus accords found in 'Nèroli du Sud'. C'est bon!
how_to_use: Gently massage Serum Body Cream onto clean skin using a circular motion. For the ultimate beauty experience, use our Aromatic Bath Oil prior to applying the Body Cream. Follow by layering the Eau de Parfum on top. This technique will give even more life and depth to your fragrance experience.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Coco-Caprylate, Propanediol, Fragrance (Parfum), Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Squalane, Diheptyl Succinate, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Prunus Domestica Seed Oil, Porphyridium Cruentum Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Tocopherol, Polysorbate 60, Tapioca Starch, Maris Aqua/Sea Water/Eau De Mer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol.

name: Hello Sunday The Take-Out One - Invisible Sun Stick SPF 30
description: A multipurpose stick that provides SPF protection and convenience all in one, Hello Sunday’s The Take-Out One - Invisible Sun Stick SPF30 is perfect for top-ups on-the-go – seamlessly fitting into pockets and bags, and cleverly encouraging you to stay safe, no matter where you are or what you’re doing. A delightfully refreshing scent of lime, geranium and mint make this a feast for the olfactory senses as well as your skin, with a completely invisible finish (white casts are so passé) that glides over your body with zero residue. Ideal for applying and reapplying even over make up, this stick is equipped with broad spectrum SPF 30 – offering protection against both UVA and UVB rays. But a simple SPF this is not – fortified with hyaluronic acid and a medley of nourishing oils, this formula ensures skin is always moisturised and glowy too.
how_to_use: Swipe over skin for swift sun protection. Reapply every two hours.
ingredient: Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Hexyldecanol, Coconut Alkanes, Octocrylene, Silica, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Dibutyl Lauroyl Glutamide, Polyester-7, Dibutyl Ethylhexanoyl Glutamide, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Parfum, Alcohol Denat., Vp/Dimethylaminoethylmethacrylate Copolymer, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Gossypium Herbaceum Seed Oil, Limonene, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Citral, Tocopherol, Coumarin, Linalool, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Hydrogenated Palm Kernel Glycerides, Ci 60725, Ci 77491, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lecithin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Citric Acid

name: Lancaster Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Lotion 400ml
description: Love your Lancaster golden tan? What if you could prolong it for an endless summer sensation? Lancaster's Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Lotion is specially developed for those who want to prolong their beautiful holiday tan while soothing their sun-exposed skin. Formulated with a special repairing complex, Lancaster's Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Lotion not only prolongs your tan up to one month but instantly calms sun-exposed skin too for a feeling of intense comfort. Made with natural-origin buriti oil, Lancaster's Tan Activator Complex intensifies melanin production for a golden, even and long-lasting tan. This refreshing after-sun lotion contains a repairing complex that instantly soothes your skin. It reduces the risk of peeling and leaves skin supple. This soothing lotion rehydrates and softens skin with an ultra-sensorial velvety finish. It instantly refreshes and scents your skin with Lancaster’s iconic fragrance, suitable for sensitive skin.
how_to_use: Apply generously to face and body after sun exposure and after your holidays.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Butylene Glycol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Palmitate, Bisabolol, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Caffeine, Ceteareth-20, Dimethylmethoxy Chromanol, Echinacea Purpurea Extract, Glycine, Hydrolyzed Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Fruit Extract, Laureth-7, Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil, Panthenol, Pantolactone, Polyacrylamide, Sodium Lactate Methylsilanol, Xanthan Gum, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Salicylic Acid, Parfum/Fragrance

name: Pacifica Coconut Cream Clean Deodorant
description: Don’t sweat it. Arm your underarms with pure confidence, courtesy of the Coconut Cream Clean Deodorant. This aluminium-free formula glides on clear, never sticky, and it'll outlast your longest days while leaving you smelling like fresh coconut milk with a hint of vanilla. Using odour-fighting fermented enzymes as well as baking soda — an alkaline ingredient that battles the bacteria-loving acids found in sweat — Pacifica’s Coconut Cream Clean Deodorant will you keep you feeling comfortable, with added arrowroot powder to absorb sweat and keep you dry. Ideal for all skin types (sensitive underarms rejoice!), this sweet, sweat-deflecting formula will finetune your bodily functions without irritation.
how_to_use: Apply to underarms. Do not apply to broken skin. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. This pretty underarm deodorant comes with a #5 recyclable cap. When you’re done, make sure to clean out the remaining deodorant from the tube, and put both cap and tube in your mixed recyclables curb-side bin.
ingredient: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Maranta Arundinacea (Arrowroot) Root Powder, Sodium Bicarbonate (Baking Soda), Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Parfum*, Saccharomyces Ferment, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Jojoba Esters, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E).

name: ZitSticka MEGASHADE Breakout-proof SPF Serum
description: Combining the broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection of an SPF with the skin-nourishing benefits of a serum, the MEGASHADE Breakout-proof SPF 50 Sunscreen Serum is the new staple of your morning skincare routine. An effective two-in-one formula that leaves a luminous glow and zero white cast, let's just say this formula is something of an overachiever. For ultimate protection, the sunscreen-serum uses a mineral-chemical filter hybrid. Non-irritating zinc oxide (3%) creates a physical barrier between UV rays and your skin, while chemical filters absorb UV rays and turn them into heat, neutralising free radicals long before they can do harm to your skin. To beat blemishes, this non-comedogenic formula is packed with niacinamide to sooth breakouts and tea tree to boot spot-causing bacteria from your face. Rounding out the mega formula are a host of reliable hydrators to nourish and plump skin; think colloidal oatmeal, ceramides and hyaluronic acid. Yep, this dew-giving serum is guaranteed to make the rest of your shelfie look oh-so-lazy.
how_to_use: Apply one full dropper to skin as your last skincare step, or prior to applying makeup. Reapply every two hours. Use daily, irrespective of weather.
ingredient: Homosalate, Octinoxate, Octisalate, Zinc Oxide, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf (Aloe Vera Gel) Juice, Amodimethicone, Aqua (Deionized Water), Butylene Glycol, Butyloctyl Salicylate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Camellia Sinensis (Green Teat) Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Extract, Ceramide NG, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Colloidal Oatmeal, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Extract, Ferulic Acid, Glycerin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrogenated Methyl Abietate, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Oil, Niacinamide, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, Polysorbate-20, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Oil, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract.

name: Aesop Redemption Body Scrub 180ml
description: With an energising scent, Aesop’s Redemption Body Scrub is brimming with essential oils of fir, pine needle, sage and clove to clear those post-sleep cobwebs and leave you ready to embrace the day. An opaque gel with super-fine grains to eliminate dead surface cells, this eradicates scales and recovers skin’s softness without irritation – leaving skin touchably smooth and veiled with a light layer of uplifting fragrance. Beloved by men and women, ensure you keep this hidden if you're not convinced that sharing’s caring…
how_to_use: To maintain meticulously smooth skin, apply once or twice a week while showering; massage liberally onto damp skin, then rinse thoroughly.

name: COOLA Classic Face Mist SPF 50+ 100ml
description: Introducing COOLA's super easy-to-use Classic Face Mist SPF50 100ml that applies like a face mist for non-greasy, antioxidant-rich and SPF protection throughout the day. This easy to use, easier to love organic Classic Face Mist SPF50 from COOLA applies like a breeze! A couple shakes, multiple mists, and you’re on your way. Featuring the brand's Plant Protection complex, with naturally effective antioxidant-rich ingredients like buriti Oil and prickly pear extract, this non-greasy organic sunscreen mist helps fight free radicals without slowing you down. Simply apply as the lsat step in your skin care routine, over make up, on-the-go, or anytime you desire to refresh and protect your precious skin!
how_to_use: Shake Well. With your eyes completely closed, mist face evenly, holding bottle 10-12 inches away from face. Allow to fully dry.
ingredient: Active Ingredients (Sunscreen): Avobenzone 2.9%, Octisalate 4.9%, Octocrylene 9.5%. Inactive Ingredients: Alcohol (ORGANIC), Butyloctyl Salicylate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycrylene, Polyester-8, Fragrance (Natural), VA/Butyl Maleate/Isobornyl Acrylate Copolymer, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil (ORGANIC), Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil (ORGANIC), Mauritia Flexuosa (Buriti) Fruit Oil (ORGANIC), Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract (ORGANIC), Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract (ORGANIC), Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Bisabolol (ORGANIC), Glycerin (ORGANIC), Water, Ethyl Ferulate, Diisooctyl Succinate.

name: SUMMER FRIDAYS Pool Time Glowing Body Oil
description: Lightweight yet luxurious in texture, indulge in this shimmering body oil to nourish skin and bestow a lit-from-within glow. Thanks to macadamia, jojoba, apricot kernel and sunflower oils, this body delivers the heavy-hitters of long-lasting hydration to keep your skin soft and supple as you dip in and out of the pool. Speaking of water, you know that glistening effect that happens when the sun is hitting the beads of H20 left on your skin? Well, this body oil mimics exactly that with its ultra-fine minerals that reveal a light, sun-kissed glow. It also contains antioxidant-rich vitamin E to combat skin-damaging free radicals. What’s more, it actually smells like summer with Summer Friday’s signature blend of coconut, vanilla blossom and warm almond. If summer could be bottled up, it would look like the illuminating Pool Time Glowing Body Oil.
how_to_use: Massage into skin wherever extra-nourishing moisture and a subtle glow are desired. Layer with SPF for protection. It is recommended to apply the oil to still-damp skin after the beach or bath to seal in hydration.
ingredient: Caprylic Capric/Triglyceride, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Coco-Caprylate Caprate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Silica Cetyl Silylate, Parfum/Fragrance, Trihydroxystearin, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Coumarin, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Silica, Synthetic Flourphlogopite, BHT, Tocopherol, Tin Oxide.

name: Herlum Copa Dew Oil 50ml
description: If you aren’t already acquainted with Herlum, trying this oil will certainly result in a new obsession. Taking you on a sensory journey to Brazil (think: Rio’s Copacabana beach), this silky formula is fast-absorbing and packed with restorative ingredients for a gorgeous dewy finish. Let’s start with a fun fact about the hero ingredient: copaiba oil. It’s been used in Brazil for centuries as a natural healer after locals observed animals rubbing themselves against the trunk of the copaiba tree when wounded. This, alongside cold-pressed rosehip and buriti oils, makes Copa Dew a true wonder product (and multi-tasker!), brimming with nourishing antioxidants and vitamins to give your skin, hair and body the ultimate glow-up. In fact, you can even use it as a bath oil. The uplifting scent has been created with a blend of upcycled apple oil and notes of white tea, cedarwood and lemon peel. Dreamy doesn’t even cut it.
how_to_use: Can be used on face, body and hair. For the face: apply a few drops to cleansed skin, taking some time to breath in the mood-lifting scent. Mix with your moisturiser for an extra shot of hydration. Use with your gua sha tool to aid lymphatic drainage. For the body: apply post-shower over damp skin and massage in circular motions for a boost of hydration and skin suppleness. Use on its own or mix a few drops with body lotion for extra nourishment. For the hair: apply to dry ends, brows and beard to lock in moisture, de-frizz and add major shine. Use as a pre-shampoo treatment overnight. For the bath: add a couple of drops into your bath and use as a nourishing bath oil. Bonus: Use as a cuticle oil for a longer-lasting mani, and wear as a light fragrance oil on your pulse points — breathe in and let the comforting fragrance boost positive emotions.
ingredient: Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil (Grapeseed Oil), Squalane (Olive), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (Coconut Oil), Brassica Alba Seed Extract (Mustard Seed Oil), Parfum (Upcycled Apple Oil, Fragrance), Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil (Buriti Oil), Rosa Canina Fruit Oil (Rosehip Oil), Copaifera Officinalis Resin (Copaiba Oil), Ribes Nigrum Seed Oil (Blackcurrant Seed Oil), Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil (Passion Fruit Oil), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja Oil (Soy), Limonene, Linalool, Geraniol, Citral (Fragrance).

name: Caudalie Vinofresh Natural Stick Deodorant 50g
description: Introducing Caudalie's Vinofresh Natural Stick Deodorant is perfect for those looking for a natural alternative to aluminium-based deodorants. Pay respect to gentle underarms with Caudalie's Vinofresh Natural Stick Deodorant. Its unique formula is made of 98% natural origin ingredients, offers 24-hour effectiveness and doesn't feature aluminium, alcohol, silicone and bicarbonate of soda in its ingredients lists either. Its stick format offers easy, roll-on application without leaving traces or blocking pores. At the core of its formula is organic grape water for a soothing, prebiotic and hydrating action, which contributes to healthier underarms. Last but not least, it's refreshing, unisex fragrance of organic eucalyptus provides long-lasting freshness all-day-long.
how_to_use: For maximum effectiveness, apply daily, about 5 to 10 swipes, to clean and dry skin.
ingredient: Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Propanediol, Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Stearate, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Citronellyl Methylcrotonate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Water, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Limonene, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Juice, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citronellol.

name: Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Drops - Medium 30ml
description: Control your glow or easily top-up your tan with Isle of Paradise’s custom Self-Tanning Drops. Simply add 1 to 12 drops to your face or body lotion and watch that beautiful sun-kissed glow radiate from your skin. Free from tell-tale tango pigment, biscuit scent or eye-catching streaks, this foolproof formula is a must-have and is perfectly sized for on-the-go so you can keep that faux glow all year round. Anything but ordinary, all Isle of Paradise products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, each bottle is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. But which shade is best for you? Simply pick from the Peach, Green or Violet ranges. The ‘Light’ peach colour-coded range is amazing for paler skin tones wanting that super healthy, light glow and overall brightening effect. Formulated with a unique OXY-GLOW complex to brighten skin, the ‘Light’ Self-Tanning Drops will add a subtle sun-kissed glow and radiant complexion. Pick the ‘Medium’ green colour-coded range for a flawless golden glow that is formulated with Isle of Paradise’s SuperBalance complex a green pigmented colour-corrector that cancels out redness and inflammation within the skin. Finally, pick ‘Dark’ the violet colour-coded range for your darkest tan yet. Formulated with HyperViolet complex, this hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich tan.
how_to_use: Add 1-12 drops to your favourite moisturiser, mix together & apply to skin. More drops = deeper tan. Wash hands after application.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Dihydroxyacetone, Alcohol Denat. (SD Alcohol 40-B), Glycerin, Polysorbate 80, Xanthan Gum, Erythrulose, Propylene Glycol, Tropaeolum Majus Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E Acetate), Aloe Barbadensis Extract*, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil*, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil*, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil*, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil*, Methoxyphenyl t-Butylphenyl Propanediol, Agastache Mexicana Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Propanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Metabisulfite, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Triethylene Glycol Organic

name: Margaret Dabbs London Foot Hygiene Cream 100g
description: Unsightly, less-than pleasantly scented feet are not only embarrassing, but also incredibly limiting (and occasionally painful). Nobody likes being the owner of offensive extremities, but fortunately Margaret Dabbs has run to the rescue with her Foot Hygiene Cream a nourishing, antimicrobial lotion which dissolves dead skin and prevents odour-causing bacteria from multiplying, so your feet stay fresh, healthy and exposac-worthy. With skin-conditioning Emu oil a key ingredient throughout Margaret Dabbs London's famed feet range, beloved by body care connoisseurs because of its intensively hydrating, skin-soothing properties alongside salicylic acid (to chemically exfoliate) and Tea Tree oil to stop both fungal and bacterial infections in their tracks, this inhibits (and reverses) all the primary foot failings, so you can go ahead and show your toes with confidence.
how_to_use: Warm a small amount of cream in your hands and apply all over the feet and nails before you go to bed at night. Use every day for two weeks and as necessary thereafter to combat any further flare-ups. Use the spatula provided to remove product from jar and wash hands after use.
ingredient: Petrolatum, Cetearyl Alcohol, Paraffinum Liquidum, Polysorbate 60, Dromiceius (Emu) Oil, Salicylic Acid, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Benzoic Acid.

name: Drunk Elephant Scrubbi Bamboes Body Cleanser 240ml
description: 'Hey, Scrubbi!' Made for when you need a little grit in your lather, Drunk Elephant's Scrubbi Bamboes Body Cleanser harnesses biodegradable bamboo beads and ultra-mild surfactants to leave skin clean and silky smooth. Formulated with a skin-friendly pH of 5.3, this smoothing blend makes quick work of sweat, grime, and excess oils without compromising your skin barrier. Quite the contrary! It's infused with a cocktail of fatty-acid-rich chia seed, flax seed and marula oils to deeply moisturise while a quick-absorbing multi-amino-acid blend helps to protect skin. Finally, sodium PCA and squalane pack a punch of hydration to prevent water loss and improve barrier strength. We'll wash to that!
how_to_use: Apply to wet skin. Massage gently and rinse. WARNING: For external use only. Use only as directed. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Avoid contact with eyes.

name: Weleda Skin Food Body Butter 150ml
description: Filled with nourishing botanicals, Weleda’s body butter helps to leave your dry skin soothed and comforted. A blend of cocoa and shea butters work to intensely moisturise while absorbing quickly into skin, promoting a soft, supple finish. Chamomile, Calendula and Wild Pansy have a calming effect while a natural fragrance works to uplift the senses. Suitable for vegans.
how_to_use: Smooth on all over and allow to melt into your skin especially after bathing or showering.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (chamomile) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Viola Tricolor (wild pansy) Extract, Alcohol, Betaine, Carrageenan, Xanthan Gum, Lactic Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate, Sodium Caproyl/Lauroyl Lactylate, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Limonene*, Linalool*, Benzyl Benzoate*, Geraniol*. *From natural essential oils.

name: Margaret Dabbs London Pure Restorative Foot Lotion 200ml
description: Step into softness with the PURE Restorative Foot Lotion, carefully formulated to bring back youth, hydration and vitality to your feet. Gently scented with bergamot and petitgrain, this luxe formula leaves your feet lookjing and feeling supple, soothed, fresh and healthy right from the very first use. You’ll have anti-inflammatory, antioxidant-brimming buriti, hempseed and jojoba oils to thank for that. And for a little extra freshness, you’ll also find the formula is packed with anti-fungal and anti-bacterial calendula extract.
how_to_use: Massage into skin in the morning and evening, allowing the formula to be absorbed.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Isopropyl Myristate, Propylene Glycol, Mauritia Flexuosa (Buriti) Fruit Oil*, Phenoxyethanol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil*, Carbomer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract*, Sodium Hydroxide, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Extract*, Avena Strigosa (Oat) Seed Extract*, Lecithin, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Tocopherol, Limonene*, Linalool*, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Petitgrain) Oil*. *Naturally Occurring Ingredients.

name: Sun Bum Cool Down After Sun Lotion
description: Like a crisp glass of icy cold rosé for hot summer skin, Sun Bum’s Cool Down After Sun Lotion is brimming with vitamin E to repair and replenish without leaving limbs feeling greasy. You know that holiday feeling? You’ve lounged by the pool for the last seven hours and now you’ve come in for a shower – you’re clean, smelling fuuuuhresh, your hair’s wrapped in a towel and you’re ready to change into one of the ten shoulder-baring ‘essentials’ you crammed in your suitcase? This after sun lotion is that in a bottle – a cooling, conditioning cocktail of aloe and comforting cocoa butter, to wrap you with summery scent as it soothes and replenishes tight, post-sun skin. Bursting with free radical-scavenging antioxidants, as well as being vegan, hypoallergenic and completely free from gluten, parabens and cruelty, this helps to reduce any redness and leave your limbs feeling cocooned in a nourishing, non-greasy veil.
how_to_use: Apply generously to all areas of the skin. Gently massage into any affected areas. For best results, apply right after sunburn occurs or before sun exposure. Reapply as frequently as you like.
ingredient: Water, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Stearic Acid, Cotton Seed Oil, Sorbitol, Theobroma Oil (Cocoa Butter), Simmondsia Chinensis Oil (Jojoba Oil), Aloe Barbadensis Gel (Aloe Vera), Cetyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Oleate, Triethanolamine (TEA), Diazolidinyl Urea, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Fragrance.

name: Aesop Deodorant Roll-On 50ml
description: Humans do not produce BO, it's the bacteria that live in our armpits that generate that characteristically horrid smell and the Zinc Ricinoleate in this natural deodorant kills them. The alcohol-free, roll-on Deodorant contains zinc, wasabi extract and a beautiful blend of essential oils to reduce and mask unpleasant odour the natural way. The ‘Original’ formulation also features vetiver root plus lavender, clove, tea tree and coriander oils, whereas the ‘Herbal’ edition contains lavender, rosemary, sage and orange oils, as well as refreshing ginger extract. With no aluminium and fresh, unisex scents, these wondrous roll-ons work for both men and women.
how_to_use: Roll generously under each arm after bathing and allow to dry before dressing.

name: Caudalie Rose de Vigne Shower Gel 200ml
description: Elevate your bathing rituals with Caudalie’s indulgent Rose de Vigne Shower Gel. Suitable for all skin types, this soap-free wash is made from a 100% plant-based formula that’s as effective as it is gentle on your skin. The luxurious shower gel is enriched with soothing aloe vera to comfort and moisturise your limbs as you massage the silky gel over your skin. The best bit? It boasts a delectable scent that will make you wish you never had to rinse off the suds; notes of rose petals, rhubarb and musk create a beautiful fresh yet floral aroma.
how_to_use: Lather onto damp skin. Rinses off easily and leaves a delicate scent on your skin. Ideal for anyone wishing to turn showering into a moment of well-being with this delicately scented shower nectar.

name: NUXE Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil 100ml
description: A best-smelling must-have, Nuxe's Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil for Face, Body and Hair is a buffet of goodness for compromised skin - cherishing dry, scaly patches (and strengthening over-styled lengths!) with a medley of plant-derived oils. Completely non-greasy and quickly absorbed, this leaves a light lustre and works to replenish and comfort the scaliest limbs... A holiday hero (slather this all over post-sun skin), the blend of camellia, hazelnut, sweet almond, St. John's wort, macadamia and borage has impressive healing properties - working to elasticise and fortify while boosting moisture levels to promote a healthy glow. Rake through the ends of your hair to create a chic 'piecey-ness', smooth over shoulders or streak down the length of your shins to bestow an au naturel highlight. A multi-tasking wonder, there's a reason no routine should be without it.
how_to_use: Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® in the palm of your hand and add a drop of your usual moisturiser. Mix and apply to your skin using smoothing movements. Your face will be perfectly moisturised, and your skin softer and more supple. Apply to your shoulders, neckline, hands, or other areas that need attention. There is nothing quite like the unique quality of Huile Prodigieuse® to enhance the skin's texture in a single step. · In the palm of your hand, mix a drop of Huile Prodigieuse® with your foundation before applying: it will glide smoothly over your skin. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® on a natural bristle hairbrush for naturally controlled and radiantly shiny hair. Exposure to the sun leaves your skin feeling dehydrated and in need of special care and attention. There is nothing better than Huile Prodigieuse® to nourish and repair it. Ideal as a massage oil, Huile Prodigieuse® glides smoothly over your skin, infusing it with its divine fragrance. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® directly on your hair (from a distance of around 20 cm) and massage into your hair and scalp. Then wrap your head in a warm towel and leave for 15 to 20 minutes to allow Huile Prodigieuse® to penetrate before shampooing. Add a few drops of Huile Prodigieuse® to your bath water and drift away on its joyful and fragrant waves. A daily massage with Huile Prodigieuse® is ideal for alleviating stretch marks.
ingredient: Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Dicaprylyl Ether, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Corylus Avellana (Hazelnut) Seed Oil, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Parfum/Fragrance, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Aqua/Water, Ascorbic Acid, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract, Linalool,Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol [N2212/C].

name: Dizziak Body Conditioner 200ml
description: So much more than your average body lotion, DIZZIAK’s Body Conditioner nourishes skin while adding sumptuous sheen. Ultra-rich and luxurious, the formula cocktails a bunch of hydration powerhouses — think: shea butter, inca inchi and glycerin — while treating skin to soothing allantoin and aloe vera, plus antioxidant-rich vitamin E to protect you from the elements. If your limbs are looking a little lacklustre or plagued by ashy, dry patches, bring them back from the brink by replenishing lost moisture and swiftly illuminating dullness. Never greasy this elixir absorbs quickly and easily, despite providing comfortable and long-lasting hydration.
how_to_use: Massage into dry or damp skin.

name: Evereden Soothing Belly Mask
description: You’ve heard of sheet masks for your face — but what about for your growing pregnancy belly? The Soothing Belly Mask is here to pamper you and your bairn — just sit back, relax, and enjoy this spa-like treatment... Drenched in six organic superfood oils as well as skin care superhero collagen, placing this refreshing and comforting sheet mask over your belly for 10 to 15 minutes will hydrate and soothe skin. It will also help to prevent stretch marks, as collagen strengthens skin and helps to reduce scarring. In an innovative one-size-fits-all edition, this mask will fit perfectly — no matter where you are in your pregnancy journey.
ingredient: Water, Glycerin, Propanediol, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Pentylene Glycol, Soluble Collagen, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract

name: EVY Technology Sunscreen Mousse SPF 50 100ml
description: Easy to apply, rapidly absorbable and never sticky or greasy, the lightweight Sunscreen Mousse SPF 50 works with the epidermis to deliver both immediate and lasting protection against UVA and UVB rays for up to six hours! Exceptionally water-resistant and without any parabens, nanoparticles or perfumes, this formula is ideal for sensitive and delicate skin. Sitting pretty under make up with its quick drying-time and invisible, matte finish, this hydrating mousse protects against premature ageing and dehydration via a medley of vitamins C and E. Added collagen and silk extracts also ward against and repair skin damage, which - since your skin is kept hydrated and protected against sunburn - allows the melanin in your skin to develop into a rich tan that lasts. A boon for heliophiles and those with active lifestyles, it actually forms an innovative protective barrier that mimics your skin's natural defences - providing extraordinary protection without clogging pores or sitting on the surface of your skin. Budge-proof (even when rubbing skin with a towel!) and lasting twice as long as cream formulas, this marvel can also be used on scalps if you have thin hair - or even on parched hair itself to protect it from dehydrating.
ingredient: Aqua, Butane, Propylene Glycol, Octocrylene, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Isobutane, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Propane, Shea Butter Ethyl Esters, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Ethylhexyl Triazone, PVP, Polysorbate 20, Triethanolamine, Carnosine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycerin, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Dimethicone, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate

name: Drunk Elephant Pekee Bar 120ml
description: It’s not often that we fall in love with a solid cleansing bar, but this 3-in-1 wonder bar from Drunk Elephant is in a league of its own, clarifying, balancing and moisturising skin. Suitable for both face and body, the Pekee Bar rinses away pore-clogging debris, impurities and excess oil while also toning, increasing moisture retention and firming skin. Totally soap and fragrance-free, the Pekee Bar will not strip or dry the skin as some traditional bar cleansers do; instead, it has a pH level of 6.51, which ensures sufficient cleansing without drying, preserving your skin’s essential moisture barrier and leaving it soft and smooth as well as clean.
how_to_use: Wet the Pekee Bar and create a creamy lather with your hands and massage over the face, eyes and neck. Rinse thoroughly with warm water and pat dry. The Peekee bar can be used morning and evening.
ingredient: Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Starch, Cetearyl Alcohol, Paraffin, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Water/Aqua/Eau, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Honey/Mel/Miel, Glycerin, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract

name: MALIN + GOETZ RUM HAND & BODY WASH (250ML)
description: Doubling up as a hand and body wash, this gorgeous formula is laced with MALIN + GOETZ’ sensual rum-scented eau de parfum to leave your skin smelling alluringly warm after use. The formula is also blended with naturally-derived glycerin and protein amino acids that help to hydrate as all dirt, impurities and bacteria are cleansed away – meaning none of the irritation, drying or stripping often associated with traditionally harsh detergents.
how_to_use: As a daily hand and body wash: Apply cleanser to wet skin, gently work into a lather and rinse clean. It can also be used as a foaming bath by adding three pumps to running water.

name: Mio Body Brush
description: Ridding your body of dulling, dead skin cells, Mio's Body Brush is the beauty world's secret to granting effortlessly radiant, healthy-looking skin from top to toe. Gentle, but no less effective, the Body Brush is the often-forgotten key to unlocking supple, smooth limbs. Carefully crafted from PP fibre bristles, this works to naturally exfoliate the skin as you care for every inch of your body. The result? Your skin is left feeling touchably soft and smooth, instantly invigorated and, thanks to the addition of soft rubber nodules, firmed with continued use.
how_to_use: Use two-three times weekly, massaging in circular motions onto wet or dry skin from top to toe. Rinse well after use.
ingredient: Rubber Massage Nodules: Soft rubber nodules massage the skin to help smooth and firm PP Fibre Bristles: PP fibre bristles for an intense yet gentle exfoliation FSC Certified Wood: The base is made from ethically sourced FSC certified wood Cotton: The body brush handle is made from 100% natural undyed cotton.

name: SUNDAE Body Green Tea Exfoliating Whipped Shower Foam with Kakadu Plum and Finger Lime 260ml
description: No, your eyes are not deceiving you... the Whipped Shower Foam from Sundae Body comes housed in a whipped cream-esque can, delivering a dose of fun to your shower - alongside, of course, a gently cleansing foam formula packed with nourishing ingredients. Refreshing and luxe, these shower foams refresh skin and wash away the day while enriching skin with vitamin C-filled kakadu plum to brighten and smooth, and finger lime, a natural source of exfoliating AHAs. Choose from a smorgasbord of delectable scents: 'Very Vanilla', a mix of vanilla bean, tonka bean, coconut milk and sandalwood; 'Orange Crush', with orange, mandarin, jasmine and melon; 'Pomegranate Fizz', featuring a cocktail of pomegranate, peach blossom and blackcurrant; 'Coconut Cream', with coconut, vanilla and sandalwood; 'Cool Mint', an energising blend of spearmint, peppermint and menthol; 'Green Tea', a glycolic acid-infused exfoliating formula to clear out clogged pores, and finally, 'Honey Honey', a sweet mix of toffee, honey and maple syrup.
how_to_use: Get wet! Give it a good shake, turn your bottle upside down and spray a dollop into the palm of your hand, lather up, wash & rinse.

Choose from a smorgasbord of delectable scents: 'Very Vanilla', a mix of vanilla bean, tonka bean, coconut milk and sandalwood; 'Orange Crush', with orange, mandarin, jasmine and melon; 'Pomegranate Fizz', featuring a cocktail of pomegranate, peach blossom and blackcurrant; 'Coconut Cream', with coconut, vanilla and sandalwood; 'Cool Mint', an energising blend of spearmint, peppermint and menthol; and finally, 'Honey Honey', a sweet mix of toffee, honey and maple syrup.

name: Lancaster Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Lotion 250ml
description: Love your Lancaster golden tan? What if you could prolong it for an endless summer sensation? Lancaster's Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Lotion is specially developed for those who want to prolong their beautiful holiday tan while soothing their sun-exposed skin. Formulated with a special repairing complex, Lancaster's Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Lotion not only prolongs your tan up to one month but instantly calms sun-exposed skin too for a feeling of intense comfort. Made with natural-origin buriti oil, Lancaster's Tan Activator Complex intensifies melanin production for a golden, even and long-lasting tan. This refreshing after-sun lotion contains a repairing complex that instantly soothes your skin. It reduces the risk of peeling and leaves skin supple. This soothing lotion rehydrates and softens skin with an ultra-sensorial velvety finish. It instantly refreshes and scents your skin with Lancaster’s iconic fragrance, suitable for sensitive skin.
how_to_use: Apply generously to face and body after sun exposure and after your holidays.

name: OUAI Hand Wash 437ml
description: Here to give you a helping hand, the Hand Wash from OUAI Haircare brings the decadence and luxury of a skin care routine to your hard-working hands. Cushiony and creamy, this cleanser exfoliates, refreshes, hydrates and softens your skin. Biodegradable jojoba beads physically exfoliate, while velvety avocado and rosehip oils soothe, quench dryness and strengthen with fatty acids. Castor oil soothes inflammation too, and the uplifting scent of citrus, apricot, rose, magnolia, blossom and musk will transport you to London’s Dean Street – without the jet lag. Vegan, cruelty-free and completely recyclable (well, minus the pump), this Hand Wash is sure to add some major style points to both your hand care routine and your bathroom décor. A bottle of this on your sink-side and voila! You’re in an episode of At Home with Vogue…
how_to_use: You know the drill: Wet hands. Lather up (sing ‘Happy Birthday’ two times). Rinse away for clean, soft hands that smell divine.

name: COOLA Classic Sunscreen Spray SPF30 Pina Colada
description: Great for long days in the sun, COOLA’s quick and convenient Classic Body Sunscreen Spray SPF 30 comes in a choice of two natural scents – 'Piña Colada' and 'Tropical Coconut' – to evoke summer vibes while protecting your skin from the ageing effects of UV and aggressors. Flooding your skin with a buffet of nourishing nutrients – including the brand’s proprietary Plant Protection Complex – this featherlight, non-greasy formula’s quickly absorbed and is both sweat and water-resistant for up to 80 minutes. With 70+% certified organic ingredients and without any parabens, gluten or cruelty, this reef-safe screen is ‘Hawaii Reef Compliant’, vegan and is widely recyclable – meaning it’s great for your skin and your conscience!
how_to_use: Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, and at least every two hours. How to recycle COOLA's SPF Sprays: Step 1: Enjoy and use ALL of your SPF spray. Step 2: Once the spray is completely empty, take the product to your local recycling centre (COOLA do not recommend disassembling the spray).

name: Hello Sunday The Self Tan One Sun-Kissed Drops 30ml
description: Add these self-tanning drops to your routine for a sun-kissed glow up that builds from a medium to deep tan — take your pick. For a look that errs on the natural side of slow baking in the sun, add a few drops to your favourite moisturiser and watch as it adapts to your skin tone. For a deeper tan, simply use it alone and even then, you can expect a finish that is natural, glowy perfection. Forget any tan stains on carpets and messy mitts, this handy dropper lets you control your dose, and it’s also packed with antioxidant vitamin C to add a radiant finish to your self-tanning routine.
how_to_use: Mix 1 to 12 drops of product alone or with your regular treatment. MORE DROPS = DEEPER TAN. Wash hands thoroughly after application. Apply every four to six days.

name: Caudalie Thé des Vignes Shower Gel 200ml
description: Elevate your bathing rituals with Caudalie’s indulgent Thé des Vignes Shower Gel. Suitable for all skin types, this soap-free wash is made from a 100% plant-based formula that’s as effective as it is gentle on your skin. The luxurious shower gel is enriched with soothing aloe vera to comfort and moisturise your limbs as you massage the silky gel over your skin. The best bit? It boasts a delectable scent that will make you wish you never had to rinse off the suds; notes of sensual white musk, orange blossom and ginger are intertwined to create a beautiful aroma.
how_to_use: Lather onto damp skin. Rinses off easily and leaves a delicate scent on your skin. Ideal for anyone wishing to turn showering into a moment of well-being with this delicately scented shower nectar.

name: Tan-Luxe The Face Illuminating Self-Tan Drops 30ml - Light/Medium
description: Meet your moisturiser’s new best friend: The Face by TAN-LUXE. Just a few drops added to your existing skin care favourites will take lifeless, lacklustre complexions to the beach and back – imparting an effortless, natural-looking glow. Enriched with raspberry seed oil, vitamin E and aloe vera, every droplet of this miracle formula bronzes, boosts and fortifies skin’s fabric. A million miles away from the tell-tale ‘tangoed’ look of so many traditional fake tans, The Face comes in two shades – ‘Light to Medium’ and ‘Medium to Dark’ – to guarantee a realistic, streak-free finish. Like a sun-drenched holiday in a bottle, it delivers even, luminous colour that can easily be customised by adding extra drops to your chosen skin care product. No smell. No fuss. No drama. Just glow and go.
how_to_use: Prep Be sure to cleanse and wash your face before application. Apply Mix 1-4 drops to your usual moisturiser, serum or face oil in the palm of your hand and apply evenly over the face. Additional drops of the product will add depth of colour and glow to the final result. Wash hands thoroughly after application. Maintain Gently exfoliate skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Dihydroxyacetone, Alcohol Denat (Alcohol), Glycerin, Erythrulose, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hydrolysed Silk, Caramel, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 80, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Bu-Tylphenyl Methylpropional, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzoic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Phenoxyethanol. name: Lanolips 101 Ointment Multi-Balm Green Apple 10g
description: A delicious reinvention of {The Original 101 Ointment}, Lanolips 101 Ointment Fruities are available in four ‘flavours’, each boasting its own good-to-skin benefits. There’s ‘Green Apple’, a vitamin and antioxidant-rich formula that naturally deflects harmful environmental elements and pollutants, ‘Strawberry’, which helps to slough away dead skin cells and reveal healthy, new skin thanks to the key addition of alpha-hydroxy acids; ‘Peach’, which helps to revive skin with its combination of vitamins and polyunsaturated fatty acids, ‘Coconutter’, which is boosted with vitamin E and is rich in antioxidants to make it ultra-hydrating and, finally, 'Watermelon', which is boosted with vitamin E and watermelon fruit extract to intensely hydrate. Each one is formulated with Ultra Medical Grade lanolin, which resembles and mimics your own skin oils to restore moisture unlike anything else and holds 200% of its weight in moisture. Vegetarian, baby-friendly and free from any nasties, this is basically a no brainer!
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between fingers or apply directly onto the lips and skin. Use generously and keep below 25°c.
ingredient: Green Apple: Ultra Medical Grade Lanolin, Apple Extract, Vitamin E. Strawberry: Ultra Medical Grade Lanolin, Strawberry Extract, Vitamin E. Peach: Ultra Medical Grade Lanolin, Apple Extract, Vitamin E. Coconutter: Lanolin*, Flavour*, Tocopherol Acetate* (Vit E), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*. Watermelon: Lanolin*, aroma*, tocopherol (vit E), helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, citrullus vulgaris (watermelon) seed oil*

name: NAILS.INC Tootsie Tamer
description: This crisp white and rose gold Tootsie Tamer is a professional-grade foot file perfect for keeping the soles of your feet soft, smooth from the comfort of your own home. Forget ugly, egg-shaped foot files, NAILS.INC's beautifully-designed crisp white and rose gold Tootsie Tamer is a clever, ergonomically-designed tool that helps you to effortlessly exfoliate and smooth dry and rough soles in need of a little TLC. Perfect for DIY pedicures at home, the tapered design allows you to file hard to reach areas with ease before treating yourself to a foot soak and pedicure. Who knew a foot file could look so cute?
how_to_use: Prior to use, remove the protective cover and use only on clean, dry and moisture-free skin. Apply gentle pressure and move the Tootsie Tamer back and forth across hard skin areas. Work slowly and check intermittently for desired results. Add slightly more pressure to thicker skin. Stop immediately if you feel pain or the skin becomes irritated. Wash with soapy water after every use.

name: Kopari Beauty Aluminum Free Coconut Deodorant
description: Empower and arm your underarms with pure coconut confidence. This aluminium-free deodorant glides on clear. Never sticky, it'll outlast your longest days and leave you smelling like fresh coconut milk. Dont sweat it. 100% plant-based, this natural, non-toxic active blend provides odour protection while simultaneously warding off bacteria that causes odour in the first place. Boasting a sweet coconut scent and formulated with coconut water, coconut oil and sage oil, this super formula is rich in electrolytes, amino acids, vitamins and minerals to hydrate and fine tune your body's functions.
how_to_use: Apply daily to clean underarms. Appropriate for underarms after shaving. There is a transitional period when integrating any natural deodorant into your regimen. For a short period of time, you may find yourself perspiring more than usual this is your body releasing any built-up toxins. After detoxing, your body will stabilize, and you will perspire less. Absorbs without residue, staining or irritation.
ingredient: Propylene Glycol*, Water/Aqua/EAU, Propanediol, Sodium Stearate, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Glycerin, Saccharomyces Ferment Filtrate**, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil**, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice, Charcoal Powder, Sodium Caproyl/Lauroyl Lactyl Lactate, Silica, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyglyceryl-5 Oleate, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Triethyl Citrate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Glyceryl Laurate, Sodium Anisate, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Parfum). *Biobased **Organic

name: Bondi Sands Technocolor 1 Hour Express Self Tanning Foam - Emerald 200ml
description: Discover self-tan tailored to your skin tone with Bondi Sands Technocolour 1 Hour Express Self Tanning Foam. Infused with unique jewel-inspired colour guides — specially designed to counteract tell-tale orange tones — simply sweep on for a believable bronze in just 60 minutes. Carefully curated through cutting-edge research and laser skin analysis technology, Technocolour shades are infused with colourful undertones from green to purple. It might sound a little odd (and intimidating!), but this colour cleverness ensures a tan that’s perfectly tailored to your skin tone. And, to make sure your tan goes on evenly and just where you want it, this hi-tech formula also includes electrolyte hydration and a silky, spreadable foam texture.
how_to_use: For best results, ensure your skin is clean, exfoliated and free of any moisturisers. Pump Bondi Sands Technocolor Self Tanning Foam liberally to a Bondi Sands Technocolor Application Mitt and apply to body using long, sweeping motions. After one hour, shower with warm water and gently pat skin dry. For best results, leave on skin for a minimum of 3 hours.

name: Shiseido Expert Sun Protector Face and Body Lotion SPF50+
description: Ever at the forefront when it comes to sun protection, Shiseido have revolutionised the sun care game with Expert Sun Protector Face & Body Lotion SPF 50. Providing powerful protection with abundant skin care benefits, this forward-thinking formula creates a light, impenetrable veil with three advanced technologies to block the ageing impact of the sun and air pollution while preserving precious moisture for a plumped and dewy finish. Uniting proprietary HeatForce and WetForce tech that make the veil work harder when the weather’s hot or skin’s exposed to sea or sweat (think: ‘turbo’ mode), this syncs with your environment to ward against aggressors. Meanwhile, Profense CEL, NatureSurge Complex and the moisturising formula combine to both pre-empt and lessen lines, delay development of dark spots and deflect the ageing impact of free radicals. Incredibly light and invisible, this lays down a 360˚ veil of protection (like flexible webbing), which makes a great primer for make up, won’t suffocate skin and smells just like a holiday. Plus, its high water-resistance means less harm to precious marine life – next-to-no lotion is washed off in water, so skin and the earth remain safe.
how_to_use: Shake well. Dispense the appropriate amount of product and smooth over skin. Reapply every two hours. Apply liberally before sun exposure. For broader areas, apply a generous amount with the entire palm. Don't forget the inner arms, thighs and neck. Reapply frequently to maintain protection.

name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Moisturising Body Balm AP+M 200ml
description: Bursting with enough hydration to transform the entire Sahara desert into a dreamy oasis, the Lipikar Moisturising Body Balm AP+M delivers instant comfort to dry, itchy skin that’ll leave every inch of your body feeling soothed and happy. Backed by years of microbiome science that understands the structure of our skin which comes in all textures and types, this balmy miracle is the true definition of where science meets skin care. Fusing together nourishing shea butter, mannose, glycerin and skin-smoothing niacinamide, every pump is filled with barrier-boosting benefits that’ll provide an instant soothing sensation. Think: less itchy flare-ups for eczema-prone and more long-lasting comfort. There’s no wonder why this is flying into baskets — the proof is literally in the formula!

Sweet almond proteins, hydrolyzed rice, and oat proteins along with pro-vitamin B-5 offer strengthen skin while enhancing hydration. Perfect as a pick-me-up treat or as a present for your favourite boujee bath lover, pick from four incredibly indulgent ‘flavours’ – ‘Fresh Fig’, ‘Almond Coconut’, or ‘Crème Brûlée’ – and get ready for some serious R&R.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Sun Protection SPF50+ Milk 250ml
description: If prickly heat and sun intolerance is ruining your summer fun, we would like to introduce to you your perfect match, the Anthelios Sun Protection SPF 50+ Milk. The award-winning no-nonsense brand La Roche-Posay has the water-resistant and optimal level of broad-spectrum SPF 50 to keep you hydrated and protected while soothing reactivity in allergy-prone skin. Using a patented filtering system with ‘Mexoplex’ combined with ‘Thermal Spring Water’ for the ultimate antioxidant protection, you’ll soon see what all the fuss is about, the results speak for themselves!
how_to_use: Apply 30 minutes before exposure and reapply frequently and generously every two hours to maintain protection especially after swimming, perspiring or towelling. Shake well before use. Avoid exposure to the sun during the hottest hours of the day.

name: Kopari Beauty Tahitian Vanilla Coconut Melt 150ml
description: The staple on every shelfie and Holy Grail of coconut oil, Kopari’s signature Organic Coconut Melt has had a luxuriously sweet Tahitian Vanilla makeover. The same multi-tasking marvel you know and love, with a little dose of enrapturing Tahitian Vanilla for a sweeter than sweet intensely hydrating experience. Stubborn dry skin? Instantly soften and soothed thanks to the natural components of the pure virgin, organic coconut oil utilised by Kopari. Think proteins, essential fatty acids and vitamin E for moisturised skin that radiates health, happiness and hydration. Fast-absorbing but never ever greasy you can use this in nearly every which way you can think of; from body moisturiser to hair mask, lip balm to dry shave oil and even massage oil… the possibilities are endless.
how_to_use: To use as a deep body moisturizer, melt a dollop in hand by rubbing the palms together to warm up the oil. Then lather generously over your entire body from head to toe. For best results, apply on damp skin to lock in moisture. Did you know that Kopari’s Organic Coconut Oil is the mother of all multitaskers? Here are all the ways you can Melt: Hair Mask: Coat dry, unwashed hair with Coconut Melt from root to tip. Toss in a bun for 40 minutes or sleep on it overnight. Afterward, shampoo twice and whoa, holy hair hydration. Dry Shave Oil: Say so long to synthetic shaving creams and gels. Bath Boost: Scoop out a generous glob of Coconut Melt and drop it into a hot bath. Belly Balm: Rub Coconut Melt all over that beautiful pregnant belly to relieve itching and ward off stretch marks.
ingredient: Cocos Nucifera (ORGANIC Coconut) Oil*, Fragrance. *Organic.

name: Lancaster Sun Beauty Fast Tan Optimizer Satin Dry Oil SPF30 150ml
description: These days we all know how important sun protection is, but did you know that the sunlight is made up of four different types of sun rays: UVB, UVA, visible Light and infrared? Lancaster's Sun Beauty Fast Tan Optimiser Satin Dry Oil SPF30 protects against all four and now with blue light protection too, you’ll be safe in the sun with this sensorial oil. Experience broad spectrum sun protection with this luxurious oil that leaves a satin-soft finish, specially developed for those who are looking for a luminous, gorgeous and lasting tan while preserving their skin's beauty. The pleasure of tanning and optimal sun care, this delivers the benefits of an oil without the greasy feel, this dry-oil formula leaves your skin soft and heightens tan intensity, while offering the broadest protection from sun exposure. While no SPF can provide full protection against the sun’s rays, Lancaster’s optimising formula comes as close as you can get while leaving your skin wrapped in a beautifying shimmering veil. A unique ‘Sun Repair System’ helps to heal your skin post-exposure and strengthens your skin with pho-ageing resistance. Complete with their bespoke ‘Tan Activator Complex’ to stimulate the tanning process and melanin diffusion in the skin you can enjoy that golden tan!
how_to_use: Apply before sun exposure. Spray liberally over the body until fully covered. Shake well. Mist onto skin and spread evenly with your hands.

name: NUXE Huile Prodigieuse Florale Multi-Purpose Dry Oil 100ml
description: A firm fixture of French bathroom cabinet's, Nuxe's exquisite Huile Prodigieuse Florale is a luxurious, bloom-scented spin on the best-smelling dry oil - designed to replenish your skin and envelop your senses with heavenly fragrance. Completely non-greasy and quickly absorbed, this leaves a light lustre and works to condition the scaliest limbs... A holiday hero (slather this all over post-sun skin), the blend of camellia, hazelnut, sweet almond, St. John's wort, macadamia and borage has impressive healing properties - working to elasticise and fortify while boosting moisture levels to promote a healthy glow. Rake through the ends of your hair to create a chic 'piecey-ness', smooth over shoulders or streak down the length of your shins to bestow an au naturel highlight. A multi-tasking wonder, there's a reason no routine should be without it.
how_to_use: Spray some Huile Prodigieuse in the palm of your hand and add a drop of your usual moisturiser. Mix and apply to your skin using smoothing movements. Apply to your shoulders, neckline, hands, or other areas that need attention. In the palm of your hand, mix a drop of Huile Prodigieuse with your foundation before applying: it will glide smoothly over your skin. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse on a natural bristle hairbrush for naturally controlled and radiantly shiny hair. Ideal as a massage oil, Huile Prodigieuse glides smoothly over your skin, infusing it with its divine fragrance. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse directly on your hair (from a distance of around 20 cm) and massage into your hair and scalp. Then wrap your head in a warm towel and leave for 15 to 20 minutes to allow Huile Prodigieuse to penetrate before shampooing. Add a few drops of Huile Prodigieuse to your bath water and drift away on its joyful and fragrant waves. A daily massage with Huile Prodigieuse is ideal for alleviating stretch marks.
ingredient: Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Dicaprylyl Ether, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Corylus Avellana (Hazelnut) Seed Oil, Parfum/Fragrance, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Ascorbic Acid, Aqua/Water, Limonene, Linalool, Citral, Citronellol, Hydroxycitronellal, Geraniol [N2216/C].

name: Spotlight Oral Care Teeth Whitening System
description: Uniting two weeks’ worth of Teeth Whitening Strips with a bonus Toothpaste for Whitening Teeth (100ml), the Teeth Whitening System is key to a dazzling smile *get your sunglasses*. Developed to brighten without sensitivity, the 14-day course of teeth-whitening strips harnesses hydrogen peroxide to gently but thoroughly minimise staining – just apply for one hour a day to reveal a bright, sparkling beam. The Toothpaste for Whitening Teeth then pairs sodium fluoride with stain-removing hydrogen peroxide to polish your teeth and eliminate cavity-causing bacteria. Harnessing the latest developments in oral care to strengthen teeth and cherish gums, this minty fresh paste is contained in completely recyclable packaging – minimising the detrimental contribution of dental care products to landfill (and leaving your conscience as clean as your teeth).
how_to_use: Tear open the foil packets to find a top white strip and a bottom white strip Dry the teeth Place the shorter whitening strip on the lower teeth first and then the longer strip onto the top teeth Leave the strips in place for one hour After, remove the strips and rinse away any residual gel Repeat every day for two weeks for your dazzling smile Use in conjunction with the Toothpaste for Whitening Teeth for maximum results

name: WelleCo Nourishing Protein Vanilla Refill 300g
description: Nourishing and slimming, WelleCo's Nourishing Protein Vanilla Refill is formulated from easily digestible organic pea and rice protein – without any heavily processed whey, artificial sweeteners or synthetic ingredients – helping you to get your daily dose of protein with zero fuss or worries. Featuring all nine essential amino acids that aid in muscle recovery, this plant-based, vegan-friendly, gluten-free formula provides the protein that's essential for tissue repair and growth – fuelling your body with endurance, power and energy. B vitamins, acai, pomegranate, dandelion and rosehip add to the nutritious benefits, and the lean, light formula is also the perfect way to support healthy weight loss – satiating hunger and supporting digestion with a careful mix of pre and probiotics to support a healthy gut pH balance for less bloating. Deliciously flavoured with organic cacao, this is the tastiest, easiest way to work towards a healthy and strong body, and comes in a handy refill pouch to fit your reusable Nourishing Vanilla Caddy.
how_to_use: The Nourishing Protein is a great supplement to take alongside THE SUPER ELIXIR Greens. Blend into smoothies or simply add a heaped scoop (33g) or two tablespoons daily to plant-based milk or filtered water and shake for a satisfying snack. Recommended daily consumption: 1 serve.

name: Pai Skincare The Impossible Glow Bronzing Drops 30ml
description: Great for all skin types and tones, Pai Skincare’s The Impossible Glow, Hyaluronic Acid & Sea Kelp Bronzing Drops are perfect for granting a beautifully luminous look (sans the sun damage). Brimming with dew-boosting hyaluronic acid – a natural moisture magnet that acts like you’re ‘fluffing the stuffing’ (if skin cells were cushions) – these drops can be mixed into serum or cream for a gradual glow, or used straight from the bottle to instantly grant an ethereal gleam. Laced with light-scattering pigments to help you look lit-from-within, lemon-derived vitamin C works to brighten while scavenging damaging radicals, while sea kelp delivers long-lasting hydration for skin that looks visibly smooth, firm and radiant.
how_to_use: Mix a few drops into topical serum or cream to enhance its glow-boosting effects, or use 'neat' to instantly grant a warm, holiday glow to your cheeks, forehead, bridge of your nose and your chin for a natural, sunkissed aesthetic.

name: Evereden Nourishing Baby Face Cream Fragrance Free 50ml
description: Addressing the rarely discussed skin sensitivities many babies suffer from - flaking newborn skin, baby acne, drool rash and atopic dermatitis, among others - this Nourishing Baby Face Cream is specifically developed to be as gentle but hydrating as possible. With a luxuriously rich texture, this fragrance-free cream is packed full of superfood oils; all of which have been carefully chosen by Evereden's team of doctors for their ability to lock in long-lasting moisture without causing irritation. Coconut oil, jojoba seed oil and sunflower seed oil work to strengthen the skin's natural moisture barrier over time. In turn, this helps prevent future inflammation, sensitivity and dryness. We particularly recommend this one if your baby (or anyone else in your family) struggles with eczema.
how_to_use: Gently massage onto your baby's face and body. Use liberally on dry, rough or itchy patches.

name: Sol de Janeiro Beija Flor Body Wash 90ml
description: Cleanse and revitalise your body (while being enveloped in the fruity yet floral aromas of Sol de Janeiro's iconic Cheirosa 68 perfume) with the Beija Flor Body Wash. Lather up with this creamy, moisturising body wash, infused with cacay oil (a gentle alternative to retinol that promotes cell turnover), and reveal healthier-looking skin. Elsewhere in the formula, flower acids come together to gently exfoliate the skin while vegan squalane works to deeply hydrate. Boasting notes of pink dragonfruit, vanilla, jasmine and more, this travel size body wash - which is both vegan friendly and cruelty-free - is an absolute essential if you want to feel fresh and smell delicious while soaking up the sun on your holiday.
how_to_use: Massage all over the body for 30-60 seconds. Rinse clean for soft and revitalized skin.
