name: Sun Bum SPF 15 Browning Oil 250ml
description: Made for those who want protection without having to forgo their summer glow, Sun Bum’s SPF 15 Browning Oil facilitates the best of both – creating a reef-friendly shield between skin and the ageing effects of the sun while allowing your skin to develop a long-lasting tan. Great for those who tan easily, this silky oil offers broad-spectrum SPF 15 protection, while the hypoallergenic blend of argan, coconut and avocado oils replenishes moisture and helps to enhance elasticity – leaving your limbs feeling wonderfully soft with a glorious ‘spring’. Healthy, hydrated and golden, it’s great for sun-lovers who love nothing more than the feeling of being authentically bronzed (this is that summer holiday vibe in a bottle). And, as with everything Sun Bum, you won’t find any oxybenzone or octinoxate – making it ideal for water babies (and marine life).
how_to_use: Liberally and rub into skin 15 minutes before sun exposure. Keep away from eyes. For best protection, reapply religiously and use in conjunction with a higher-factor, broad-spectrum SPF.

name: Mario Badescu Coconut Body Butter 113g
description: Rescuing even the driest skin from the brink, Mario Badescu’s Coconut Body Butter unites a host of skin-loving heroes that work harmoniously together to soften, smoothen and hydrate every inch of your body. Enriched by moisture-magnetic shea and mango butter, and a fruity fusion of apricot, argan, meadow seed foam and rosehip oils, this all-nourishing and non-greasy conditioning cream delivers long lasting hydration to parched skin. Gently and effectively improving the tone and texture of your skin and leaving a natural hint of the sweetest smelling coconut lingering on your skin, this buttery blend melts like a dream to reveal dolphin-smooth skin from head-to-toe. Result!

name: Frank Body Peppermint Scrub 200g
description: Wake up and smell the coffee scrub. frank bodys Peppermint Coffee Scrub uses natural, vegan and cruelty-free ingredients to leave your skin smoother, softer and brighter, not to mention more energised (thank you, coffee). Turns out coffees awakening powers arent confined to your morning latte; the scrub utilises roasted coffee grinds to give your skin a workout, boosting blood flow, promoting collagen production and gently exfoliating away dead skin cells. For an added energy boost, peppermint oil grants a cooling sensation thats sure to get your cogs whirring. The formulas talents extend to battling breakouts, calming redness and soothing irritation, courtesy of aloe vera and its anti-bacterial properties. It contains hydrators too we know, what an overachiever including olive and sweet almond oils, which are packed with fatty acids and vitamins to moisturise, fade scarring and stretch marks, and brighten dull complexions. Shower time never felt (or smelt) so good
how_to_use: In the shower, massage the scrub in circular motions over wet skin for a few minutes, focusing on dry areas, scars, stretch marks, breakouts or cellulite. Rinse off and pat dry.

name: Lanolips Rose Intense Hand Cream 50ml
description: Are you yet to find a good-to-skin hand cream that nourishes sensitive, cracked and dry hands that doesn’t sting or leave a sticky residue? Well, let us introduce you to Lanolips’ multi-award-winning Rose Hand Cream Intense, a rose oil-infused cocoon-like formula that will soothe skin with its antioxidant-rich goodness. Boasting a triple lanolin formula (lanolin is this brand’s secret ingredient that mimics your own skin oils to restore moisture unlike anything else) combined with rich shea, cocoa, jojoba oil and vitamin E, this is a deeply nourishing and hydrating cream that leaves a non-sticky veil that continually moisturises skin throughout the day. It’s also available in {Coconutter Hand Cream Intense} and {Lemon Hand Cream Intense} formulations, so you can choose your favourite from the scent selection – or collect them all.
how_to_use: Warm the cream between your hands, massage into nail beds, cuticles and skin. Allow the veil to absorb and settle. Use as often as required and especially after washing hands and before going to bed. Keep below 25c.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Charlotte's Magic Body Cream 200ml
description: Inspired by the MUA’s award-winning Magic Cream, this reviving formula is here to transform your limbs and beyond with intense hydration and moisture that lasts up to 24 hours. Energising caffeine works to reduce the appearance of cellulite alongside damask rose water and the brand’s ALGAKTIV UPLIFT, which simultaneously tighten and firm the skin. Soybean is also key for its softening benefits, boosted with smoothing sunflower oil and plumping glycerin for a radiant finish.

For a lymphatic drainage massage: using the fingertips, gently glide over the skin towards the nearest lymph node — encouraging fluid drainage and toxins. To relieve joint tension: gently massage in circular movements around the joints (ankles, kneecaps, elbows and wrists) to relieve tension.

name: Caudalie Shower Gel Soleil des Vignes 200ml
description: Elevate your bathing rituals with Caudalie’s indulgent Shower Gel Soleil des Vignes. Suitable for all skin types, this soap-free wash is made from a 100% plant-based formula that’s as effective as it is gentle on your skin. The luxurious shower gel is enriched with soothing coconut milk to comfort and moisturise your limbs as you massage the silky gel over your skin. The best bit? It boasts a delectable scent that will make you wish you never had to rinse off the suds; delicate notes of orange blossom, watermelon and white jasmine create a pleasingly bright and sunny aroma.
how_to_use: Lather onto damp skin. Rinses off easily and leaves a delicate scent on your skin. Ideal for anyone wishing to turn showering into a moment of well-being with this delicately scented shower nectar.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Decyl Glucoside*, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate*, Glycerin*, Parfum (Fragrance), Sucrose Cocoate*, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Propanediol*, Sodium Glutamate, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Coconut Acid*, Linalool, Citric Acid*, Geraniol, Citronellol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice* (277/005).

name: L'Occitane Verbena Body Milk (250ml)
description: Cocoon your limbs in the sun-drenched scent of Provence with L'Occitane's Verbena Fresh Body Milk, a fresh, lightweight hydrator that's sure to transport your senses to sunnier climes. If fresh and fruity notes make your senses sing with delight, then this citrus-scented body milk should be heading straight into your next beauty haul. Refreshing yet uplifting, your limbs will thank you for the sparkling, fruity scent left behind once this lightweight blend melts into your skin. Combining an extract of organic verbena from Provence, with lemon and essential oils and a hint of Italian grapefruit extract, this might just be what pure bliss smells like, but we'll let you decide...
how_to_use: Apply a small quantity of the product on clean hands. Massage into the skin with slow, circular movements, always working from your ankles up. Remember to focus on areas you wish to tighten and firm, such as your thighs and stomach area.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tapioca Starch, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Lippia Citriodora Leaf Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Menthol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Tocopherol, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum/Fragrance, Limonene, Citral, Geraniol, Linalool.

name: Kora Organics Noni Glow Face Oil 10ml
description: Kiss goodbye to your skin care bugbears with the KORA Organics Noni Glow Face Oil – a luxurious (but light!) treatment oil for face and neck that calms and brightens your skin while keeping it happily nourished, too. KORA Organics Noni Glow Face Oil houses a potent powerful blend of antioxidants (like noni fruit extract, which is great for replenishing the skin’s texture) and fatty acids (thank you, rosehip and sea buckthorn oil) that work together to soothe, hydrate and brighten dull complexions for a healthy, radiant glow. The “#1 favourite product and secret travel companion” of CEO Miranda Kerr herself, this multi-tasker can be used alone or mixed with your favourite moisturiser or concealer for an extra boost of hydration and for a gorgeously natural, healthy-looking sheen.
how_to_use: Warm a few drops in the palms of your hands and apply over the face, neck and décolletage after cleansing and before moisturising. To restore skin to its optimum beauty, use as a daily nourishing treatment.
ingredient: Rosa Canina Fruit Oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunﬂower) Seed Oil*, Tocopherol, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Morinda Citrifolia Fruit Extract*, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower/leaf/stem Extract, Jasminum Ofﬁcinale (Jasmine) Flower/leaf Extract, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Flower Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil*, Punica Granatum Seed Oil*, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Seed Oil*, Geraniol**, Citronellol**, Farnesol** Citral**. *Ingredient from Organic Farming. **From essential oils. 100% natural origin of total.

name: Weleda Stretch Mark Massage Oil 100ml
description: Helping your body adapt to the beautiful, natural changes that come with nurturing new life, Weleda’s Stretch Mark Massage Oil is carefully formulated to encourage the elasticity and resilience of your skin. The ultimate way to give your body the attention and care it deserves, this nourishing treatment harnesses only pure, natural ingredients to protect and support your skin. The vegan oil is saturated with sweet almond oil (a fine and light oil that’s brimming with unsaturated fatty oils, such as linolenic acid), wheatgerm oil which boasts high levels of skin-conditioning vitamin E and organic arnica to boost elasticity, thereby preventing burgeoning stretch marks! That’s not all, there’s also a gorgeous infusion of precious oils, such as rose, neroli ad myrrh, that delivers a delicate, indulgent aroma to your skin.
how_to_use: Massage in two to three times daily, from the beginning of pregnancy up to the end of the breastfeeding period, using with light, circular movements over tummy, thighs, bottom and breasts.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Lanolin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Beeswax (Cera Alba), Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Glycerin, Limonene*, Viola Tricolor Extract, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Hydrolyzed Beeswax, Sobitan Olivate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Arginine, Zinc Sulfate, Linalool*, Geraniol*, Citral*, Coumarin*. *From natural essential oils

name: Marvis Travel Aquatic Mint Toothpaste
description: Put aside your drugstore toothpaste Marvis has all the benefits of your regular paste but with a range of unusual yet pleasurable flavours guaranteed to inject some excitement into your daily ablutions. As youd expect from any toothpaste worth its salt (or should we say, xylitol?), it cleanses, freshens breath, removes plaque and tartar, and keeps gums in tip-top shape. Unlike your bog-standard formula however, there are flavours such as Cinnamon Mint, Ginger Mint, and Liquorice Mint, alongside classics like Aquatic Mint all encased in a stylish, contemporary silver tube that will look enviably modern on your bathroom shelf. Perfectly sized for on-the-go, these travel-ready products are also perfect for popping into your suitcase (or for sampling your way through the exciting flavours on offer)! Marvi-lous, or what?!
how_to_use: Use morning and evening to brush your teeth.
ingredient: Glycerin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Aqua, Silica, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Titanium Dioxide, Xylitol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Limonene.

name: Murad City Skin Age Defense Broad Spectrum SPF50 PA ++++ 50ml
description: Your first line of defence between skin and the adverse effects of the plagues-of-the-age, Murad’s City Skin Age Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 50 works to deflect the five primary causes of damage. Doing daily battle against UV rays, pollution and even blue light from our screens, skin had a lot to contend with – which is why Murad have developed a featherlight ‘force field’ to shield from the everyday onslaught. This advanced, fragrance free, 100% mineral sunscreen provides high factor, SPF 50 protection from the ageing effects of UVA and UVA rays – one of the primary contributing factors to fine lines and dark spots – while a polymer matrix forms a breathable ‘second skin’ that inhibits adhesion (and hence, penetration) of toxins. Suitable for all skin types with no ashy cast and colour-corrective technology, this brilliant blend has a luminous finish that grants skin a natural glow while providing protection from HEV rays, infrared radiation and particulate matter (think smoke, fumes and other skin-damaging radicals).
how_to_use: Shake well. Apply liberally to face, neck, and chest. For best results, apply a generous, small amount after daily moisturiser application for complete protection.

name: Isle of Paradise Blending Brush
description: The perfect companion to your favourite self-tanning formulas, the Shape and Glow Big Blending Brush boasts super-soft, vegan and cruelty-free fibres (real animal hair is so passé) that allow for even, streak-free application. Perfectly palm-sized to give you complete glow-control, this kabuki brush feels like a cloud on skin – working to smooth dry and dull textures for faultlessly even application. Coming in a cleverly contoured shape, the silky hairs mould to both face and body – making blending oh-so easy. Use this to effortlessly apply, buff and contour your fave formulas, and don’t worry about cleaning – it’s never been simpler! Just gently wash with some soapy water and leave to dry.
how_to_use: Apply your favourite paradise product for an even skin finish. Use to blend out tricky areas like hands, feet, elbows and knees. Also use to shape and contour to add definition to both face and body. Care instructions:﻿ Wash gently with warm soapy water and leave to dry before next use.
ingredient: Synthetic bristles.

name: Frank Body Cacao Coffee Scrub 200g
description: As if we needed another reason to love chocolate, frank bodys Cacao Coffee Scrub comes along and sweeps us off our (very soft, smooth and hydrated) feet. A concoction of natural, vegan and cruelty-free ingredients, it not only smells delish, it treats dry, dull and scarred skin too. Roasted coffee grinds make up the exfoliating base, gently removing dead skin cells while improving blood flow and stimulating collagen production. The irresistible chocolatey scent comes from organic cacao extract, which is packed with antioxidants to nourish, protect and grant a radiant glow. Specially formulated to hydrate skin as well as exfoliate, the scrub contains cold pressed macadamia and sweet almond oils to replenish moisture and gently fade scarring or marks. To say were obsessed is an understatement!
how_to_use: In the shower, massage the scrub in circular motions over wet skin for a few minutes, focusing on dry areas, scars, stretch marks, breakouts or cellulite. Rinse off and pat dry.
ingredient: Coffea Robusta Seed Powder, Water (Aqua), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Sodium Chloride, Sucrose, Juglans Regia (Walnut) Shell Powder, Parfum, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Fruit Powder, Benzyl Alcohol, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Glycerin, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract.

name: Drunk Elephant Kamili Cream Body Cleanser 240ml
description: Bid bye-bye to that wretched bar of soap in your shower and replace it with this creamy, moisturising Kamili Cream Body Cleanser made from a blend of passionfruit and amino acids to leave skin feeling soft, clean and coddled. Mmmm. Introducing Drunk Elephant's all-new and utterly must-have hair and body range, created by the brand's CEO, Tiffany because "Skin is skin - and whether we call it the scalp or the eye area or the legs, it can only function at its healthiest when it’s treated with smart, nourishing, skin-compatible ingredients. All skin deserves to be respected with ingredients it can get along with." Infused with luxe, fatty acid-rich marula, sweet almond, sacha inchi seed and maracuja oils, plus a multi-amino acid blend, Kamili calms while rinsing dirt and other substances away - without stripping or disrupting the delicate skin barrier. Kamili has a pH level of 5.0 and is appropriate for all skin, even the most sensitive.
how_to_use: Apply to wet skin. Massage gently and rinse.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium Laurylglucosides Hydroxypropylsulfonate, Coco-Glucoside, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Chloride, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Coconut Alkanes, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Plukenetia Volubilis Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cassia Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Carbomer, Sodium PCA, Panthenol, Glycol Distearate, Sodium Lactate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, PCA, Alanine, Arginine, Glycine, Histidine, Isoleucine, Phenylalalnine, Proline, Serine, Threonine, Valine, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Aspartic Acid, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Seed Extract, Benzoic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Sodium Acetate

name: Herbivore Bakuchiol Retinol Alternative Smoothing Serum 30ml
description: Make way for Herbivore’s Bakuchiol Serum – a silky-smooth, gel-textured, water-based formula that absorbs quickly to brighten, even texture, reduce the appearance of lines and soothe dryness. Giving a wealth of smoothing, brightening and fine line-reducing benefits, the serum contains bakuchiol, a natural ingredient derived from the babchi plant that's also known as psoralea corylifolia seed extract. Scientifically proven to be just as effective as retinol in its ability to lessen hyperpigmentation and fine lines, bakuchiol does it all without the redness-inducing irritation and peeling skin that is common with retinol use. A 1% polyhydroxy acid blend even exfoliates the surface of your skin to gently even texture and minimise fine lines while boosting serum absorption and hydrating. Empowered by tremella mushroom (also known as snow mushroom) extract, this serum then infuses skin with deep hydration and encourages moisture retention to give plump and radiant looking skin. Rich in antioxidants, blueberry stem cells strengthen your skin and protect against environmental aggressors that contribute to premature signs of ageing. Best of all, this natural and vegan serum is suitable for all skin types – even the most sensitive – but don't just take our word for it! In a blind test where 106 women used this elixir twice-daily for four weeks, 91% agreed it didn't cause irritation and 85% agreed that skin looked smoother and less dull.
how_to_use: Apply 4-6 drops to clean, toned skin. Massage in as a leave-on treatment. Follow up with moisturizer and facial oil. Use daily or as often as needed. Store upright in a cool, dry place and out of direct sunlight.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Glycerin, Psoralea Corylifolia Seed Extract, Amethyst Extract, Leuconostoc/ Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Populus Tremuloides Bark Extract, Gluconolactone, Sodium Phytate, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Amino Esters-1, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract.

name: OUAI Body Cleanser Melrose Place 300ml
description: Take a one-OUAI ticket to L.A. with this super rich Melrose Body Cleanser. Lathering with foamy skin-loving goodies that are totally rid of sulfates and parabens, this all-nourishing cleanser gently removes the dirt and debris that your skin could happily do without. Full to the brim with natural antioxidants, vitamins A and C, jojoba and rosehip oil, this moisture-filled cleanser feeds your skin with long-lasting hydration that you never knew you needed! With skin so soft and supple, it’s no wonder why this has grown to be a cult fave that’s flying into everyone’s shopping basket…
how_to_use: Use daily all over your body until a foamy lather forms and rinse thoroughly.
ingredient: Water / Aqua / Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Peg-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Acrylates Copolymer, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Lactobacillus Ferment, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzophenone-4, Cocamide Mipa, Disodium Edta, Hydroxyacetophenone, Peg-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Polyquaternium-7, Polysorbate 20, Tocopherol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Citronellol, Linalool, Ext Violet 2 (Ci 60730).

name: Tan-Luxe The Face Illuminating Self-Tan Drops 30ml - Medium/Dark
description: Meet your moisturiser’s new best friend: The Face by TAN-LUXE. Just a few drops added to your existing skin care favourites will take lifeless, lacklustre complexions to the beach and back – imparting an effortless, natural-looking glow. Enriched with raspberry seed oil, vitamin E and aloe vera, every droplet of this miracle formula bronzes, boosts and fortifies skin’s fabric. A million miles away from the tell-tale ‘tangoed’ look of so many traditional fake tans, The Face comes in two shades – ‘Light to Medium’ and ‘Medium to Dark’ – to guarantee a realistic, streak-free finish. Like a sun-drenched holiday in a bottle, it delivers even, luminous colour that can easily be customised by adding extra drops to your chosen skin care product. No smell. No fuss. No drama. Just glow and go.
how_to_use: Prep Be sure to cleanse and wash your face before application. Apply Mix 1-4 drops to your usual moisturiser, serum or face oil in the palm of your hand and apply evenly over the face. Additional drops of the product will add depth of colour and glow to the final result. Wash hands thoroughly after application. Maintain Gently exfoliate skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Dihydroxyacetone, Alcohol Denat (Alcohol), Glycerin, Erythrulose, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hydrolysed Silk, Caramel, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 80, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Bu-Tylphenyl Methylpropional, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzoic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Phenoxyethanol. Paraben Free

name: Frank Body Coconut Coffee Scrub 200g
description: Gorgeously glowing skin is only a shower away Meet frank bodys Coconut Coffee Scrub, a bearer of soft, hydrated, radiant skin that smells oh-so fine. Using natural, vegan and cruelty-free ingredients, the scrub utilises roasted coffee grinds and jojoba beads to gently exfoliate away dead and dull skin cells, while promoting collagen production and blood flow. Coconut oil takes the reigns on the hydration front, providing a surge of moisture to thirsty skin that lasts long beyond the bathroom and lets not forget its anti-bacterial properties, which will soothe irritation often associated with dry and patchy skin. The scrubs glow-giving powers come largely from grapeseed oil an oil full of fatty acids and vitamins C, D and E to help fade scarring and marks while tightening and protecting from environmental aggressors. Just when you thought it couldnt get any better, the scrub is free from all sorts of nasties including parabens, sulphates and PEGs
how_to_use: In the shower, massage the scrub in circular motions over wet skin for a few minutes, focusing on dry areas, scars, stretch marks, breakouts or cellulite. Wait three minutes to benefit from the scrubs moisturising properties. Rinse off and pat dry.
ingredient: Coffea Robusta Seed Powder, Water (Aqua), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Sodium Chloride, Sucrose, Olus (Vegetable) Oil, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Parfum, Benzyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Coumarin.

name: Sun Bum Sun Bum Day Tripper Kit
description: A travel-sized trio that’s great for a sun-drenched minibreak (please GOD!), Sun Bum’s Day Tripper Kit unites SPF 30 Moisturizing Sunscreen Lotion (88ml), Cool Down After Sun Lotion (88ml) and SPF 30 Sunscreen Lip Balm in ‘Coconut’ (4.25g). Everything you need to protect and replenish your skin – whether you’re lunching al fresco or having a well-deserved break at the beach – this kit will deflect the skin-damaging UVA/UVB rays before calming and cooling your skin at the end of a brilliant day. Housed in an über cute beach bag-compatible pouch, the phenomenal, non-greasy screen remains water-resistant for 80 minutes – making it perfect for water babes – and is completely free from oxybenzone (which can jeopardise marine life). Better get booking that get-away…
how_to_use: Apply SPF products liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, at least every two hours.

Cool Down After Sun Lotion (88ml): Water, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Stearic Acid, Cotton Seed Oil, Sorbitol, Theobroma Oil (Cocoa Butter), Simmondsia Chinensis Oil (Jojoba Oil), Aloe Barbadensis Gel (Aloe Vera), Cetyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Oleate, Triethanolamine (TEA), Diazolidinyl Urea, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Fragrance. SPF 30 Sunscreen Lip Balm in ‘Coconut’ (4.25g): Avobenzone 2.00%, Homosalate 15.00%, Octisalate 5.00%, Adipic Acid / Diglycol Crosspolymer, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Ascorbic Acid, BHT, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Caprylic / Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Alcohol, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Cyclohexasiloxane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Diisobutyl Adipate, Dimethicone, Equisetum Arvense Extract, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Fragrance, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Hydrate Silica, Isostearyl Linoleate, Macrocystis Pyritera Extract, Mineral Oil Ozokerite, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, PEG-8, Polysorbate 80, Propylene Glycol, Punica Granatum Extract, Retinyl Palmitate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Extract, Sodium Saccharin, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Tocopheryl Acetate.
volume: Sunscreen Lotion: 88ml / Lip Balm: 4.25g / After Sun: 88ml

name: BYREDO Rose Hand Lotion
description: BYREDO's Rose Hand Lotion not only sinks in quickly without making your hands greasy and unusable (anyone with a slightly difficult bathroom door knob knows the potential hand cream dangers). It smells beautifully of pink pepper, rose petals and wild musk. BYREDO's hand care line unites pleasure and function, eloquently enhancing the most habitual of gestures with fragrance. This moisturiser softens rough skin, cuticles and nails. This is ‘pro’ skin care for those who’re planning to grow older gracefully, proud of the skin that they live in. Part of the BYREDO body collection, find the matching Hand Wash too!
how_to_use: Apply a small amount after cleansing. Massage into skin for soft, hydrated hands. Rejoice!

name: Bondi Sands Liquid Gold Self Tanning Foam
description: The brand's longest lasting formula that requires zero wash off, Bondi Sands Liquid Gold Self Tanning Foam is perfect for those wanting to achieve a flawless yet long-lasting tan at a moments notice. Created with a minor colour guide that disappears once rubbed into skin, Bondi Sands Liquid Gold Self Tanning Foam can be applied before popping clothes on and going about your day as normal with the tan developing over the next six to eight hours. Enriched with Argan Oil and infused with the scent of coconut, this hydrating self-tanning foam will develop into a golden tan that is touch dry in seconds. Last minute planners – this one's for you!
how_to_use: For an even streak free tan use the Bondi Sands Exfoliating Mitt to ensure skin is clean and smooth. Lightly moisturise hands, knees and any dry areas. Apply Liquid Gold directly onto skin and use the Bondi Sands Application Mitt to smooth foam over your legs, arms and body using long sweeping motions. Use remaining tan on mitt for face, elbows and knees. Dress and go. No shower necessary. For a deeper tan reapply 30 minutes after application.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Dihydroxyacetone, Propylene Glycol, Alcohol, Polysorbate 20, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Oleth-20, Pentylene Glycol, Erythrulose, Sodium Metabisulfite, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Parfum (Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ci 14700 (Fd&C Red No. 4), Ci 19140 (Fd&C Yellow No. 5), Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ci 42090 (Fd&C Blue No. 1), Coumarin.

name: RANAVAT Sacred Rose Hand Cream
description: Like dipping your hands in silk and roses, RANAVAT's Sacred Rose Hand Cream is brimming with nurturing natural extracts to soften, comfort and hydrate overworked hands. Infused with sacred petals from Pushkar, India — a lakeside city dotted with white temples and red rose gardens — the sateen cream will leave your skin soft to the touch. This luscious cream is packed with powerful natural ingredients to fend against rough, dry skin. The base of mild sweet almond oil makes it suitable for almost all skin types and lends the blend an abundance of vitamin E, vitamin A, essential fatty acids, proteins, potassium and zinc to nourish your skin. A dash of Damask rose (an ingredient long-favoured in the luxurious beauty treatment of royals) works to brighten and hydrate your hands while sesame seed extract helps to restore damaged skin and soothe irritation.
how_to_use: Apply cream to hands and massage into skin until fully absorbed. Reapply as needed.
ingredient: Water (Aqua/Eau), Sesamum Indicum (Sesame Seed) Oil*, Cetearyl Olivate**, Sorbitan Olivate**, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate**, Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera (Sunflower) Wax, Coco-Caprylate**, Prunus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil**, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Oil**, Rubia Cordifolia (Manjistha) Oil* [Sesamum Indicum (Sesame Seed) Oil*, Rubia Cordifolia (Manjistha)*, Water (Aqua/Eau)], Dehydoracetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol**, Tocopherol+, Acacia Senegal Gum (and) Xanthan Gum**, Stearic acid, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Essential Oil, Sodium Benzoate. *Certified Organic / **Vegetable derived / +Non-GMO soy

name: Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Drops - Dark 30ml
description: Control your glow or easily top-up your tan with Isle of Paradise’s custom Self-Tanning Drops. Simply add 1 to 12 drops to your face or body lotion and watch that beautiful sun-kissed glow radiate from your skin. Free from tell-tale tango pigment, biscuit scent or eye-catching streaks, this foolproof formula is a must-have and is perfectly sized for on-the-go so you can keep that faux glow all year round. Anything but ordinary, all Isle of Paradise products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free and organic and is free from any nasties you wouldn’t want to find in your favourite tanner. But that’s not it, each bottle is infused with intelligent colour-correcting actives to help give serious glow-getters their best glow ever and is also packed with organic tanning actives such as avocado, chia seed and coconut oil for a healthy, happy and hydrated glow that you’ll absolutely adore. But which shade is best for you? Simply pick from the Peach, Green or Violet ranges. The ‘Light’ peach colour-coded range is amazing for paler skin tones wanting that super healthy, light glow and overall brightening effect. Formulated with a unique OXY-GLOW complex to brighten skin, the ‘Light’ Self-Tanning Drops will add a subtle sun-kissed glow and radiant complexion. Pick the ‘Medium’ green colour-coded range for a flawless golden glow that is formulated with Isle of Paradise’s SuperBalance complex a green pigmented colour-corrector that cancels out redness and inflammation within the skin. Finally, pick ‘Dark’ the violet colour-coded range for your darkest tan yet. Formulated with HyperViolet complex, this hides yellow, orange and ash tones within the skin for an incredibly rich tan.
how_to_use: Add 1-12 drops to your favourite moisturiser, mix together & apply to skin. More drops = deeper tan. Wash hands after application.

name: Tan-Luxe Glow Body Oil 100ml
description: Keep your tan in top condition with TAN-LUXE Illuminating Glow Body Oil. Formulated with nourishing plant oils to keep skin feeling supple and smooth, this instantly illuminating oil leaves limbs with a beautiful glow that enhances your tan (natural or otherwise). Made with a soothing blend of jojoba, prickly pear and pomegranate, this luxe oil pumps up the skin's natural moisture levels to leave you feeling silky smooth from top to toe - and your tan looking its best. Deceptively lightweight but seriously nourishing, it sinks in fast, leaving behind a subtle shimmer, TAN-LUXE's signature (biscuit-free) scent and zero greasiness.
how_to_use: Massage into skin with circular motions. Apply all-over for a top to toe glow or focus on the décolleté, shoulders and legs for a glossy, highlighted effect. Wash hands thoroughly after use.

name: Supergoop! Sheerscreen + (RE)Setting Powder : Mineral SPF Lover Duo (Worth £62.00)
description: Meet the mineral sunscreens that are changing the name of the SPF game... Supergoop!’s perfectly partnered mineral formulas will keep your skin shielded from sun damage without a hint of greasy residue or an unpleasant chalky finish. Introducing the Mineral Sheerscreen SPF 30, a super sheer, reef-friendly and non-chalky formula that can be worn alone or under make up to keep your skin protected no matter what your day holds. While ‘sheer doesn’t mean completely ‘clear’, this has been innovatively formulated with a web-like structure that suspends non-nano zinc oxide into a matrix. But what does that mean you might well ask? This results in a formula that can stretch and adapt leaving it ultra-lightweight in finish and feel. Protecting your skin from blue-light induced damage is blush clover extract, harvested in South Korea and revered for its medicinal properties this keeps skin safe from oxidative stress. To ensure your complexion stays protected all day long, look no further than the (Re)Setting 100% Mineral Powder SPF 30. Your simple, easy-to-use solution for on-the-go SPF touch ups - while also offering all the skin-blurring, perfecting and mattifying power of a finishing powder. This SPF hero will lock your make up in place without a hint of cakiness and all while keeping your skin protected. All of our mineral SPF dreams have just come true...
how_to_use: Mineral Sheerscreen SPF 30: Apply generously and evenly as the last step in your skincare routine, before makeup and 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply frequently to maintain protection, especially after perspiring, swimming, or towelling. (Re)Setting 100% Mineral Powder SPF 30: Remove the cap and slide down the clear plastic sleeve. Remove and discard the plastic yellow pin at the centre of the brush. Twist the body of the brush from the CLOSED position to OPEN. Tilt and tap the brush gently against your wrist until you see the powder start to flow through the bristles. When your makeup is ready to go, brush the powder generously over your face to set the look and mattify your skin. Reapply throughout the day as needed. To close, twist the body of the brush from the OPEN position to CLOSED, pull up the clear plastic sleeve and snap the cap back on.
ingredient: Mineral Sheerscreen SPF 30: Active ingredients: Zinc Oxide 17.5%. Inactive ingredients: Water, Isododecane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Propanediol, Glycerin, Squalane, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Polyglycerin-3, Polyglyceryl-3 Lactate/Laurate, Polysilicone-11, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Butylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Isostearic Acid, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Citric Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Lespedeza Capitata Leaf/Stem Extract, Maltodextrin, Sodium Hyaluronate. (Re)Setting 100% Mineral Powder SPF 30: Zinc Oxide 24.7%, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Silica, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Lauroyl Lysine, Polyglyceryl-10 Pentaisostearate, Boron Nitride, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Nylon-6/12, Sodium Dehyrdoacetate, Olive Glycerides, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Ceramide 3, May contain Iron Oxides (CI 77492, 77491, 77499).

name: Coco & Eve Applicator Mitt
description: A match made in heaven for the glow-giving {Sunny Honey Bali Bronzing Foam}, this Applicator Mitt makes for seamlessly blended, streak-free self-tanning. Developed with a hypoallergenic, soft velvet mitt that glides smoothly over your skin, this applicator plays well with foam, mousse, lotion or spray formulas. It's perfect for evenly distributing your favourite faux glow without absorbing (read: wasting!) the precious formula. Keeping the tan from gathering on the dry areas of your body, this plush mitt is a must for super easy application.
how_to_use: Use to apply tanning formulas to tricky-to-reach areas for seamless, streak-free coverage.
ingredient: 45% Polyester Velvet, 45% Sponge, 10% TPU Membrane.

name: NUXE Sun Tanning Oil Face and Body SPF 30 (150ml)
description: Designed for face and body, this fast-absorbing product delivers low protection to enhance your natural tan, while leaving your skin with the most beautiful satin finish. Formulated with Nuxe's patented filtering complex - this SPF30 contains three sunscreens and two esters, which have been rigorously selected for their proven effectiveness on all UV rays (think: short UVB + UVA + long UVA.) A botanical blend of rice and rosemary extracts is also used to offer cellular protection and ensure your skin maintains a more youthful-looking appearance. This clean formula has been tested on algae and corals to ensure its non-toxic for marine life, and has a non-greasy texture that absorbs instantly and leaves a satin finish that enhances your tan. As for the scent? Nuxe has bottled the dreamy spirit of summer with tantalising notes of sweet orange, tiare flower and vanilla.
how_to_use: Apply product generously before sun exposure. Spray the product into your hands before applying to your face, avoiding the eye area. On the body, you can spray it directly before spreading it carefully. Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or towel-drying your skin. Note: Applying an insufficient amount of product will significantly reduce the level of sun protection. Excessive exposure to the sun is dangerous and sun care products do not provide 100% protection. Avoid exposure to the sun in the middle of the day.
ingredient: Coco-caprylate/caprate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Dibutyl Adipate, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Bis-ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Hydrogenated Castor Oil/sebacic Acid Copolymer, Dextrin Myristate, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Parfum/fragrance, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ethyl Ferulate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Geraniol [N5105/A].

name: Versed Guard's Up Daily Mineral Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF35 50ml
description: Shielding you from much more than just the sun, the Guard's Up Daily Mineral Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 35 protects you on all fronts – from environmental pollution, electronic pollution (because TikTok is a time-stealing vortex) and the sun. Offering its services without a trace of chalkiness or white cast, this creamy and lightweight formula delivers a natural finish that looks neither too dewy nor too matte. Oil free and powered by 15.2% non-nano zinc oxide, (which is the safest SPF active available as it won’t penetrate the epidermis or harm marine wildlife), this formula works on the skin’s surface to physically prevent rays from penetrating. Broad-spectrum protection (that’s protection against UVA and UVB rays, FYI) joins an array of antioxidants in safeguarding you from blue light, and amino acid-rich sea fennel extract boosts your elastin levels to firm and add bounce. Plus, moringa seed extract boasts vitamin C and encourages the production of collagen, and aloe leaf extract attracts and retains moisture while soothing skin.
how_to_use: HOW: Gently smooth an even, generous layer (about the size of a coin) onto skin. Because mineral SPF acts as a barrier, sitting on the surface of the skin, do smooth it on—don’t rub it in the way you would a moisturizer. Use a light touch with this and any products you apply after to avoid makeup pilling. WHERE: Face and neck. Bonus points for hands—after your eyes, hands are the number two spot that gives away age. WHEN: AM (every AM), after your moisturizer has fully absorbed into your skin. If wearing makeup, allow 2-3 minutes for the sunscreen to sink in before applying primer or other cosmetics. Reapply every 2 hours when in direct sunlight or getting wet. GOOD TO KNOW: Even though mineral sunscreen goes to work right away, we recommend following the FDA guidelines to wait 15 minutes before sun exposure. And remember: No sunscreen is a replacement for staying out of the sun. Use before the expiration date printed on the crimp on the tube.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Ultra-Light SPF30 Sun Protection Spray 200ml
description: Utilising a unique filtering system known as ‘Mexoplex’ you can breathe easy knowing that your skin is safe in the hands of our favourite no-nonsense pharmacy brand La Roche-Posay. Reinforce your skin from UVA, UVB and Infrared rays with this high, broad-spectrum and photostable sun spray. If you’re prone to sun sensitivity and prickly heat then this is the SPF for you. You’ll find a high PPD (Persistent Pigment Darkening) factor across every offering in the Anthelios range, making sure you get the best possible UVA protection for a more youthful and even skin tone. Tested, re-tested and tested again for its mildness on sensitive skin, this hypoallergenic and dermatologist recommended sunscreen is fulfilling all our summer holiday needs. Water-resistant, nourishing and soothing on sensitive skin? What more could we ask for!
how_to_use: Apply 30 minutes before exposure and reapply frequently and generously every two hours to maintain protection especially after swimming, perspiring or towelling. Avoid exposure to the sun during the hottest hours of the day.

name: BYREDO Gypsy Water Body Wash
description: If you're obsessed with BYREDO's utterly iconic perfumes and want to delicately scent your body while simultaneously cleansing and caring for skin, you need to discover the brand's decadent range of body care, beginning with the Gypsy Water Body Wash. Housed in the brand's instantly recognisable (and incredibly lust-have) chic and simple – yet quintessentially luxe – monochrome bottles, BYREDO's Gypsy Water Body Wash enables you to upgrade your scenting experience while leaving skin feeling soft, silky and subtly perfumed throughout the day. Created as an ode to Romani culture, prepare to fall for the scent's spellbinding blend of woody pine needle and sandalwood alongside intense amber and refreshing citrus (think: lemon and bergamot) to evoke the fever and spirit of nights spent in the forest.

name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Gel B5 Pro-Recovery Skincare 40ml
description: Forming an invisible bandage on sore skin, La Roche-Posay's insulating Cicaplast Gel B5 brings instant relief to compromised and damaged skin. This is one treatment to keep stocked on your shelfie at all times. Your new personal at-home healer can be used by every member of the family to treat damaged skin and even when recovering from laser treatments and cosmetic peels. Working to stimulate new cell production is a complex of copper, manganese and zinc that are perfectly partnered with hyaluronic acid, drawing in all the water your skin is craving. Wondering what brings that instant relief? Panthenol is your hero ingredient at play here at 5% to immediately soothe sore skin. Using this just twice a day is enough to speed up healing times and improve your skin barrier health. It might sound too good to be true but this clinically tested treatment has the dermatologist seal of approval!
how_to_use: Apply twice a day to cleansed and dry skin. Do not apply directly on wounded skin. Avoid the eye contour area.

description: Sunnies? Check. Obnoxiously big sun hat? Check. The Very High Protection Water SPF50? Ch-ch-check! Dousing (without drenching) your hair and skin with all-over UV protection, this antioxidant-rich formula is just what your beach bag has been waiting for. Boasting a half-water, half-oil bi-phase formula featuring polyphenols and nourishing vitamin E, this ocean-friendly emulsion absorbs quickly without a single trace, expect its light summer-inspired fragrance. Time to chase the sun!

description: The über-luxurious Honey Bath (complete with your very own wooden honey dipper) is renowned as the ultimate calm-restorer, lulling you into a state of blissful relaxation while protecting skin and balancing moisture levels. Perfect as a pick-me-up treat or as a present for your favourite boujee bath lover, pick from four incredibly indulgent ‘flavours’ – ‘Fresh Fig’, ‘Almond Coconut’, or ‘Crème Brûlée’ – and get ready for some serious R&R.

name: CeraVe Soothing and Repairing Hand Cream 50ml
description: Our hands have never been under so much stress; what with over-washing and alcohol-heavy sanitisers disprupting their natural moisture balance, they’re much more prone to dryness. That’s where CeraVe’s Reparative Hand Cream comes in! As with all CeraVe superheroes, at the core of this hand cream is a cocktail of three essential ceramides (lipids that are essentially the ‘glue’ of your skin barrier). Flooding your skin with these ceramides helps to keep that skin barrier in tip-top health, helping to maintain moisture levels and keep irritation, sensitivity and eczema at bay. CeraVe’s unique ‘MVE Technology’ means you get even more from these ceramides; it ensures they’re gradually released over time to ensure long-lasting nourishment and hydration. It’s perfect for rough and dry paws!
how_to_use: Apply liberally to your hands, as often as needed.

name: St. Tropez Express Starter Kit
description: Short on time and sun? Taking some of the stress out of last-minute plans, St. Tropez’s Express Mini Kit holds the key to gorgeously sun-kissed skin in just one hour. The mini Self Tan Express Bronzing Mousse (30ml) is a fast-acting mousse that develops into a radiant glow after just one hour, a medium tan in two hours or a deep bronze after three! Allowing you to control the depth and time spent on your skin, the intelligent formula is a staple in the collection faux glow aficionados and learners alike. The streak-free, easy-to-use formula is accompanied by the luxe Velvet Applicator Mitt for effortlessly even distribution that won’t leave tell-tale stains on your hands.
how_to_use: Step 1: Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Immediately prior to application, moisturise any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles and feet. Step 2: For best results, apply using our Tan Applicator Mitt in long sweeping motions, starting at the ankles and working your way up. Then for your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. Ensure all areas are covered before lightly gliding any excess tan from the Mitt over your hands and feet. Step 3: Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. Step 4: Allow 1, 2 or 3 hours depending on your desired shade, before showering to reveal your developed tan. Your tan will then continue to develop for up to 8 hours. Step 5: To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturise daily, exfoliate regularly and reapply as desired.
ingredient: Self Tan Express Bronzing Mousse: Aqua (Water), Dihydroxyacetone, Caramel, Propylene Glycol, Ethoxydiglycol, Glycerin, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Decyl Glucoside, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum (Fragrance), Melanin, Cetyl Hydroxyethylcellulose, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Sodium Metabisulfite, Ethylhexylglycerin, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, CI 14700 (Red 4), Hexyl Cinnamal, CI 19140 (Yellow 5), Citronellol, CI 42090 (Blue 1), Limonene, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Geraniol, Coumarin, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hydroxycitronellal, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid

name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Soothing Hand Cream 50ml
description: It’s time to give your hands a little TLC with the Cicaplast Soothing Hand Cream, the protective and nourishing treatment for overworked, sore skin. Working fast to nourish dry hands and instantly soften rough skin this quickly-absorbing barrier cream has everything you need to tackle irritated skin. Cleverly formulated to provide friction and wash-resistant protection for parched hands by creating an invisible glove-like effect you won’t be rinsing this barrier away any time soon. Enriched with 30% glycerin to draw in moisture and niacinamide working to improve overall barrier strength and reduce inflammation you’ll never want to be without this again. With less irritated skin in as little as 4 weeks we’ll be taking one for on-the-go and at home, please!
how_to_use: Use as often as needed.

name: St. Tropez Self Tan Purity Face Mist 80ml
description: A faux glow innovation, this Self Tan Purity Bronzing Water Face Mist allows you to develop a natural glow without detection or having to rinse it off. Completely transparent, this tropical-scented face mist can be sprayed under or over make up to allow you to build a glorious glowing effect without any noticeable guide colour. Use in combination with the {Self Tan Purity Bronzing Water Gel} or {Self Tan Purity Bronzing Water Mousse} for a completely undetectable fake tan application that builds to a sun-kissed tan.

name: Sun Bum Original Glow Lotion SPF 30+ 59ml
description: Perfect for daily use, the Original Glow SPF 30 Sunscreen Face Lotion is an everyday must-have and holiday staple - protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays as you take a dip in the sea and enjoy 80 minutes of water resistant defence. To simply call the Original Glow SPF 30 Sunscreen Face Lotion a sunscreen would be an understatement. Ticking the boxes of UVA and UVB protection, this sun saviour goes one step further as it infuses kakadu plum (which is packed with vitamin C) to bestow a healthy, dewy glow and fight off free radicals. Made with all skin tones in mind, look no further than this skin staple for a hydrated, protected and glowing complexion.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Apply our Our Glow SPF 30 Face Lotion liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply: After 80 minutes of swimming or sweating. Immediately after towel drying. At least every 2 hours. Looking for additional face protection? Don't forget your lips!

name: L'Occitane Shea Butter Intense Hand Balm 150ml
description: If there's one thing our hands can't do without, it's the Shea Butter Intnse Hand Balm that's carefully crafted to go the extra, moisture-locking mile when it comes to our delicate digits. L'Occitane's ultra-softening blend is supercharged with 25% shea butter to tend to dry and rough palms. This intensely rich formula melts into your skin, forming a protective layer and repairing and replenishing fragile hands. What's more — a dose of soothing allantoin relieves hands of inflammation to restore a feeling of comfort.
how_to_use: For daily use: warm a small amount of balm between the hands, then gently massage into the back of the hands, nails and cuticles. As an intensive mask: apply a thick layer to the hands and leave on for 10 minutes to intensely nourish the skin, then massage in any excess (twice a week).

name: Lanolips 101 Ointment Multi-Balm - Peach 10g
description: A delicious reinvention of {The Original 101 Ointment}, Lanolips 101 Ointment Fruities are available in four ‘flavours’, each boasting its own good-to-skin benefits. There’s ‘Green Apple’, a vitamin and antioxidant-rich formula that naturally deflects harmful environmental elements and pollutants, ‘Strawberry’, which helps to slough away dead skin cells and reveal healthy, new skin thanks to the key addition of alpha-hydroxy acids; ‘Peach’, which helps to revive skin with its combination of vitamins and polyunsaturated fatty acids, ‘Coconutter’, which is boosted with vitamin E and is rich in antioxidants to make it ultra-hydrating and, finally, 'Watermelon', which is boosted with vitamin E and watermelon fruit extract to intensely hydrate. Each one is formulated with Ultra Medical Grade lanolin, which resembles and mimics your own skin oils to restore moisture unlike anything else and holds 200% of its weight in moisture. Vegetarian, baby-friendly and free from any nasties, this is basically a no brainer!
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between fingers or apply directly onto the lips and skin. Use generously and keep below 25°c.

name: NUXE Tanning Sun Oil High Protection SPF50 face and body 150 ml
description: Designed for face and body, this fast-absorbing product delivers low protection to enhance your natural tan, while leaving your skin with the most beautiful satin finish. Formulated with Nuxe's patented filtering complex - this SPF50 contains three sunscreens and two esters, which have been rigorously selected for their proven effectiveness on all UV rays (think: short UVB + UVA + long UVA.) A botanical blend of rice and rosemary extracts is also used to offer cellular protection and ensure your skin maintains a more youthful-looking appearance. This clean formula has been tested on algae and corals to ensure its non-toxic for marine life, and has a non-greasy texture that absorbs instantly and leaves a satin finish that enhances your tan. As for the scent? Nuxe has bottled the dreamy spirit of summer with tantalising notes of sweet orange, tiare flower and vanilla.
how_to_use: Apply product generously before sun exposure. Spray the product into your hands before applying to your face, avoiding the eye area. On the body, you can spray it directly before spreading it carefully. Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or towel-drying your skin. Note: Applying an insufficient amount of product will significantly reduce the level of sun protection. Excessive exposure to the sun is dangerous and sun care products do not provide 100% protection. Avoid exposure to the sun in the middle of the day.

name: Versed Mood Lighting Luminizing Glow Drops Sheer Golden
description: Dousing you with a healthy glow come rain or shine, the Mood Lighting Luminizing Glow Drops bestow deliciously luminous skin while nourishing your precious complexion with skin-boosting ingredients. With the consistency of a serum but the transformative powers of make up, this lightweight elixir features superfine light-reflecting pigments to enhance skin’s natural radiance, effortlessly casting a no make up-make up glow while evening skin tone. With polyglutamic acid — a skin-strengthening, powerful peptide — the formula plumps skin and helps it to retain moisture alongside antioxidant-rich blackberry extract, which also fortifies the skin barrier. Whether you choose ‘Sheer Golden’ or 'Sheer Bronzed’ (each shade suits a swathe of skin tones and can be worn alone or even mixed), try wearing it instead of make up or mixed with your foundation for a skin-smoothing, soft focus glow.
how_to_use: How: Smooth 2-3 Luminizing Glow Drops into dry skin or mix 1-2 drops into your moisturizer or face makeup. Where: Entire face — or anywhere you want to glow. When: As the last step in your skincare routine after moisturizer and/or SPF. Or, if mixing, with your moisturizer or foundation. Good To Know: For an extra dewy glow, mix the Luminizing Glow Drops with Sunday Morning or your favourite face oil. Use within nine months once opened, or keep it on your vanity unopened for up to two years.

name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Syndet Ap+ Wash Cream 400ml
description: Clear some space on your shower shelf for this niacinamide-infused Lipikar Syndet AP(+) Shower Gel that’s designed to not only cleanse your skin, but add a splash of soothing comfort for dry and itchy textures. Cue: supple, baby-smooth skin in an instant. Enriched by shea butter and glycerin, this skin-softening gel-cream formula gently and effectively protects your delicate skin barrier from further drying and locks in up to 24 hours of hydration. Powered by a unique minimalist hypoallergenic formula that makes this shower gel perfect for all skin types, feel your itchy and irritated skin exhale with reassurance that its dryness is a thing of the past.

name: Drunk Elephant Sugared Koffie Almond Milk Scrub
description: A must-add addition to your showertime routine, Drunk Elephant's Sugared Koffie Almond Milk Body Scrub unites a blend of moisturising plant oils to nourish skin, while roasted and powdered coffee beans and brown sugar crystals exfoliate. Sugared Koffie Almond Milk Body Scrub gently sweeps away dead skin cells and buffs dry spots as it delivers moisture - all without disrupting your skin barrier or sensitising. Formulated with a blend of skin-nourishing almond milk and moisturising, antioxidant-rich coffee seed, passionfruit, and Marula oils, Sugared Koffie Almond Milk Body Scrub rinses easily while keeping everything below the neck soft, flake-free, and balanced. This skin-softening and glow-giving formula smells exactly like it sounds, which is all due to the blend of almond milk, coffee bean extract, and coffee seed oil that it contains. It's sweet and rich, but it doesn't contain fragrance or essential oils.

name: Oskia Nutri-Bronze Adaptive Sheer Tinted Serum
description: Bridging the gap between a bronzing tint and a youth-prolonging serum, the Nutri-Bronze Adaptive Sheer Tinted Serum infuses your skin with advanced actives and essential nutrients to grant featherweight hydration. Like a sun-soaked mini break on tap, the Nutri-Bronze Adaptive Sheer Tinted Serum is infused with Adaptive Tone technology – brimming with mineral pigments chosen to complement the four different types of melanin found in all skin tones. Powered by bakuchiol (think of it as retinol's natural, non-identical twin), it helps to firm and smooth the look of lines by enhancing elasticity and stimulating collagen production. A blend of niacinamide and hyaluronic acid helps to nourish and impart lasting hydration, while vitamin E provides free radical protection and prebiotic oligosaccharide bolsters the skin's defence barrier. What's more, milk peptides work to lift and tone your complexion by boosting collagen levels. We're beyond obsessed...
how_to_use: Apply after cleansing or on top of your usual moisturiser or SPF. This multi-use skincare-makeup hybrid can be used to illuminate as a bronzer or applied all over face and décolletage. Wash off at night as you would with all makeup.

name: Aesop Reverence Exfoliating Duet
description: Uniting two full size cult classics, this Reverence Duet boasts a £10 saving(!) and is your ticket to an über-chic toiletries set that will look and smell incredible - go on, treat yourself or a loved one! Aesop’s Reverence Hand Wash is exquisite, from the ingredients down to the chic brown bottle. Use regularly after Reverence Hand Wash to soften rough skin, nails and cuticles – or slather over dry feet before bed to banish cracked heels and callouses.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Sun Protection SPF30+ Milk 250ml
description: If prickly heat and sun intolerance are ruining your summer fun, we would like to introduce you to your perfect match, the Anthelios Sun Protection SPF 30+ Milk…dry and sensitive skin listen up, this one’s for you. The award-winning no-nonsense brand La Roche-Posay has the water-resistant and broad spectrum SPF to keep you hydrated and protected while soothing reactivity in allergy-prone skin. Using a patented filtering system known as ‘Mexoplex’ combined with ‘Thermal Spring Water’ for the ultimate antioxidant protection, you’ll soon see what all the fuss is about, the results speak for themselves!

name: Elemis Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30
description: Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 is one of the products that made Elemis' name when still a baby brand. With no advertising at all this quickly became a sell-out cult worldwide just through words of mouth, the 'Old Girl's' network went into overdrive because the results are so good. Since its launch in 2003, Pro-Collagen Marine Cream has been globally recognised for its gel-cream texture, skin-loving formula and clinically proven results. The addition of SPF 30 has taken this bestselling anti-ageing day cream to a whole new level by delivering the sun protection you need, the wrinkle-smoothing results you want in a texture you'll love. This super moisturising, yet ultra-light gel cream quenches thirsty skin and increases hydration by up to 253% in 1 hour. Formulated with powerful marine and plant actives including padina pavonica, chlorella and ginkgo biloba, the advanced formula is clinically proven to reduce the look of look of fine lines and wrinkles in 2 weeks. It also helps to improve the look of firmness and elasticity for skin that looks smooth and rejuvenated.

name: OUAI Body Cleanser 300ml

Infused jojoba seed oil to soothe and hydrate, along with a dash of ultra-moisturising rose hip oil to soften. Featuring an all-new captivating ‘Dean Street’ scent, lather up and bathe in the fresh, zesty notes of citrus fruits, apricot, rose, violet, amber, linden blossom and musk. Caring for all skin types – even the most sensitive – this decadent gel cleanser nourishes as it cleanses, leaving behind smooth skin and a delicately enticing scent. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.

name: DeoDoc Intimate Deospray
description: Just like an underarm deodorant, this Intimate Deospray can be used after you shower to keep you feeling fresh all day. Formulated with naturally moisture-absorbing cornstarch, this gentle, pH-balanced, formula is suitable for daily use. To keep you fresh whenever you need it, just a few spritz of this clever product effectively absorbs moisture from sweat or humidity — preventing potential odour in the process. It’s also paraben-free, gynaecologically and dermatologically-tested., and it can be used without the risk of irritation on both shaven and unshaven skin. Choose from four scent options: 'Fragrance Free', ‘Violet Cotton’, ‘Jasmine Pear’ or ‘Fresh Coconut’.

name: Caudalie Vinosun Tan Prolonging After-Sun Lotion 200ml
description: Eager to keep your sun-kissed glow? Look no further than the Tan Prolonging After-Sun Lotion that applies like a dream and as the name implies, ensures a long-lasting tan. This non-sticky, velvety-smooth formula promises to brighten your bronze through activation of the natural tanning process within the skin, leading to its longevity way after the sun has set.

name: Bondi Sands Technocolor 1 Hour Express Self Tanning Foam - Caramel 200ml
description: Discover self-tan tailored to your skin tone with Bondi Sands Technocolour 1 Hour Express Self Tanning Foam. Infused with unique jewel-inspired colour guides — specially designed to counteract tell-tale orange tones — simply sweep on for a believable bronze in just 60 minutes. Carefully curated through cutting-edge research and laser skin analysis technology, Technocolour shades are infused with colourful undertones from green to purple. It might sound a little odd (and intimidating!), but this colour cleverness ensures a tan that’s perfectly tailored to your skin tone. And, to make sure your tan goes on evenly and just where you want it, this hi-tech formula also includes electrolyte hydration and a silky, spreadable foam texture.

name: Caudalie Vinosculpt Lift and Firm Body Cream 250ml
description: Whipping up a skin-smoothing veil of moisture, Caudalie’s Vinosculp Lift & Firm Body Cream is enriched with antioxidant-rich, natural ingredients to help deliver a soft and supple finish. Designed to firm and tone four key areas of your body – from arms and chest to stomach and bum – this creamy formula sinks in effortlessly for a weightless, never sticky finish. Rich in omega 6 and vitamin E, grapeseed oil has antioxidant properties to nourish and protect your skin, while grapeseed polyphenol shield against oxidation and preserve natural levels of hyaluronic acid. Flavonoid-rich iris extract is perfect for firming and toning and shea butter infuses lasting hydration for ultra-soft skin.
how_to_use: Apply morning and evening to clean and dry skin and massage into the arms, chest, stomach and buttocks using circular movements until absorbed.

name: BYREDO Suede Hand Wash
description: If you're obsessed with BYREDO's utterly iconic perfumes and want to delicately scent your hardworking hands while simultaneously cleansing and caring for skin, you need to discover the brand's decadent range of hand care, beginning with the Suede Hand Wash. Housed in the brand's instantly recognisable (and incredibly lust-have) chic and simple – yet quintessentially luxe – monochrome packaging, BYREDO's Suede Hand Wash enables you to upgrade your scenting experience while leaving skin feeling nourished (never stripped!) and subtly perfumed throughout the day. Combining pleasure with function, prepare to fall for the scent's spellbinding blend of fresh bergamot and lily of the valley alongside crisp amber and velvet plum.
how_to_use: You know the drill: Wet hands. Lather up (sing ‘Happy Birthday’ two times). Rinse away for clean, soft hands that smell divine.

name: Bondi Sands Self Tanning Foam 200ml - Light/Medium
description: Experience a sun-kissed Australian tan every time with Bondi Sands Self Tanning Foam. Perfect for those with light to medium complexions – or first time tanners! – this versatile self tanner can be left on for a minimum of one hour, all the way up to six hours to help you customise your perfect faux glow. A Bondi Sands cult classic, the brand's Self Tanning Foam is a must-have for new and veteran tanners alike. Thanks to the customisable formula, you can leave this natural-looking formula on skin from one to six hours to achieve your perfect finish. Enriched with aloe vera and laced with a sumptuous coconut aroma, this lightweight self-tanning foam will leave your skin glowing like you've spent the day (or week!) on Bondi Beach itself.
how_to_use: Use the Bondi Sands Exfoliation Mitt to ensure your skin is clean and free from any moisturisers. Pump foam directly onto your Application Mitt before using long, sweeping motions to smooth over legs, arms and body. Use remaining tan for face, elbows, and knees. Skin may be washed after one hour. For a longer lasting, darker tan leave for up to 6 hours before showering with warm water. Gently pat skin dry. For the deepest tan re-apply Bondi Sands Self-Tanning Foam 30 minutes after initial application.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Dihydroxyacetone, Propylene Glycol, Trideceth-9, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Polysorbate 20, Peg-5 Ethylhexanoate, Glycerin, Ethoxydiglycol, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum (Fragrance), Peg-12 Dimethicone, Ci 14700 (Fd&C Red No. 4), Ci 19140 (Fd&C Yellow No. 5), Tocopheryl Acetate, Disodium Edta, Benzyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Ci 42090 (Fd&C Blue No. 1).

name: Le Labo Hand Pomade
description: Starring sweet almond, shea and peony root extract to deeply replenish, repair and condition, Le Labos incredibly rich (but not greasy) Pomade softens even the gnarliest palms (and looks good on your desk or your nightstand). With two beautiful perfumes to choose from Basil, a fresh verdant scent with a hint of verbena to lend a crisp, citrus-y edge or Hinoki, which conjures the mystical warmth and hypnotic allure of the resinous wood that suffuses the temples of Japans Mount Koya we recommend one for your handbag, your drawer and your glovebox.
how_to_use: Massage into dry, scaly hands when they need TLC.

name: Spotlight Oral Care Sonic Replacement Heads
description: The ultimate investment into the health of your smile, the {Sonic Toothbrush} is professionally designed with both efficacy and comfort in mind, working to counter plaque and discolouration for an uber-clean look and feel. Nothing without its brush head, keep your brushing routine on its A-game with these three Sonic Replacement Heads. The oral health geniuses behind Spotlight Oral Care advise that you replace your brush head every three months, and if you've just realised how long overdue you are to do that then join the club... Equal parts gentle and effective in maintaining and promoting oral health, the efficient toothbrush employs high-frequency brush movements to ensure that both toothpaste and oxygen are delivered to hard-to-reach nooks and crannies; that's where the brush heads come in! Replace them regularly so that the firm but gentle bristles can get to work effectively cleaning your teeth.
how_to_use: This replacement pack contains: 3 x Spotlight Sonic Brush Replacement Heads

name: Caudalie Eau des Vignes Shower Gel 200ml
description: Elevate your bathing rituals with Caudalie’s indulgent Eau des Vignes Shower Gel. Suitable for all skin types, this soap-free wash is made from a 100% plant-based formula that’s as effective as it is gentle on your skin. The luxurious shower gel is enriched with soothing aloe vera to comfort and moisturise your limbs as you massage the silky gel over your skin. The best bit? It boasts a delectable scent that will make you wish you never had to rinse off the suds; notes of bergamot, white musk and iris create an intriguingly zingy aroma.
how_to_use: Lather onto damp skin. Rinses off easily and leaves a delicate scent on your skin. Ideal for anyone wishing to turn showering into a moment of well-being with this delicately scented shower nectar.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Decyl Glucoside*, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate*, Glycerin*, Parfum (Fragrance), Sucrose Cocoate*, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Propanediol*, Sodium Glutamate, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Coconut Acid*, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Citric Acid*, Limonene, Linalool, Coumarin, Geraniol (205/003).

name: The Nue Co. Magnesium Ease 60ml
description: Relieve muscle tension and feel your stress melt away with The Nue Co.’s sublime Magnesium Ease, a lavender and arnica-infused magnesium body spray. Alkalising the body, magnesium helps to restore the body’s natural pH balance, reducing lactic acid, which is partly responsible for Delayed Onset Muscle Soreness (aka, post-exercise pain!) A necessary electrolyte for proper hydration, magnesium also helps to hydrate the body, minimising tightness and cramping. Used medicinally for centuries, arnica oil is great for treating the pain and swelling associated with bruises, aches, pains and sprains, while lavender oil imparts a blissful, tension-relieving scent. Three sprays will deliver 40 mg of magnesium absorbed through the skin, best sprayed directly onto areas of tension such as wrists, soles of feet, backs of knees of for general relaxation. Great at your desk, before bed, or when you’re stuck on a plane.
how_to_use: Apply 1-3 sprays to dry skin and massage in
ingredient: Water, Magnesium Chloride, Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate/Sebacate*, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate/Caprate*, Lavender Oil, Arnica Oil, Dehydroacetic acid, Benzyl alcohol * Sound scary, but they're actually naturally derived solubilisers which help the oils blend with the water

name: Alpha-H Daily Essential Moisturiser SPF50+ 50ml
description: Alpha-H's Daily Essential Moisturiser SPF 50+ with Vitamin E provides waterproof, broad-spectrum sun damage protection at SPF 50+, without feeling heavy or looking chalky on your skin. Suitable for all skin types, even combination and oily, this formula strikes the perfect balance between long-lasting hydration and a non-greasy, barely-there texture - making it the perfect base for make up! A brilliant daily solution to seriously protecting your skin, it's available in a full (50ml) and travel size (30ml), so you need never be without!
how_to_use: Apply Daily Essential Moisturiser SPF 50+ every morning to clean skin (on top of your preferred serum if your skin is excessively dry). Allow a few minutes to absorb before applying make-up.

name: MALIN + GOETZ Rum Body Lotion
description: First thing’s first: MALIN + GOETZ’ Rum Body Lotion smells is a must-have for the fragrance alone – and that’s before considering the lightweight hydrators and nourishing fatty acids. Sure to knock you head over heels, the lotion is enriched with the brand’s cult-favourite Dark Rum scent which lends its deep and sensual aromatic appeal without feeling to heavy or overpowering. Intensely moisturising yet simultaneously lightweight in texture, it’s crammed with skin-essential fatty acids, provitamin b5 and grapeseed oil to grant a long-lasting moisture boost and leave your body soft and supple.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount of lotion to body.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Isopropyl Palmitate, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Pentylene Glycol, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil Unsaponifiables, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Castoryl Maleate, Panthenol, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium Edta, Tocopheryl Acetate, Bisabolol, Citric Acid, Farnesol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Calcium Pantothenate, Sodium Pca, Sodium Lactate, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Pca, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Phenylalanine, Histidine, Limonene, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool.

name: Embryolisse Lait-Crème Fluid (500ml)
description: A lighter version of Embryolisse’s best-loved Lait-Crème Concentré, this easily absorbed lotion contains all the brand’s signature nourishing and hydrating ingredients in a silky, featherweight formula. Brilliant for face and body, the lightweight liquid can be used to hydrate, prime and gently melt make up, which is why this is a must-have multi-tasker (and firm fixture of French women’s bathroom cabinets). Suitable for even sensitive skin (it can be used to soothe sunburn, after shaving and for baby care), the one-size-fits-all lotion will leave your skin soft and supple however it’s used. Nous l’aimons! It's available in both 75ml and 500ml sizes.

name: Patchology PoshPeel PediCure - 1 Treatment
description: With a background in medical patch technology, patchology’s intelligent masks and hydrogels deliver potent ingredients straight to your cells without any going to waste so you can get maximum effects with minimal effort. Perfect for a pamper session, patchology’s PoshPeel PediCure features a potent AHA and BHA botanical blend of glycolic, salicylic, lactic and citric acids as well as botanical extracts, to not only brighten but exfoliate rough patches and dissolve dead skin cells to slowly reveal incredibly soft and happy feet. Simply pour this potent cocktail of ingredients into the sock and sit back for 60 – 90 minutes and let patchology’s Activating Essence do all the hard work. Over three to seven days your feet will progressively peel to reveal baby-soft feet, free of rough patches and calluses.
how_to_use: Step 1: Pour the desired amount of Activating Essence into one of the Foot Masque Socks and evenly distribute along the inside of the cotton lining. Step 2: Place your foot inside the sock and seal with attached closure. Repeat for the other foot. Step 3: Wear for 60 minutes (or up to 90 minutes if greater exfoliation is desired). Step 4: Remove socks. Thoroughly rinse and dry feet. Progressive peeling action will take place over 3-7 days.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Alcohol Denat., Alcohol, Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Salicylic Acid, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Butylene Glycol, Panthenol, Allantoin, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Disodium EDTA, Fragrance (Parfum).

name: Molton Brown Coastal Cypress and Sea Fennel Hand Sanitiser Gel
description: In a time where sanitising hands comes second only to breathing, Molton Brown’s Hand Sanitiser Gel is a lifesaver – turning something mundane and necessary into a decadent self-care ritual that’s sure to put a smile on your face with every use. Vegan, non-drying and bursting with fragrance while killing 99.9% of bacteria and viruses, this pocket-sized gel keeps skin clean, refreshed and nurtured. With three sumptuous scents on offer, use your hygiene practices as an excuse to enjoy Molton Brown’s famous fragrance of ‘Rhubarb & Rose’ (a sweet, fruity blend with a fresh twist, thanks to the likes of rhubarb, grapefruit, lemongrass, spearmint and vanilla).
how_to_use: Simply apply 3ml to hands and massage in for 60 seconds.
