Coastal Cypress & Sea Fennel: Alcohol Denat.,Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Fragrance/Parfum, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Cannabis Sativa Seed Extract, Nymphaea Alba Root Extract, Rosa Canina (Rose) Extract, Symphytum Officinale Root Extract, Laminaria Ochroleuca Extract, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Eugenol, Blue 1/Ci 42090, Red 33/Ci 17200, Yellow 5/Ci 19140.

name: Kitsch Eco-Friendly Exfoliating Glove (Various Options)
description: A crucial first step towards cleaner healthier skin, this exfoliating glove is a shower staple to keep close by to gently rub away dead skin cells. Not just a pretty face — although the leopard print is enough to hook us — this mitt partners up perfectly with your favourite body wash to create a foamy lather, so you don’t have to worry about snagging and dragging your delicate skin. A chic reminder that healthier brighter skin starts layers deep, massaging this glove all over improves circulation, stimulates skin cell renewal and smoothes out dry, rough skin. Not only will you feel like you’ve taken a speedy trip to the spa but your skin will be perfectly primed to absorb the goodness of your follow-up body care products. Made with plant-based rayon material, it also makes the snazziest eco-friendly addition to your shower line-up.
how_to_use: Add soap to the mitt and water to create a lather. Then massage the mitt onto your skin in a circular motion.
ingredient: 75.6% rayon + 20% polyester + 4.4% rubber.

name: L'Occitane Almond Milk Concentrate 200ml
description: Harnessing the skin-tightening powers of almonds, L'Occitane's famous best-selling body cream has arrived at Cult Beauty to care for your limbs in all its beautifully-scented glory. Hydrating, firming and vegan friendly, the Almond Milk Concentrate holds the power to infuse your skin with a cacophony of skin-loving essentials. Enriched with a targeted complex - made up of walnut seed and almond extract - this quick-to-absorb body cream works hard to protect your skin's elasticity while boosting cellular renewal. Caring for your limbs and set to take your body confidence through the roof, the Almond Milk Concentrate grants a satin-like sheen after a little one-on-one time with its nourishing formula. It gets even better, too, once you've come to the end of your cherished tub, you can top it up with the Eco-Refill!
how_to_use: After cleansing, warm a small amount of the product in your hands. Massage into the skin with slow, circular movements, always working from your ankles up.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Tapioca Starch, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Protein, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Seed Extract, Juglans Regia (Walnut) Seed Extract, Methylpropanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Carbomer, Sodium Polyacrylate, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Mannitol, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Citrate, Methylsilanol Mannuronate, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Glyceryl Caprylate, Benzoic Acid, Hydrogenated Lecithin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Metabisulfite, Disodium Edta, Sorbic Acid, Citric Acid, Parfum/Fragrance, Limonene, Linalool, Coumarin.

name: AMELIORATE Intensive Foot Therapy 75ml
description: Designed for very dry, rough feet and hard thickened skin, in independent tests 94% agreed that the product improved the texture of their feet and 100% agreed their feet felt moisturised! Infused with the brands LAH6 Skin Hydration Complex as well as a blend of Shea butter, glycerine and jojoba oil, this hard-working formula enhances skins elasticity while intensely moisturising while Farnesol deodorises. Clinically proven to moisture for up to 12 hours as well as dermatologically tested, you can rest assured this innovative formula will look after and keep your feet in tip top condition.
how_to_use: DIRECTIONS: Massage liberally into the feet and heels twice a day for 14 days. For best results apply at night, put on a pair of cotton socks and allow the treatment to work while you sleep. Reapply in the morning. Thereafter apply as needed. For surface cracks only, do not apply to broken skin. WARNINGS: If irritation occurs discontinue use immediately. Avoid contact with eyes. If the product gets into eyes, rinse well with warm water immediately. SUNBURN ALERT: This product contains an Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) that may increase your skins sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

name: MALIN + GOETZ Bergamot Hand + Body Wash
description: Perfect for storing in your shower or on your boujee sink, MALIN + GOETZ's Bergamot Hand + Body Wash is a 2-in-1 hand wash and full-body cleanser that packs a punch with it's gorgeous zesty and uplifting bergamot scent. Combining balancing glycerin with the brand's amino acid technology, this simple yet hardworking formula thoroughly cleanses and hydrates without drying or stripping skin. What's more, the bottles are truly iconic, instantly transforming any bathroom into the set of an 'at home with Vogue' shoot. Absolutely exquisite in every respect!
how_to_use: As a daily hand+body wash: Apply cleanser to wet skin, gently work into a lather and rinse clean. As a foaming bath: Add three pumps to running water.

name: Lanolips Coconutter Hand Cream Intense 50ml
description: Are you yet to find a good-to-skin hand cream that nourishes sensitive, cracked and dry hands without stinging or leaving a greasy residue? Well, let us introduce you to Lanolips’ multi-award-winning Coconutter Hand Cream Intense, a coconut oil-infused cocoon that will transport you to your favourite summer destination with its (almost tasty!) tropical natural scent. Boasting a triple lanolin formula (lanolin is this brand’s secret ingredient that mimics your own skin oils to restore moisture unlike anything else) combined with rich shea, cocoa, coconut oil and vitamin E, this is a deeply nourishing and hydrating cream that leaves a non-sticky veil to continually moisturise skin throughout the day. It’s also available in {Rose Hand Cream Intense} and {Lemon Hand Cream Intense} formulations, so you can choose your favourite from the scent selection – or collect them all.
how_to_use: Warm the cream between your hands, massage into nail beds, cuticles and skin. Allow the veil to absorb and settle. Use as often as required and especially after washing hands and before going to bed. Keep below 25c.

name: Spotlight Whitening Teeth Whitening Pen
description: A targeted treatment to minimise staining, Spotlight Oral Cares Pen for Whitening Teeth is ideal for dissolving residual traces of tea, coffee or red wine (among other things), so that you can indulge without compromise. With whitening hydrogen peroxide to actually brighten the stains rather than covering them up like many other whitening products this quick and convenient pen coats your teeth with a tiny amount of tooth-brightening gel. With a brush for targeted application (great for stubborn discolouration), this sets straight to work to fade yellowing, and leave your smile visibly brighter in under five minutes *ting*!
how_to_use: Twist base of pen twenty times or until gel has been sufficiently dispensed onto the brush. Using the brush, paint your teeth with the whitening agent. Leave in place for five minutes. After five minutes rinse gel away with water. Use daily to maintain whitening effects.
ingredient: Glycerin, Aqua, Phthalimidoperoxycaproic Acid, Hydrated Silica, Dicalcium Phosphate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Menthol, Hydrogen Peroxide.

name: Coco & Eve Sunny Honey Bronzing Face Drops 30ml (Various Shades)
description: Introducing Coco & Eve’s Sunny Honey Bronzing Face Drops — perfect for achieving a gradual, natural and glowing tan that's unique to you, this moisturising and plumping formula is a must-try. Get a gradual, natural, glowing tan whilst moisturising and plumping skin with this ultra-hydrating face tanner that can be as light or as concentrated as you wish thanks to the clever dropper formula. This unique formula unities Bali-based botanicals (think: hydrating and skin-repairing banana, smoothing and firming coconut water, glow-giving dragon fruit and free radical-fighting fig) with hyaluronic acid to increase skin elasticity, suppleness, and improve the appearance of fine lines. It's also non-drying and alcohol-free too meaning your skin will be soft, supple, and sun-kissed for days. Available in two customisable shades: Medium for a subtle glow with 14% natural DHA, or Dark with 18% natural DHA and 2% erythrulose booster for a richer tan and faster results.
how_to_use: Shake before use, unscrew cap, turn bottle upside down and squeeze the button at the bottom to dispense 2-3 drops into your moisturizer. Mix well, then apply evenly to face, neck and décolletage. Wash hands thoroughly after use. Always mix with a moisturizer.

name: Hello Sunday The Everyday One - Face Moisturiser SPF 50
description: With the finish of a hydrating cream and the protection of a sunscreen, Hello Sunday's The Everyday One - Face Moisturiser SPF 50 works hard to shield your skin from environmental aggressors – be it UVA/UVB rays, polluting particles or blue light! Bridging the gap between sun protection and skin care, this fragrance-free formula is crafted from hyaluronic acid (the beauty industry’s favourite hydrating ingredient), as well as a moisturising complex of panthenol, allantoin and aloe vera to thoroughly soothe, condition and quench your skin. As if that wasn't enough, it's infused with free radical-thwarting carnosine and a blend of antioxidant-rich ingredients such as vitamin C, algae and bisabolol to soothe and protect your skin. When it comes to the finish, the lightweight cream absorbs easily and leaves skin feeling super soft! Totally reformulated to prevent pesky pilling, this new and improved concoction is sure to play nice with your other skin care and make up heroes too.
how_to_use: Apply to clean, dry skin. Sunscreen best practice: apply 30 minutes before going outside and reapply every two hours as well immediately after swimming or sweating.

name: Kopari Beauty Tahitian Vanilla Ultra Restore Body Butter 230ml
description: That love/hate relationship you have with body butters ends here. This vegan body butter strikes the perfect balance between delivering rich, long-lasting moisture and a feathery-light formula that applies like a dream. Powered by coconut oil, this whipped formula is brimming with moisturising fatty acids and the skin-protecting vitamin E. Another tasty fruit makes an appearance in this impressive ingredients list: nutrient-rich mango butter — leaving skin super soft and supple via omega 6 and 9, fatty acids and vitamins A, C and E. As if that wasn’t enough, acne-prone skin types will be pleased to know that the prickly pear flower extract is packed with more antioxidants, amino acids, and vitamin K, which is known to replenish skin. Your favourite hydrating hero, hyaluronic acid, also makes an appearance; vitamin B5 rounds off the formula with a dose of anti-inflammatory properties and the ability to retain moisture. All of that in a lighter-than-air texture that seamlessly blends into dry, cracked or creped skin. Ultra-hydrated skin that smells heavenly and sweet? We’ll take it.
how_to_use: Spread it all over your body for smooth, glowy hydration. Use daily to replenish dry skin. Founder’s Tip: use on damp, post-shower skin to lock in that hydration even more. How to recycle STEP 1: Separate components STEP 2: Rinse STEP 3: Refill, reuse, or recycle

name: Laura Mercier Ambre Vanille Exfoliating Body Wash 200ml
description: Renewing your all-over radiance with a nourishing, oil-rich blend, the Exfoliating Body Wash engulfs both your skin and senses with spa-like luxury. Buffing away dead skin cells with a non-drying feel, this hydrating formula seals in skin-softening benefits and keeps impurities out. Supercharged with castor seed oil, glycerin and sucrose (just to name a few heroes), this firming formula is like a sweet treat but for your skin. Infused with strawberry seeds to aim physical exfoliation, this scrub transforms into a nourishing lather that revitalises skin and boosts circulation. Whether you're an in-shower vocalist harmonising to your favourite song or the type to luxuriate in the bath with a candle, this sensorial scrub turns your bathroom into the ultimate sanctuary. What's more - choose from three delightful fragrances from 'Néroli du Sud' to 'Almond Coconut' to match your mood.
how_to_use: Dispense Exfoliating Body Wash onto your hand and massage into your skin working in circular motions to cleanse and exfoliate skin, surrounding yourself with beautiful lather. Remember to target the tough, dry areas such as elbows, knees, and feet to smooth skin and instantly hydrate.

name: NUXE Sun Face and Body Delicious Lotion SPF 30 (150ml)
description: Enveloping every inch of your skin with an uncompromising blend of three sunscreens, this non-greasy moisturising veil works on both face and body while imparting the most divine scent! Sun protection that you can trust, that also protects the marine environment? It has to be Nuxe. This luxurious and clean formula has been tested to ensure that it's non-toxic for marine life, while also contributing to your self-care ritual. Delivering a blend of rice extract, rosemary and vitamin E, this non-greasy cream fights off ageing free radicals with a supercharged dose of antioxidant protection while moisturising your skin to enhance your tan. Whether you're basking in the sun at home or taking a well-deserved break abroad, be sure to breathe in its delectable scent of sweet orange, tiare flower and vanilla. Think summer perfection and protection, bottled.
how_to_use: Before sun exposure, apply the product generously all over the face and body, avoiding the eye area. Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or towel-drying your skin. Note: Applying an insufficient amount of product will significantly reduce the level of sun protection. Excessive exposure to the sun is dangerous - sun care products do not provide 100% protection. Avoid exposure to the sun in the middle of the day.

name: Marvis Classic Strong Mint Toothpaste 85ml
description: Put aside your drugstore toothpaste – Marvis’ has all the benefits of your regular paste but with a range of unusual yet pleasurable flavours guaranteed to inject some excitement into your daily ablutions. As you’d expect from any toothpaste worth its salt (or should we say, xylitol?), it cleanses, freshens breath, removes plaque and tartar, and keeps gums in tip-top shape. Unlike your bog-standard formula however, there are flavours such as ‘Cinnamon Mint’, ‘Ginger Mint’, ‘Jasmine Mint’ and ‘Liquorice Mint’, alongside classics like ‘Whitening Mint’, ‘Aquatic Mint’ and ‘Classic Strong Mint’ all encased in a stylish, contemporary silver tube that will look enviably modern on your bathroom shelf. Marvi-lous, or what?!

name: ZitSticka Fizz Fountain Multi-exfoliant Body Scrub 180ml
description: Extend the same level of care to your limbs as you do to your face with ZITSTICKA’s FIZZ FOUNTAIN Multi-Exfoliant Body Scrub: an exfoliating polish that shifts dead skin cells, unclogs pores and leaves skin feeling silky soft. Powered by a cocktail of physical and chemicals exfoliants, the supercharged scrub refines and smooths as it combats pesky body blemishes. Salicylic acid targets deep within your pores, clearing breakout-inducing dirt, while lactic and glycolic acid dissolve dulling dead skin cells. Pumice grains work on the surface to physically (yet gently!) refine the texture of your skin. The final flourish is an infusion of niacinamide that works to counteract redness and irritation, leaving you ready and raring to show some skin.
how_to_use: Using a circular motion, massage FIZZ FOUNTAIN™ onto your body, concentrating on rough or textured areas. Rinse when done. Use 1-3 times per week. Avoid open cuts or wounds. For best results, use in tandem with SILKSHAKE™ body wash.

name: Marvis Blossom Tea Toothpaste 75ml
description: How do you like your tea? Some like theirs sweet, some like theirs hot and others like theirs green but have you thought about having yours… toothpaste’d? It’s time to open wide and embark on a whole new experience filled with excitement that your tastebuds will thank you (and us) for later. Marvis’ Tea Collection comes in 3 deliciously refreshing flavours that go above and beyond your regular drugstore toothpaste to leave you wanting more. Yes, of course it cleanses, freshens breath, removes plaque and tartar, and keeps gums in tip-top shape as you would expect from any toothpaste, but it doesn’t just stop there… Choose from ‘Blossom’, ‘Earl Grey’ and ‘Matcha’ tea flavours to kick-start your day with a delightful blend of Black Tea and flowers which create a fusion of fresh cheerfulness each time you brush your teeth! Housed in their luxuriously distinctive silver tube, elevate an otherwise menial task into a Marvi-lous one…
how_to_use: Squeeze a pea-size amount onto your toothbrush, add water, brush and rinse.
ingredient: Glycerin, Calcium Carbonate, Aqua (Water/Eau), Silica, Aroma (Flavor), Cellulose Gum, Xylitol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Titanium Dioxide, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Eugenol, Limonene.

name: NUXE Rêve de Miel Body Scrub
description: Nourishing and exfoliating, there’s a reason this 2-in-1 scrub has become a beauty buff favourite — not least because it belongs to Nuxe’s Rêve de Miel collection (which means honey dream in English). From its delicious scent to silky-soft and smooth results, you’ll soon wonder how you ever lived without it. What makes it so deeply nourishing? A delicious cocktail of natural active ingredients, including honey, sugar crystals and crushed rice (as tempting as it is, don’t lick the jar clean). It’s also infused with precious botanical oils — think: sunflower, argan and borage — as well as shea butter to boost hydration and soothe any redness and irritation. And if you’re looking to turn your morning shower into a sensorial experience, the unique oil-to-balm texture has an evolutive quality that leaves the most comforting and protective balm on the skin. t’s time to wake up and smell the honey.
how_to_use: Once or twice a week, after washing, apply the scrub to damp skin, massage in circular movements and then finish by rinsing with clean water.

name: Le Labo Shower Gel
description: Take your Le Labo addiction one step further and master the art of scent layering by investing in a luxurious Shower Gel. Brimming with good-for-skin ingredients, such as vitamin E, olive leaf extract, aloe vera and flaxseed extract, these do as good as they smell. The formulas available in six beguiling scents that linger longingly on your skin, so all you need to do is pick from: AnOther 13 a hypnotising and scent-shifting scent that is unique to you and your pheromones; Bergamote 22 a zesty citrus scent with complex warming notes; Lys 41 an intoxicating white floral; Rose 31 a reinvention of the classic rose, Santal 33 a bewitching heady spiced leather or Thac Noir 29 an ode to black tea mingled with fresh, fruity notes of fig and bay. name: Loving Tan Deluxe Bronzing Mousse 120ml (Various Shades)
description: Made in Australia - safe to say, they know their glow - Loving Tan's Deluxe Bronzing Mousse is here to help you activate your seamless sun-kissed radiance and love your tan like never before. Made by tan lovers tor tan lovers, this professional-level formula provides you with an immediate colour that develops into a richer tan. All of their mousses call on high concentrations of active ingredients to deliver a darker tan in just one layer; their high-quality ingredients ensure you achieve a natural-looking glow no matter your skin tone. Simply choose the shade that suits you best - 'Medium', 'Dark' or 'Ultra Dark' - and wait for your glow to be realised. You won't be hanging around for long, their mousses dry in as little as 60 seconds!
how_to_use: Apply moisturiser liberally to any dry areas including your hands, feet, ankles, wrists, knees and elbows. Pump a small amount of mousse onto your Loving Tan Deluxe Applicator Mitt. Using circular motions, apply mousse directly to your body, blending as you go to ensure even coverage. Allow sixty seconds before dressing. Avoid perspiration or water for six hours while the tan develops. Finally, rinse off in shower after eight hours to reveal a gorgeous, natural tan. For best results apply to clean, dry and exfoliated skin.

name: Frank Body Clean Body Wash 360ml (Various Options)
description: Available in 'Unscented' and 'Sunday Brunch', the Clean Body Wash is frank body's carefully-formulated, soap-free designed to nourish and cleanse even the most sensitive of skin without any irritation (you can even use it 'down there' without causing any trouble!). Cleansing your skin of the daily build up of dirt and sweat, this gentle formula nourishes so you don't have to worry about that 'tight' feeling that comes when your skin has been stripped of its natural oils. Soft to the touch skin comes from a trio of ultra-hydrating ingredients: Kakadu plum, which is rich in glow-giving, protective vitamin C; pomegranate extract, an antioxidant that strengthens skin, and coffee seed extract, which is packed with essential fatty acids that lock in long-lasting moisture to your limbs.
how_to_use: Cleanse wet skin in the bath or shower and rinse away.

name: Aesop Reverence Aromatique Hand Balm 75ml
description: Aesop’s ultra-nourishing Reverence Hand Balm is blended with seven carefully selected ingredients, all renowned for their skin conditioning properties. Characterised by its warm, woody aroma (a blend of vetiver root, petitgrain and bergamot rind) this moisturising lotion is lightweight and quickly absorbed, to soothe and protect labour-wearied hands. Sweet almond and coconut oils deliver instant relief from dryness and cracking, while potassium lactate and lactic acid soften skin and provide prolonged hydration for skin that’s feeling forgotten. This makes a perfect gift for a gardener, together with Reverence Hand Wash. Now available in the original 500ml and a grab-and-go 75ml, you'll never need to be without this softening salve.

name: DeoDoc Intimate Calming Oil
description: Have you noticed that your vulva can feel particularly sensitive after working out, during menstruation or when wearing tight clothing? Deodoc have just the thing... Their Intimate Calming Oil can help to soothe irritated skin with its healing concoction of skin-calming, plant-based oils (there's chamomile, almond and shea butter in this miracle-worker!), while protecting the sensitive skin of the vulva from friction and chafing. The light oil penetrates the skin easily without leaving a greasy feeling. Just make sure you're always tuned-in to your body - if any irritation is persistent, be sure to have it checked out by a medical professional.
how_to_use: Apply a pea-sized amount to fingers and rub gently on affected areas. Use when necessary. Caution: For external use only, not for use inside the vaginal canal. Discontinue use if skin irritation persists. Avoid contact with eyes.

name: Bondi Sands Gradual Tanning Face Lotion 50ml
description: Seeing no sign of sun? Well, don't you worry. The Gradual Tanning Face Lotion brings the heat of the sun to you. Like Aussie sunshine in a bottle, this self-tanning hero builds up an au naturel tan that begs the question, “Where’d you go on holiday?!” Enriched with shea butter to keep your skin healthy and hydrated, this daily face lotion nourishes skin as it dispenses just the right amount of pigment to build a natural and gradual tan. Forget streaks and sloppy messes, this lightweight self-tanner has mastered the art of subtly and promises to bestow a radiant, sun-kissed complexion.
how_to_use: Step 1: For an even streak-free tan, ensure your face is clean and dry prior to application. Step 2: Massage Bondi Sands Gradual Tanning Face Lotion evenly over face and neck, avoiding eyes. Step 3: Use daily to ensure a golden tan throughout the year. Wash hands after use.

name: Tan-Luxe Express Mousse 200ml
description: Clean, clear and completely customisable. Meet Express Mousse, the latest innovation from experts in tan, TAN-LUXE. Using skincare-inspired ingredients and a luxurious whipped texture for speedy, even coverage, it delivers flawless bronzing in as little as 30 minutes. Forget tanning mousses that leave skin feeling dry and tight. Express Mousse is supercharged with brightening vitamin C plus hyaluronic acid and beta glucan to lend lasting hydration and create the perfect base for your tan. You're in control with customisable colour: leave on for 30 minutes for a sunkissed glow or three hours for a deeper bronze. Formulated without a guide colour for zero transfer (don't panic - the whipped formula makes even application a breeze) and no biscuit-y smell, Express Mousse is made for last minute tanning.
how_to_use: Moisturise any areas prone to dryness. Using a tanning mitt, apply the mousse in sweeping motions from head to toe. Wait at least 30 minutes before showering for a light sunkissed glow. Leave on for up to 3 hours for a deeper tan. Your tan will continue to develop over 4-6 hours. Wash hands thoroughly after use.

name: Dermalogica Dynamic Skin Recovery SPF50 50ml
description: Combat signs of skin ageing and keep dryness at bay with the Dynamic Skin Recovery SPF 50 Moisturiser — an emollient daily hydrator that improves the appearance of skin and keeps it perfectly nourished. No routine is complete without a daily SPF, and dry and dehydrated skin should look no further… this mid-weight moisturiser offers long-lasting hydration with broad-spectrum protection. A unique polypeptide improves the appearance of skin that shows signs of sun damage while polyphenol-rich antioxidant white tea provides protection against environmental stressors that contribute to premature signs of ageing. Blending smoothly into your complexion for a silky-soft and non-sticky finish, this is the sunscreen that you want to wear.
how_to_use: After cleansing and toning, apply a generous amount to face and neck, preferably 30 minutes prior to sun exposure.

name: COOLA Spray SPF50 177ml
description: Great for long days in the sun, COOLA’s quick and convenient Classic Sunscreen Spray SPF50 comes with two choices – 'Fragrance Free' or 'Guava Mango' – to cater to sensitive skin or evoke summer vibes while protecting you from the ageing effects of UV and aggressors. Flooding your skin with a buffet of nourishing nutrients – including the brand’s proprietary Plant Protection Complex – this featherlight, non-greasy formula’s quickly absorbed and is both sweat and water-resistant for up to 80 minutes. With 70+% certified organic ingredients and without any parabens, gluten or cruelty, this reef-safe screen is ‘Hawaii Reef Compliant’, vegan and is widely recyclable – meaning it’s great for your skin and your conscience!
how_to_use: Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, and at least every two hours. How to recycle COOLA's SPF Sprays: Step 1: Enjoy and use ALL of your SPF spray. Step 2: Once the spray is completely empty, take the product to your local recycling centre (COOLA do not recommend disassembling the spray).

(Sd Alcohol 40-B), Octocrylene, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Homosalate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Va/Butyl Maleate/Isobornyl Acrylate Copolymer, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Ethyl Ferulate, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil Guava Mango: Alcohol Denat. name: Evereden Baby Shampoo & Body Wash - Fragrance Free
description: Ever felt that tight, squeaky-clean feeling after using certain shower gels or body washes? Well, thanks to Everden you can expect a lot less of that, and a lot more gentle, hydrating cleansing for your whole family. Formulated for the sensitive skin of babies, children and adults alike, Evereden’s Baby Shampoo & Body Wash is a must-have in the bathrooms of anyone who has ever found traditional shower products to cause irritation. That’s because a clever combination of naturally-derived, organic sunflower seed oil, oat and coconut work together to not just cleanse your skin but also restore its pH balance (somewhere between 4.7-5.5). In turn, this helps to strengthen the skin’s moisture barrier, meaning less dryness and inflammation in the long run.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount to wet skin and hair and massage into a lather. Rinse off, dry skin and follow with Evereden’s Baby Moisturizing Lotion for lasting hydration.

name: Kopari Beauty Tahitian Vanilla Hydrating Body Milk 236ml
description: Transporting you to sunnier shores, Kopari Beauty’s Tahitian Vanilla Hydrating Body Milk has taken coconut oil and made it milky in this ultra-hydrating lotion. Quickly absorbed without a hint of residue left behind to tarnish your perfectly picked clothes, this body milk is packed with chamomile, shea butter and (of course) coconut oil in a featherlight formula to keep skin silky soft. Taking a Tahitian twist on the original… this hypoallergenic hydrator now offers a cloak of vanilla, gourmand, butter and cream to warm the senses while soothing and conditioning your skin. Our new summer body hero that comes in 100% recyclable packaging for holiday-ready skin all year-round.
how_to_use: After a steamy shower, apply Vanilla Hydrating Body Milk from head to toe to lock in moisture and protect your skin all day.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Oil Correct Suncream SPF50 50ml
description: Breakout-prone, sensitive and oily skin can rest easy knowing that La Roche-Posay has every base covered in the Anthelios Oil Correct Suncream SPF 50. Salicylic acid works hard to unclog and decongest problematic skin, so you don’t need to worry about SPF-induced pimples! Uneven skin tone and imperfections are taken care of thanks to niacinamide, our favourite skin-loving ingredient. Is excess oil production stressing you out? La Roche-Posay has infused zinc into this broad-spectrum protector to help calm inflammation and regulate unruly sebum. Giving you up to 12 hours of mattifying wear (but don’t forget to reapply frequently) this lightweight formula protects skin from oxidative stress and works hard to visibly reduce pore size, even out imperfections and protect sensitive and problematic skin from harmful UV and infrared rays, there’s not much that this can’t do!
how_to_use: For daily use, apply on clean skin, at the end of your skin care routine. Avoid eye area. In case of contact with eyes, rinse them immediately and thoroughly.

name: de Mamiel Altitude Oil
Laura Mercier Ambre Vanille Bath and Body Oil 100ml
description: Enveloping your skin with a lightweight blend of deeply nourishing oils, a few drops of the multi-use Bath & Body Oil is all you need to revive your all-over radiance. Inviting spa-like indulgence into your bath-time routine, this antioxidant-powered oil glides over your limbs, seeping into your skin with a nourishing feel. Rich in baobab seed, jojoba seed and French plum seed oils, this moisture-locking cocktail delivers a surge of hydration that lasts up to 48 hours! Available in three luxuriating scents that are perfect for layering, this sensori-oil essential is sure to become a permanent fixture in your body care arsenal.
how_to_use: For Bath: Pour desired amount of oil onto the surface of water and gently swirl. For Body: Warm oil in your hands and massage over body. For best results, apply to damp skin. Follow with the Serum Body Cream for a complete beauty experience. Pour Aromatic Bath & Body Oil into a hot bath and discover the aromatherapy benefits of your favourite Laura Mercier scent.

name: Lancaster Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Oil 150ml
description: Love your Lancaster golden tan? What if you could prolong it for an endless summer sensation? Lancaster's Golden Tan Maximizer After Sun Oil is specially developed for those who want to prolong their beautiful holiday tan while soothing their sun-exposed skin. Helping you to cling on to your summer tan, Lancaster's innovative Tan Activator Complex intensifies melanin production for a golden, even and long-lasting tan. This sublimating after-sun oil contains soothing and hydrating complexes to help your skin's natural recovery process after sun exposure. It reduces the risk of peeling and leaves skin satiny-smooth. Enriched with six natural-origin oils, this luxurious beautifying oil instantly melts into your skin, leaving it supple and hydrated. Its shimmering texture reveals a glowing, golden tan and scents your skin with Lancaster's iconic fragrance, suitable for sensitive skin.
how_to_use: Shake before use. Apply generously to body after sun exposure and after your holidays.

name: Bondi Sands Self Tan Eraser 200ml
description: Whether you're tired or your faux glow or you're prepping for yet another flawless application, Bondi Sands Self Tan Eraser helps to effortlessly slough away stubborn tan so you never have to worry about that telltale tiger bread effect. Formulated with Bondi Sands revolutionary Self Tan Eraser technology, this faux glow eraser quickly gets to work effectively removing self tan in just five minutes – without excessive exfoliation! But it doesn't stop there, this unique cleansing formula also moisturises and leaves the skin silky smooth too. Best used on self tan that has been applied three or more days ago, you'll be astounded by the fast-acting results and wonder why you didn't invest in this trusty hero a long time ago.
how_to_use: For best results, apply Bondi Sands Self Tan Eraser to dry skin after at least 3 days of applying self tan. Pump foam applicator firmly and apply Bondi Sands Self Tan Eraser liberally to the skin. Leave the Self Tan Eraser on the skin for at least 5 minutes. Shower with warm water using a wet face cloth to wipe away the tan. For more stubborn areas or dry skin, use an exfoliating mitt to gently remove the tan.

name: Herlum Hand and Body Wash Sandalwood and Grapefruit 500ml
description: With a luxurious lather and a rich, nourishing formula, this Hand & Body Wash promises a true sensory journey as it gently cleanses skin of the day’s dirt, pollution and sweat. Made in England but featuring murumuru butter all the way from the Amazon, this sustainably-sourced wash leaves skin feeling soft, cleansed and with a gentle fragrance that lingers all day. There’s coconut-based soap and natural antibacterial extracts to refresh skin effectively, while murumuru butter, known for its lauric and oleic acid properties, maintains your skin’s moisture barrier and prevents that overly tight, stripped feeling. You’re certain to fall in love with the scent too: a rainforest-inspired aroma made from upcycled flowers, uniting woody and spicy notes of freshly sliced grapefruit and creamy sandalwood.
how_to_use: Dampen skin, lather up, cleanse and rinse. Best enjoyed when you mindfully massage into hands and deeply inhale the relaxing scent. After use, rinse the container before placing in the recycling bin.

name: Spotlight White Teeth Wash 500ml
description: Specially formulated to give you all the oral care benefits you need with added whitening power, Spotlight Oral Care's Mouthwash for Teeth Whitening is crying out to help lighten and brighten that stained teeth of yours. Brimming with active seaweed particles and hydrogen peroxide, Spotlight Oral Care's White Teeth Wash is your one-way ticket to dazzling white teeth. The impeccable ingredient's list rejuvenates the oral tissues while ensuring teeth whitening effects with continued use. But it doesn't stop there, the intelligent packing boasts a self-filling lid that ensures you only fill the correct amount of mouthwash to be used twice daily as part of your oral care regime. We're impressed!

name: Philip Kingsley No Scent No Colour Gentle Shampoo 250ml
description: Sweeping away daily dirt and impurities to reveal smooth, shiny tresses, Philip Kingsley's No Scent No Colour Gentle Shampoo has a hydrating, hypoallergenic formula that quells sensitivity and improves manageability. Originally inspired by Philip’s wife’s battle with breast cancer, this carefully crafted formula was designed to be gentle enough for her when she was undergoing chemotherapy. From there it's been welcomed with open arms by the growing number of people with allergic and reactive skin types that decide to forgo fragrance and strong surfactants. Ideal for sensitive, delicate or easily irritated scalps and an array of textures - from coarse and fine to medium and naturally coiled curls - this gentle formula is suitable even for daily use. The vegan-friendly formula is made without colour, parabens or fragrance, instead, it harnesses glycerides to grant impressive moisture for shiny, soft strands.
how_to_use: Apply the No Scent No Colour Gentle Shampoo to wet hair and lather well with a gentle kneading of the scalp for 60 seconds. Rinse and repeat, if necessary. Follow up with the No Scent No Colour Gentle Conditioner and the appropriate Philip Kingsley Scalp Toner - both not included.

name: Tan-Luxe The Butter Illuminating Gradual Tan Butter 200ml
description: Melting into the skin like super-soft butter, this quick-drying gradual tanning moisturiser is your ticket to effortless bronzing. Featuring a complex of vitamin E and raspberry seed, oat and coconut oils, plus cocoa and shea butters, The Butter by TAN-LUXE has all the heroic hydrating action of your favourite moisturiser plus the tanning talents of a masterful faker – without that tell-tale fake tan scent. Also enriched with a ‘Cellutone Complex’ (a combination of caffeine and palmitoyl) this brilliant butter reduces the appearance of cellulite, intensely nourishing skin as it gradually builds into a natural-looking, sun-kissed tan.
how_to_use: Smooth onto your skin in circular motions. Wash hands after use.

name: Tan-Luxe The Body Illuminating Self-Tan Drops 50ml - Medium/Dark
description: Transform your body moisturiser into a bespoke bronzing hero product with The Body by TAN-LUXE. A revolutionary approach to self-tanning (hitherto fraught with streaky, biscuit-scented tango tonics), you simply add drops of this glow-giving elixir to your body oil, cream or lotion to add natural-looking, sunkissed radiance to even the most dull, lacklustre skin. Enriched with raspberry seed oil, vitamin E and TAN-LUXE’s ‘Cellutone Complex’, every droplet will boost, smooth, tone, tighten and, of course, tan tired-looking skin. Like a sun-drenched holiday in a bottle (without any of the skin-damaging rays), The Body is available in two shades – ‘Light to Medium’ and ‘Medium to Dark’ – delivering an even, luminous colour that’s a million miles from the typically orange faux glow. No smell. No streaks. No drama.
how_to_use: Prep Exfoliate using a gentle scrub 24 hours before tanning. Lightly moisturise dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles and elbows prior to application. Apply Mix 2-6 drops per body part with your usual body moisturiser, oil or cream in the palm of your hand. More drops will add depth of colour. Apply to dry skin in large circular motions from head to toe lightly covering hands elbows and feet. Thoroughly wash hands after use. Maintain Gently exfoliate and moisturise skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow. Caution We advise a patch test is done 24 hours prior to use. Do not apply on broken, irritated or sensitive skin. Avoid contact with eyes. If a reaction occurs, discontinue use immediately and seek medical advice. Does not contain sunscreen and will not protect against sun exposure. Product colour may vary due to natural ingredients.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Dihydroxyacetone, Alcohol Denat. (Alcohol), Glycerin, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Silk, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Polysorbate 80, Erythrulose, Caramel, Xanthan Gum, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Lecithin, Caffeine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Palmitoyl Carnitine, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzoic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Dehydroacetic Acid

name: NUXE 24H Sensitive Skin Deodorant Balm 50g
description: Specially designed for sensitive skin, fend against unflattering odours with Nuxe's 24HR Sensitive Skin Deodorant Balm: a gentle solid balm that cloaks the contours of your underarms to deliver long-lasting odour protection. The quick-absorbing deodorant not only purifies and softens your skin but also respects its natural balance — all without leaving a sticky residue or white marks. The solid deodorant fuses 24-hour odour protection with skin-loving ingredients to nurture your underarms. It's crafted with highly absorbent, organic corn starch powder to effectively capture moisture, leaving armpits soft with a dry-touch feel. An infusion of almond oil then helps to soften and soothe your skin while the aromatic orange blossom scent promotes a sense of freshness. As if that wasn't impressive enough, the formula is proudly vegan, waterless and held in 100% recyclable materials.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount with your fingertips and apply to the underarms just like a cream. You can dress immediately after application.
ingredient: Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Triethyl Citrate, Parfum/Fragrance, Behenyl Alcohol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Polyglyceryl-3 Caprylate, Zinc Gluconate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil*, Hydrogenated Sweet Almond Oil**, Tocopherol, Geraniol, Limonene, Coumarin, Farnesol [N4415/D].

name: NUXE Sun Melting Spray for Face and Body SPF 50
description: Looking for a lightweight SPF that also respects the environment, while deeply moisturising and highlighting your natural tan? You've found it: meet Nuxe's Delicious Sun Spray. Formulated with Nuxe's patented filtering complex - this SPF50 contains three sunscreens and two esters, which have been rigorously selected for their proven effectiveness on all UV rays (think: short UVB + UVA + long UVA.) A botanical blend of rice and rosemary extracts is also used to offer cellular protection and ensure your complexion maintains a more youthful-looking appearance. This clean formula has been tested on algae and corals to ensure its non-toxic for marine life, and has a non-greasy texture that absorbs instantly leaving no streaks - just a beautiful bare-skin feeling that also beautifies your natural tan. As for the scent? Nuxe has bottled the dreamy spirit of summer with tantalising notes of sweet orange, tiare flower and vanilla.
how_to_use: Apply product generously before sun exposure. Spray the product into your hands before applying to your face, avoiding the eye area. On the body, you can spray it directly before spreading it carefully. Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or towel-drying your skin. Note: Applying an insufficient amount of product will significantly reduce the level of sun protection. Excessive exposure to the sun is dangerous and sun care products do not provide 100% protection. Avoid exposure to the sun in the middle of the day.

name: OUAI Hand Wash Refill 946ml

Cushiony and creamy, this cleanser exfoliates, refreshes, hydrates and softens your skin. Biodegradable jojoba beads physically exfoliate, while velvety avocado and rosehip oils soothe, quench dryness and strengthen with fatty acids. Castor oil soothes inflammation too, and the uplifting scent of citrus, apricot, rose, magnolia, blossom and musk will transport you to London’s Dean Street – without the jet lag. Vegan, cruelty-free and completely recyclable (well, minus the pump), this Hand Wash is sure to add some major style points to both your hand care routine and your bathroom décor. A bottle of this on your sink-side and voila! You’re in an episode of At Home with Vogue…

name: Kopari Performance Plus Deodorant

The hard-working deodorant has a scent that boasts notes of fresh white linen, orange, lemon, jasmine and amber. Powered by a patented natural odour-fighting system, this gentle deodorant is suitable for all skin types and promises unparalleled freshness. It's made with a combination of plant-based enzymes that help to provide odour protection while simultaneously helping to break down odor causing bacteria. Vegetable-derived starch then absorbs sweat and minimises moisture, while aloe vera and allantoin soothe and hydrate your skin.

Deliciously rich shea-powered elixir that banishes uncomfortable tightness and cleanses your skin in ways you wouldn't imagine. Nourishing enough to be used on its own without the need for body lotion, this in-shower remedy for dryness shields your skin with a protective film of moisture. Divinely fragranced and silky down to the touch without a greasy after-feel, this enjoyably smooth oil revives your once-supple skin after just one use! Simply top up your Shea Shower Oil with this 500ml refill pouch once you've drenched your limbs in every last drop of replenishing oil.

description: Casting an invisible veil of UVA and UVB protection, Chantecaille’s answer to SPF is high in factor (an impressive SPF 45) and quality (no white cast here!). The youth-prolonging and skin-fortifying formula contains stabilised sun filters to block both UVA and UVB ray. Acting as a primer and a sun shield, this lightweight cream is made without oil and designed to have a mattifying finish – no tell-tale sunscreen shine past this point! It’s infused with cherry blossom, lemon balm and white tea extract – all rich in antioxidants and deeply soothing, while carnosine helps to encourage a more firm and supple appearance. The finishing touch? Its delicate rose scent sets it apart from the other sun creams.

name: Marvis Earl Grey Tea 75ml

It’s time to open wide and embark on a whole new experience filled with excitement that your tastebuds will thank you (and us) for later. Marvis’ Tea Collection comes in 3 deliciously refreshing flavours that go above and beyond your regular drugstore toothpaste to leave you wanting more. Yes, of course it cleanses, freshens breath, removes plaque and tartar, and keeps gums in tip-top shape as you would expect from any toothpaste, but it doesn’t just stop there… Choose from ‘Blossom’, ‘Earl Grey’ and ‘Matcha’ tea flavours to kick-start your day with a delightful blend of Black Tea and flowers which create a fusion of fresh cheerfulness each time you brush your teeth! Housed in their luxuriously distinctive silver tube, elevate an otherwise menial task into a Marvi-lous one…

Imbued with broad spectrum SPF 30 to protect your skin against UVA and UVB rays, this lightweight and transparent (no white cast here!) gel melts seamlessly into your skin for a mattifying effect. A complex of shitake mushroom and mucor miehei peptides helps to encourage collagen production, improving the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for a supple finish. The brand’s proprietary Soft Focus Complex blurs, softens and primes to level a flawless base, while a blend of barley, sunflower and cucumber extracts mimic the skin’s membrane structure, enhancing moisture retention. We’re obsessed!

name: Evereden Soothing Baby Massage Oil 118ml
description: There are plenty of benefits of massaging your baby, from improving their sleep to improving your mental wellbeing. Evereden's ultra-gentle, fragrance-free massage oil is the perfect companion for building the ritual into your week. With a super simple formula - we're talking just five natural and organic ingredients carefully chosen to nourish skin without risking irritation - this massage oil is gentle enough to be used whenever you want to bond and relax with your baby. Even babies need a little bit of spa-worthy zen now and again, after all. If your little one suffers from rashes or dryness and you're keen to avoid harsher ingredients like steroids, this massage oil offers a gentle alternative. Prepare to fall in love with the effective combination of sunflower seed oil (a natural anti-inflammatory ingredient) and coconut oil, all-in-one lightweight formula.

name: HUM Nutrition Uber Energy Adrenal Fatigue and Adaptogen Supplement (60 Vegetarian Capsules, 30 Days)
description: Like an energy-boosting fruit and veg smoothie, the vegetarian Über Energy capsules give your system some serious oomph. Nap who? We don't know her... For the sleepyheads among us, these capsules boost energy levels through adrenal strength - helping to control stress levels and nourish depleted adrenal glands, which are responsible for your 'energy' hormones. By utilising adaptogens to monitor the release of stress hormones from said glands, your energy levels are boosted, fatigue levels are reduced, productivity is increased and tension is diminished. L-tyrosine (an amino acid) is used to create proteins that enhance physical and mental performance, especially when under stress! With a combo of calming and rejuvenating root extracts, (think ginger, rhodiola rosea and more) plus energy-enhancing vitamins C, B5 and B6, kiss goodbye to days ruled by a sleepy haze.

Thanks to pre- and probiotics, you can expect a radiant, healthy (and safe) complexion as a result. Zelens’ broad-spectrum mineral sunscreen is formulated using non-nano zinc particles — which are not only the safest UV filter for human skin, but they’re also kind to marine life, too. Packed with antioxidants, this silk-touch cream harnesses the power of antioxidants to reduce free radical formation and prevent visible signs of sun damage. Prebiotics are also used to rebalance the skin’s microflora, alongside probiotics to enhance barrier function recovery. Consider it a failsafe and soothing everyday essential.

Shielding skin from UVA and UVB rays, this sunscreen is essential to keeping your skin looking youthful and slowing the clock down on the ageing process. Lush in texture, every picture perfect beach day starts here. It even has vitamin E for added skin-smoothing and hydrating benefits. What’s more, you don’t have to worry about it going to waste as soon as you enter the sea because this water-resistant lotion ensures that you’re protected for up to four hours – by then we reckon you’ll be back on the beach and reach for another top up of this fast-absorbing body lotion.

Wear a T-shirt, sunglasses and a hat while being exposed to the sun.

name: Medik8 Advanced Day Eye Protect 15ml
description: A 360Ëš cream to protect and replenish a famously delicate area, Medik8s Advanced Day Eye Protect deflects the harmful impact of the sun and daily stressors while improving circulation to revitalise your eyes. With broad spectrum SPF 30, alongside a pollution shield, anti-infrared, anti-blue light and anti-A.G.E. technologies, this creates a force field between skin and the perils of modern existence. A.G.E.s an acronym for advanced glycation end-products are the product of sugar that binds with the proteins (elastin and collagen) that keep the skin supple and lead to lines, sagging and lost elasticity. Carnosine helps to prevent the skin-ageing effects of these sugars, while cocoa seed extract protects from free radicals, caffeine constricts tiny blood vessels (helping to lessen the look of dark circles) and hesperidin found naturally in citrus fruits fortifies fragile capillary walls for a brighter appearance. Great under make up, consider this potion the perfect defence against everything life tries to throw at you.
